name: Aberration Kinship
desc: Your mind resonates with the inscrutable thought processes that inhuman aberrations use to communicate.

name: Acrobatic Performer
desc: Use Acrobatics to Perform.

name: Acute Vision
desc: Your sense improve when you are raging.

name: Adapted Cantrip
desc: Through study of multiple magical traditions, you’ve altered a spell to suit your spellcasting style.

name: Additional Lore
desc: Become trained in another Lore subcategory.

name: Adhyabhau
desc: You descend from the rare psychic vampires known as vetalaranas.

name: Adopted Ancestry
desc: Gain access to ancestry feats from another ancestry.

name: Adrenaline Rush
desc: In the heat of battle, you are capable of amazing feats of strength.

name: Adroit Manipulation
desc: You’ve fiddled with knots, locks, and blacksmith’s puzzles since you were a child to give your hands something to do.

name: Ageless Spirit
desc: You remember more about your previous incarnations than most leshys.

name: Alchemical Crafting
desc: Craft alchemical items.

name: Alchemical Familiar
desc: You have used alchemy to create life, a simple creature formed from alchemical materials, reagents, and a bit of your own blood.

name: Alchemical Savant
desc: You can identify alchemical items quickly.

name: Alchemical Scholar
desc: You learn formulas more easily.

name: Alghollthu Bound
desc: Although you may not even be aware, the alghollthus your ancestors once served maintain a stranglehold on the deepest, tethered parts of your mind.

name: Anadi Lore
desc: You've learned how to provide for your community, be it through hard-earned sustenance or useful crafts.

name: Ancestral Blood Magic
desc: The magic of your bloodline mixes with that of your ancestry.

name: Ancestral Insight
desc: You have extensive knowledge of your ancestors' ancient origins.

name: Ancestral Linguistics
desc: Over your extensive lifespan, you've studied many languages.

name: Ancestral Longevity
desc: You have accumulated a vast array of lived knowledge over the years.

name: Android Lore
desc: You have a keen interest in the origins of your people.

name: Angelkin
desc: You descend from an angel—a winged messenger from Nirvana or one of the other celestial realms—which gives you a knack for cultures and languages.

name: Animal Accomplice
desc: You build a rapport with an animal, which becomes magically bonded to you.

name: Animal Companion
desc: You gain the service of a young animal companion that travels with you.

name: Animal Senses
desc: You gain one of the following senses available to your inherent animal: darkvision, low-light vision, or scent (imprecise) 30 feet.

name: Aquatic Eyes
desc: As your connection to water grows, you can see more easily in places with less light, such as the depths of the ocean.

name: Arcane Sense
desc: Cast detect magic at will as an arcane innate spell.

name: Arcane Tattoos
desc: You have tattoos on your body corresponding to one of the ancient Thassilonian schools of magic.

name: Armor Assist
prerequisites: trained in Athletics or Warfare Lore
desc: Don armor more quickly.

name: Armor Proficiency
desc: Become trained in a type of armor.

name: Assurance
prerequisites: trained in at least one skill
desc: Receive a fixed result on a skill check.

name: Avenge in Glory
desc: You honor your ally’s life, gaining temporary Hit Points equal to your level for 1 minute.

name: Axiomatic Lore
desc: You possess a strong understanding of process among mortals and lawful outsiders alike.

name: Azarketi Lore
desc: You have learned the history and origins of your people and how to connect to both your land and sea heritage.

name: Azarketi Weapon Familiarity
desc: You are familiar with weapons that excel underwater.

name: Bardic Lore
desc: Your studies make you informed on every subject.

name: Bargain Hunter
desc: Earn Income by searching for deals.

name: Battle Medicine
desc: Heal yourself or an ally in battle.

name: Beast Trainer
desc: You have an impressive innate ability to tame and command ferocious beasts.

name: Beastbrood
desc: One of your ancestors was a rakshasa, the corrupt and aristocratic reincarnated souls that call Golarion home.

name: Blessed Blood
prerequisites: bloodline that grants divine spells; you follow a deity
desc: Your deity’s blessings manifest in your blood-borne power

name: Bon Mot
desc: Distract a foe with a witty quip.

name: Bone Magic
desc: Your connection to your iruxi ancestors manifests as a simple primal spell that you cast using a fragment of an ancestor's bones.

name: Bouncy Goblin
desc: You have a particular elasticity that makes it easy for you to bounce and squish.

name: Breath Control
desc: Hold your breath longer and gain benefits against inhaled threats.

name: Brightsoul
desc: The fire inside you asserts itself as beaming, radiant light.

name: Brine May
desc: Your mother was a sea hag, granting you one sea-green or blue eye.

name: Brinesoul
desc: Your elemental ancestor's legacy asserts itself as brackish water, like the seawater of the ocean.

name: Buckler Expertise
desc: You've learned a flexible way to position your buckler to provide more protection.

name: Burn It!
desc: Fire fascinates you.

name: Burrow Elocutionist
desc: You recognize the chittering of ground creatures as its own peculiar language.

name: Cackle
desc: You can extend one of your spells with a quick burst of laughter.

name: Callow May
desc: You are among the most common of changelings—those born to green hags—and a vibrant green eye signifies that parentage.

name: Canny Acumen
desc: Become an expert in a saving throw or Perception.

name: Cantorian Reinforcement
desc: The life energy that helped create the first hobgoblins is particularly potent in you, protecting you from ongoing maladies.

name: Cat Fall
desc: Treat falls as shorter than they are.

name: Cat Nap
desc: You can briefly sleep to regain your energy quickly.

name: Catch the Details
desc: You are quick at recognizing broad details about people and things around you.

name: Catfolk Dance
desc: You have a habit of always being in the way when other creatures attempt to move.

name: Catfolk Lore
desc: Growing up among catfolk has taught you the traditional values of freedom to travel, stewardship of the land, and quick reactions when your curiosity lands you in trouble.

name: Catfolk Weapon Familiarity
desc: You favor weapons that you can use with quick, darting slashes like a cat's claws.

name: Cat's Luck
desc: You instinctively twist away from danger.

name: Cauldron
desc: You can use the Craft activity to create oils and potions.

name: Cel Rau
desc: You are a cel rau, child of a strigoi, one of the first vampires to walk Golarion.

name: Celestial Eyes
desc: You can see through darkness.

name: Celestial Lore
desc: You were raised with an aasimar or celestial relative, or you've devoted yourself to researching the secrets of the celestial realms.

name: Ceremony of Protection
desc: You manipulate your exoskeleton to overlap itself.

name: Ceremony of the Evened Hand
desc: You have cultivated your exoskeleton's form for close combat, using knots, whorls, and reinforced branches.

name: Chance Death
desc: Your previous life ended due to sheer poor luck, struck by lightning or choking on a fish bone.

name: Changeling Lore
desc: All too aware of your true nature, you’ve studied hags and their powers.

name: Charlatan
desc: You’ve learned to mimic the abilities of spellcasters by studying their flourishes and words

name: Charming Liar
desc: Improve a target's attitude with your lies.

name: Cheek Pouches
desc: Your cheeks are stretchy, and you can store up to four items of light Bulk or less in these cheek pouches.

name: Cindersoul
desc: The fire of your elemental ancestor manifests like dying embers of a blaze, and your inner charcoal helps staunch bleeding, purify simple poisons, and absorb acid.

name: City Scavenger
desc: You know that the greatest treasures often look like refuse, and you scoff at those who throw away perfectly good scraps.

name: Clan's Edge
desc: By moving your clan dagger with rapid precision, you can protect yourself more effectively.

name: Cleansing Subroutine
desc: Your nanites help purge your body of harmful chemicals and toxins.

name: Combat Assessment
desc: You make a telegraphed attack to learn about your foe.

name: Combat Climber
desc: Fight more effectively as you Climb.

name: Concealing Legerdemain
desc: Conceal an Object using Thievery instead of Stealth.

name: Conrasu Lore
desc: You have learned about your history and your people from shapers.

name: Conrasu Weapon Familiarity
desc: You have taken it upon yourself to learn the ways of combat to aid with your tasks, perhaps in a role as a corrector.

name: Consult the Stars
desc: You find wisdom in the movements of the heavens.

name: Cooperative Nature
desc: The short human life span lends perspective and has taught you from a young age to set aside differences and work with others to achieve greatness.

name: Corgi Mount
desc: The smallest of fey have ridden corgis as mounts since time immemorial, leading to a pattern on corgis' backs called a “faerie saddle.

name: Counterspell
desc: When a foe Casts a Spell and you can see its manifestations, you can use your own magic to disrupt it.

name: Courteous Comeback
desc: You grew up in the proud Padishah Empire, where even insults have a certain poetic wit.

name: Courtly Graces
desc: Use Society to get along in noble society.

name: Crafter's Appraisal
desc: Use Crafting to identify magic items.

name: Crane Stance
desc: You enter the stance of a crane, holding your arms in an imitation of a crane’s wings.

name: Creative Prodigy
desc: You have a powerful creative drive, useful for prevarication and performance.

name: Cringe
desc: With pitiful posturing, you cause your foe to pull back a deadly attack.

name: Critter Shape
desc: Once per hour, you can use Change Shape to enter a critter shape.

name: Crossbow Ace
desc: You have a deep understanding of the crossbow.

name: Crunch
desc: Your jaws can crush bone and bite through armor.

name: Cynical
desc: You've been approached with suspicion and distrust throughout your life and return these sentiments back to the strangers you encounter.

name: Dangerous Sorcery
desc: Your legacy grants you great destructive power.

name: Deadly Simplicity
prerequisites: deity with a simple or unarmed attack favored weapon, trained with your deity's favored weapon
desc: Your deity’s weapon is especially powerful in your hands.

name: Deceptive Worship
desc: Pass yourself off as a member of a religion.

name: Deepvision
desc: Your vision is suited for night or the underground.

name: Deity's Domain
desc: You embody an aspect of your deity.

name: Deliberate Death
desc: Once, you died because someone—murderer or monster, soldier or executioner— chose to strike you down.

name: Demonbane Warrior
desc: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to damage with weapons and unarmed attacks against demons.

name: Desperate Prayer
desc: You call out to your deity in a plea for their aid.

name: Devil's Advocate
desc: You know more about the habits of devils than is entirely safe.

name: Diehard
desc: Die at dying 5, rather than dying 4.

name: Different Worlds
prerequisites: ability to select ancestry feats from multiple ancestries
desc: Create a second identity for yourself with a different name, history, and background.

name: Dig Quickly
desc: Your hands work as effectively as shovels when you need to dig a quick hole.

name: Disarming Flair
desc: It's harder for your foes to regain their grip when you knock their weapon partially out of their hands.

name: Distracting Shadows
desc: You have learned to remain hidden by using larger folk as a distraction to avoid drawing attention to yourself.

name: Domain Initiate
desc: Your deity bestows a special spell related to their powers.

name: Double Slice
desc: You lash out at your foe with both weapons.

name: Draconic Arrogance
desc: Few can sway you from your goals while the fury of combat fills you.

name: Draconic Sycophant
desc: You have an affect that dragonkind find unusually pleasing—and when that fails, you know when to duck.

name: Dragon Spit
desc: Many Tian-Dan claim to have dragon blood in their veins, and in your case, this is true—you can spit energy, and you might have an especially visible sign of your draconic heritage.

name: Dragon Stance
desc: You enter the stance of a dragon and make powerful leg strikes like a lashing dragon’s tail.

name: Dragon's Presence
desc: As a member of dragonkind, you project unflappable confidence

name: Dream May
desc: You are the child of a night hag, making one of your eyes violet or even black.

name: Dualborn
desc: Your suli heritage can be traced back to two geniekin ancestors of opposing elements, or to an elemental ancestor that embodied two combined elements.

name: Dubious Knowledge
prerequisites: trained in a skill with the Recall Knowledge action
desc: Learn true and erroneous knowledge on failed check.

name: Dueling Parry (Swashbuckler)
desc: You can parry attacks against you with your weapon.

name: Duskwalker Lore
desc: You either found another duskwalker who taught you the secrets of your kind, or you managed to research your unusual heritage.

name: Dustsoul
desc: Your earth elemental ancestor's influence manifests in you as dust and dirt, like the soil of a field or the hot desert sands.

name: Dwarven Doughtiness
desc: You are either naturally calm and collected in the face of imminent danger, or you are very good at faking it.

name: Dwarven Lore
desc: You eagerly absorbed the old stories and traditions of your ancestors, your gods, and your people.

name: Dwarven Weapon Familiarity
desc: Your kin have instilled in you an affinity for hard-hitting weapons, and you prefer these to more elegant arms.

name: Earned Glory
desc: Elves are often skeptical of their half-elven kin, and you are experienced at telling stories of your accomplishments to gain their respect.

name: Eidetic Ear
desc: You have an amazing memory for sound.

name: Elemental Assault
desc: You shroud your arms and held weapons in elemental magic.

name: Elemental Embellish
desc: You can summon a harmless but impressive elemental display.

name: Elemental Eyes
desc: You can see in the darkness as easily as an elemental.

name: Elemental Lore
desc: You've devoted yourself to researching the secrets of the Inner Sphere.

name: Elemental Trade
desc: You have a strong connection with stone and metal.

name: Elemental Wrath
desc: You are so attuned to the land that you can call forth a bolt of energy from your surroundings.

name: Elf Atavism
desc: Your elven blood runs particularly strong, granting you features far more elven than those of a typical half-elf.

name: Elven Aloofness
desc: As much as you might care for them, you've come to terms with the ephemeral nature of non-elves, and it makes their threats feel less troublesome.

name: Elven Lore
desc: You’ve studied in traditional elven arts, learning about arcane magic and the world around you.

name: Elven Verve
desc: While all elves are immune to the paralyzing touch of ghouls, you can shake off flesh-numbing magic of all kinds.

name: Elven Weapon Familiarity
desc: You favor bows and other elegant weapons.

name: Emberkin
desc: A peri's roaring spirit burns in your soul.

name: Ember's Eyes
desc: Your eyes blaze with inner flame.

name: Emotionless
desc: Your malfunctioning emotional processors make it difficult for you to feel strong emotions.

name: Empathetic Plea
desc: The way you cringe or use those puppydog eyes you've been practicing elicits an empathetic response in the attacker.

name: Eschew Materials
desc: You can use clever workarounds to replicate the arcane essence of certain materials.

name: Esteemed Visitor
desc: Your polite manners and natural ability to comfort others make it easy for you to break down cultural barriers and earn strangers’ trust.

name: Evanescent Wings
desc: You've manifested wings that can flutter for brief spurts.

name: Everstand Stance
desc: You brace your shield with both hands, enhancing its potential for both offense and defense.

name: Exacting Strike
desc: You make a controlled attack, fully accounting for your momentum.

name: Experienced Professional
desc: Prevent critical failures when Earning Income.

name: Experienced Smuggler
desc: Conceal items from observers more effectively.

name: Experienced Tracker
desc: Track at your full Speed at a –5 penalty.

name: Express Rider
desc: Increase your mount’s travel speed.

name: Extra Squishy
desc: Your rubbery physique makes it easier for you to wedge yourself into tight spaces and more difficult for your enemies to dislodge you.

name: Eye for Numbers
desc: +2 to Decipher Writing about math and count items quickly.

name: Eye for Treasure
desc: You know good artisanship when you see it and can wax poetic about crafting techniques and forms.

name: Eyes of the Night
desc: You can see in the darkness as easily as a true vampire.

name: False Faith
source: Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City
desc: Droskar knows you may need to disguise yourself in societies that oppose your faith.

name: Familiar
desc: An animal serves you and assists your spellcasting.

name: Fang Sharpener
prerequisites: Irongut Goblin heritage or Razortooth Goblin heritage
desc: You have filed your teeth into jagged points and have an unusually powerful jaw, making your mouth a dangerous weapon.

name: Fangs
desc: Your incisors have grown into true fangs: long, sharp, and well-suited to drawing blood.

name: Far Lobber
desc: You’ve learned how to throw a longer distance.

name: Fascinating Performance
desc: Perform to fascinate observers.

name: Fast Recovery
desc: Regain more HP from rest, recover faster from disease and poisons.

name: Feather Step
desc: Step into difficult terrain.

name: Fetchling Lore
desc: You've learned obscure lessons about your fellow fetchlings.

name: Fey Cantrips
desc: You've learned the cantrips sprites have used since time immemorial.

name: Fey Fellowship
desc: Your enhanced fey connection affords you a warmer reception from creatures of the First World.

name: Fiendish Eyes
desc: You can see in the darkness as easily as a fiend.

name: Fiendish Lore
desc: You were raised by a tiefling or a fiendish relative, or you've devoted yourself to researching the secrets of the fiendish realms.

name: First World Magic
desc: Your connection to the First World grants you a primal innate spell, much like those of the fey.

name: Fleet
desc: Increase your Speed by 5 feet.

name: Flexible Studies
desc: You've collected a cross-section of information on various disciplines you can refer to when preparing for various tasks.

name: Flying Blade
desc: You've learned to apply your flashy techniques to thrown weapons as easily as melee attacks.

name: Focused Fascination
desc: When you use Fascinating Performance in a combat encounter, you need only a success, rather than a critical success, to fascinate your target.

name: Folksy Patter
desc: You are adept at disguising coded messages as folksy idioms.

name: Forager
desc: Forage for supplies to provide for multiple creatures.

name: Forensic Acumen
desc: Rapidly examine a body and Recall Knowledge about it.

name: Forge-Day's Rest
desc: Your unusual rest cycle allows you to recover faster.

name: Forlorn
desc: Watching your friends age and die fills you with moroseness that protects you against harmful emotions.

name: Form of the Fiend
desc: Part of your body has an obvious, fiendish appearance.

name: Foxfire
desc: A crack of your tail sparks wisps of blue energy.

name: Fumesoul
desc: The air inside you asserts itself as a toxic miasma, inuring you to most poisons.

name: Ganzi Gaze
desc: You have unusual sensory abilities passed down from your chaotic forebears.

name: Gemsoul
desc: The earth inside you asserts itself as crystallized gemstones or metals, like a cluster of quartz or veins of iron and gold.

name: General Training
desc: Your adaptability manifests in your mastery of a range of useful abilities.

name: Genie Weapon Familiarity
desc: You've trained with weapons used by your genie ancestors.

name: Ghost Hunter
desc: Your connection to the Boneyard ensures that your blows strike true against spectral beings.

name: Glean Contents
desc: Decipher Writing even when you can’t see the document well.

name: Glean Lore
desc: You tap into the collected lore of the divine, accessing a variety of potentially useful information.

name: Gloomseer
desc: Gloom holds few terrors for you, and the pall of darkness over Nidal has made you comfortable in dim light.

name: Gnoll Lore
desc: You paid attention to your senior hunters to learn their tricks.

name: Gnoll Weapon Familiarity
desc: You were taught to be a hunter and a raider.

name: Gnome Obsession
desc: You might have a flighty nature, but when a topic captures your attention, you dive into it headfirst.

name: Gnome Polyglot
desc: Your extensive travels, curiosity, and love of learning help you to learn languages quickly.

name: Gnome Weapon Familiarity
desc: You favor unusual weapons tied to your people, such as blades with curved and peculiar shapes.

name: Goading Feint
desc: When you trick a foe, you can goad them into overextending their next attack.

name: Goblin Lore
desc: You’ve picked up skills and tales from your goblin community.

name: Goblin Scuttle
desc: You take advantage of your ally’s movement to adjust your position.

name: Goblin Song
desc: You sing annoying goblin songs, distracting your foes with silly and repetitive lyrics.

name: Goblin Weapon Familiarity
desc: Others might look upon them with disdain, but you know that the weapons of your people are as effective as they are sharp.

name: Goloma Courage
desc: The most important thing you've learned living with fear is how to overcome it.

name: Goloma Lore
desc: You lived an insulated life focused on avoiding danger.

name: Gorilla Stance
desc: You lower yourself to the ground and take an imposing, knuckle-walking stance.

name: Grasping Reach
desc: You can extend a tangle of vines or tendrils to support your arms and extend your reach.

name: Gravesight
desc: You can see in the darkness as easily as a psychopomp.

name: Gravity Weapon
desc: Your expertise with your weapons and commitment to taking out your targets lends you magical power.

name: Grim Insight
desc: Others’ attempts to scare you often grant you insights about your would-be bullies that you can then exploit.

name: Grimspawn
desc: Your lineage traces back to a daemon, one of the manifestations of horrific forms of death that devour souls within their foul home of Abaddon.

name: Grippli Lore
desc: You are well versed in grippli culture and tactics.

name: Grippli Weapon Familiarity
desc: You've trained with weapons ideally suited to marshes and dense forests.

name: Group Coercion
desc: Coerce multiple targets simultaneously.

name: Group Impression
desc: Make an Impression on multiple targets at once.

name: Hag Claws
desc: When you came of age, your fingernails grew long and sharp.

name: Hag's Sight
desc: You've nurtured the supernatural abilities gifted by your hag mother, particularly your sight.

name: Halfling Lore
desc: You’ve dutifully learned important skills passed down through generations of halfling tradition.

name: Halfling Luck
desc: Your happy-go-lucky nature makes it seem like misfortune avoids you.

name: Halfling Weapon Familiarity
desc: You favor traditional halfling weapons, so you’ve learned how to use them more effectively.

name: Halo
desc: You are surrounded by a halo of light and goodness at all times.

name: Hand of the Apprentice
desc: You can magically hurl your weapon at your foe.

name: Handy with Your Paws
desc: You can easily craft objects.

name: Hard Tail
desc: Your tail is much stronger than most, and you can lash out with it with the strength of a whip.

name: Hard to Fool
desc: You're accustomed to seeing through shifting darkness and bewildering magic.

name: Harming Hands
desc: The mordant power of your negative energy grows.

name: Harmlessly Cute
desc: Your size and demeanor make it easy for you to convince others that you mean no harm.

name: Haughty Obstinacy
desc: Your powerful ego makes it harder for others to order you around.

name: Heal Companion
desc: You have a deep devotion to your animal companion that enables you to magically heal their wounds.

name: Healing Hands
desc: Your positive energy is even more vibrant and restorative.

name: Hefty Hauler
desc: Increase your Bulk limits by 2.

name: Hellspawn
desc: Your lineage descends from devils, the conniving schemers of Hell's malevolent hierarchy.

name: Hobgoblin Lore
desc: You’ve studied traditional hobgoblin exercises and fieldcraft, all of which have a militaristic bent.

name: Hobgoblin Weapon Familiarity
desc: You are trained with composite longbows, composite shortbows, glaives, longbows, longswords, and shortbows.

name: Hobnobber
desc: Gather Information rapidly.

name: Holy Castigation
desc: You combine holy energy with positive energy to damage demons, devils, and their evil ilk.

name: Hunted Shot
desc: You take two quick shots against the one you hunt.

name: Hunter's Defense
desc: Your canny understanding of natural and primal creatures helps you predict and dodge their attacks.

name: Hydraulic Deflection
desc: Drawing moisture from the atmosphere, you create a disc of hovering water that deflects attacks.

name: Hyena Familiar
desc: Hyenas serve gnolls as pets, trackers, and in your case, vessels for spirits.

name: Hymn of Healing
desc: You learn the hymn of healing composition spell (page 228), which imbues your music with rich melodies that help your allies recover from harm.

name: Idyllkin
desc: Your wild, unique features betray your agathion birthright.

name: Illusion Sense
desc: Your ancestors spent their days cloaked and cradled in illusions, and as a result, sensing illusion magic is second nature to you.

name: Impressive Performance
desc: Make an Impression with Performance.

name: Improvisational Defender
desc: You are always prepared for fights that frequently disrupt seemingly peaceful times.

name: Improvise Tool
desc: Craft basic tools without a basic crafter’s book.

name: Incredible Initiative
desc: +2 to initiative rolls.

name: Inner Fire
desc: You can call the fire inside you into the palm of your hand.

name: Innocuous
desc: Halflings have been unobtrusive assistants of larger folk for untold ages, and your people count on this assumption of innocence.

name: Inoculation
desc: Grant patients +2 to saves against getting a disease again.

name: Internal Cohesion
desc: Axis's order suffuses your body and helps it maintain coherency.

name: Internal Compartment
desc: You can hide a small object of up to light Bulk inside a hollow cavity on one of your forearms.

name: Intimidating Glare
desc: Demoralize a creature without speaking.

name: Intuitive Cooperation
desc: You are accustomed to working alongside others, relying on each other to get by.

name: Intuitive Crafting
desc: Your affinity with process and order makes you a natural artisan.

name: Inventive Offensive
desc: You can jury-rig your weapons to perform in unexpected ways.

name: Iron Fists
desc: Your fists have been forged by battle, your naturally tough skin and dense bone further hardened by conflict.

name: Iron Repercussions
desc: Disobeying your Iron Command has lasting consequences.

name: Irrepressible (Ganzi)
desc: Your contrary nature means you bounce back with prejudice.

name: Jungle Strider
desc: You are adept at dodging roots, foliage, and other jungle obstacles.

name: Junk Tinker
desc: You can make useful tools out of even twisted or rusted scraps.

name: Keep Up Appearances
desc: Taldan pride means you never show weakness.

name: Ki Rush
desc: You can use ki to move with extraordinary speed and make yourself harder to hit.

name: Ki Strike
desc: Your study of the flow of mystical energy allows you to harness it into your physical strikes.

name: Kitsune Lore
desc: You excel at navigating social situations and keeping secrets.

name: Kitsune Spell Familiarity
desc: You've picked up a few magical tricks.

name: Know Oneself
desc: You center yourself and call to mind the Vudrani monastic ideals of mindfulness and self-knowledge.

name: Know Your Own
desc: You've spent countless hours studying the history of elves on your world and beyond and are a studied expert in your people's ways.

name: Known Weaknesses
desc: Whenever you Devise a Stratagem, you can also attempt a check to Recall Knowledge as part of that action.

name: Kobold Breath
desc: You channel your draconic exemplar's power into a gout of energy.

name: Kobold Lore
desc: You attentively learned key kobold survival strategies and mythology from your elders.

name: Kobold Weapon Familiarity
desc: You've trained with weapons ideal for subterranean efficiency.

name: Lavasoul
desc: Your elemental lineage manifests as magma and molten rock, and you can focus the magma into your hand to attack your foes.

name: Lawbringer
desc: You trace your lineage to archons: embodiments of heavenly virtues, guardians of the seven-tiered mountain of Heaven, and nurturers of law and virtue within mortals.

name: Leech-Clipper
desc: You are trained to capture deserters, or “leeches”.

name: Lemma of Vision
desc: You've solved a tiny stepping stone in your self-discovery, awakening new depths in your sight.

name: Lengthy Diversion
desc: Remain hidden after you Create a Diversion.

name: Leshy Familiar
desc: You gain a leshy familiar, a tiny plant that embodies one of the many spirits of nature.

name: Leshy Lore
desc: You deeply understand your people’s cultural traditions and innate strengths.

name: Leshy Superstition
desc: You notice spirits that inhabit objects, learning which bring good fortune and which are unlucky.

name: Lie to Me
desc: Use Deception to detect lies.

name: Life-Giving Magic
desc: The upwelling of innate magic refreshes your body.

name: Lightning Tongue
desc: Your tongue darts out faster than the eye can see to retrieve loose objects.

name: Lingering Composition
desc: By adding a flourish, you make your compositions last longer.

name: Living Weapon
desc: You've learned to use part of your form as a weapon.

name: Lizardfolk Lore
desc: You listened carefully to the tales passed down among your community.

name: Maiden's Mending
desc: You can tap into some of the magic that flows through your blood to give you new life.

name: Mariner's Fire
desc: You conjure uncanny orbs of spiritual flame that float above or below the water's surface.

name: Marsh Runner
desc: You are adept at moving through marshy terrain.

name: Martial Performance
desc: Your muse has taught you how to handle a wider variety of weapons than most bards, empowering you to effortlessly blend your performance into combat even with the most inelegant tools.

name: Medical Researcher
desc: Kassi has taught you not only how to apply medicines with your medical skills but how to craft them as well.

name: Miresoul
desc: You have a connection to the muddier denizens of the Plane of Earth from its border with the Plane of Water, and your elemental lineage manifests as clay or mud, reflecting that bond.

name: Mistsoul
desc: You have a connection to vaporous forms of water, such as fog and mist.

name: Moment of Clarity
desc: You push back your rage for a moment in order to think clearly.

name: Monastic Archer Stance
desc: You enter a specialized stance for a unique martial art centered around the use of a bow.

name: Monastic Weaponry
desc: You have trained with the traditional weaponry of your monastery or school.

name: Monster Hunter
desc: You swiftly assess your prey and apply what you know.

name: Monstrous Peacemaker
desc: Your dual human and orc nature has given you a unique perspective.

name: Moon May
desc: Your mother was a moon hag, a handmaiden of Groetus, and you have a single scarlet eye and a sliver of her supernal foresight.

name: Mountain Stance
desc: You enter the stance of an implacable mountain allowing you to strike with the weight of an avalanche.

name: Multilingual
desc: Learn two new languages.

name: Musetouched
desc: Your blood sings with the liberating power of the azatas, living embodiments of freedom from the wild realm of Elysium.

name: Nanite Surge
desc: You stimulate your nanites, forcing your body to temporarily increase its efficiency.

name: Natural Ambition
desc: You were raised to be ambitious and always reach for the stars, leading you to progress quickly in your chosen field.

name: Natural Medicine
desc: Use Nature to Treat Wounds.

name: Natural Performer
desc: Entertainment comes naturally to you.

name: Natural Skill
desc: Your ingenuity allows you to learn a wide variety of skills.

name: Nestling Fall
desc: You trust the strength of your wings and can spread them to glide safely to the ground.

name: Nightvision Adaptation
desc: The nanites in your ocular processors have adapted to darkness, enhancing your ability to see in the dark.

name: Nimble Dodge
desc: You deftly dodge out of the way.

name: Nimble Elf
desc: Your muscles are tightly honed.

name: Nimble Hooves
desc: Your legs end in hooves rather than feet, with joints and tendons that allow you to move with great haste.

name: No Cause for Alarm
desc: Reduce creatures’ frightened condition values.

name: Nocturnal Charm
desc: The supernatural charm of your vampiric progenitor hangs about you, and you've learned to use it on mortals.

name: Nocturnal Grippli
desc: You tend to do most of your hunting and work at night and have adapted to the requirements of nocturnal life.

name: Nosoi's Mask
desc: Many psychopomps wear masks when dealing with the living, and many cultures believe that seeing an unmasked psychopomp's face invites death.

name: Oddity Identification
desc: +2 to Occultism checks to Identify Magic with certain traits.

name: Old Soul
desc: Your immortal lineage has granted you a lifespan much longer than most mortals, and you've learned a lot along the way.

name: One for All
desc: With precisely the right words of encouragement, you bolster an ally's efforts.

name: Ongoing Selfishness
desc: Your powerful personality and incredible ego demand that you protect yourself above all else.

name: Orc Ferocity
desc: Fierceness in battle runs through your blood, and you refuse to fall from your injuries.

name: Orc Lore
desc: The hold elders taught you your people's histories, told tales of great athletic feats, and shared with you the hardships your ancestors endured so that you can pass this wisdom down to future generations.

name: Orc Sight
desc: Your orc blood is strong enough to grant you the keen vision of your orc forebears.

name: Orc Superstition
desc: You defend yourself against magic by relying on techniques derived from orc cultural superstitions.

name: Orc Warmask
desc: You paint your face to create a warmask.

name: Orc Weapon Familiarity
desc: In combat, you favor the brutal weapons that are traditional for your orc ancestors.

name: Otherworldly Magic
desc: Your elven magic manifests as a simple arcane spell, even if you aren’t formally trained in magic.

name: Overextending Feint
desc: When you trick a foe, instead of catching them off guard, you goad them into overextending their next attack.

name: Overlooked Mastermind
desc: Many consider half-orcs little more than dumb brutes.

name: Pack Hunter
desc: You were taught how to hunt as part of a pack.

name: Pack Rat
desc: Years of packing for travel have taught you how to cram vast quantities into small spaces.

name: Parthenogenic Hatchling
desc: You were hatched from an unfertilized egg during hard times for your people, and you are a biological copy of your mother.

name: Pelagic Aptitude
desc: You've learned special tricks to survive underwater.

name: Perfect Dive
desc: You dive into the water with exceptional skill and connection to the waves, urging the water itself to cushion your fall.

name: Pickpocket
desc: Steal or Palm an Object more effectively.

name: Pierce the Darkness
desc: Your eyes have adapted to see in all circumstances, even without the assistance of light.

name: Pilgrim's Token
desc: A religious token lets you act ﬁrst on a tie for initiative.

name: Pitborn
desc: Your blood bears the mark of a demon, a living embodiment of sin from the fetid depths of the Abyss.

name: Plant Evidence
desc: You can put a single item you're holding of light or negligible Bulk onto a person without them noticing.

name: Plumekith
desc: Your blood soars with the power of the magnificent garuda, proud and stoic avian warriors.

name: Point-Blank Shot
desc: You take aim to pick off nearby enemies quickly.

name: Power Attack
desc: You unleash a particularly powerful attack that clobbers your foe but leaves you a bit unsteady.

name: Prairie Rider
desc: You grew up riding your clan's shaggy ponies and riding dogs.

name: Premonition of Avoidance
desc: Your deity grants you limited foresight, warning you of dangers an instant before they occur.

name: Proximity Alert
desc: You're unnaturally in tune with your surroundings and react instinctively to danger.

name: Quah Bond
desc: You grew up among the Shoanti tribes, with the spirits watching over you, and they offer you guidance.

name: Quick Bomber
desc: You keep your bombs in easy-to-reach pouches from which you draw without thinking.

name: Quick Coercion
desc: Coerce a creature quickly.

name: Quick Identification
prerequisites: trained in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
desc: Identify Magic in 1 minute or less.

name: Quick Jump
desc: High Jump or Long Jump as a single action.

name: Quick Repair
desc: Repair items quickly.

name: Quick Shape
desc: Your instincts kick in and you take on an aggressive stance.

name: Quick Squeeze
desc: Move swiftly as you Squeeze.

name: Radiant Circuitry
desc: Your biological circuitry emits light like a torch, casting bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet).

name: Raging Intimidation
desc: Your fury fills your foes with fear.

name: Raging Thrower
desc: Thrown weapons become especially deadly in your fury. You apply the additional damage from Rage to your thrown weapon attacks. If you have the Brutal Critical feat or the devastator class feature, apply their benefits to thrown weapon attacks.

name: Rain of Embers Stance
desc: You enter the stance of an enraged phoenix, holding your fingers as rigid as deadly talons while moving with quick, flickering gestures that dance with biting flames.

name: Ranged Reprisal
desc: You can use Retributive Strike with a ranged weapon.

name: Rat Familiar
desc: You have a pet rat that has become magically bonded to you.

name: Ratfolk Lore
desc: Years of experience among ratfolk communities have made you nimble, and you've learned to run and hide when enemies threaten.

name: Ratspeak
desc: To you, the squeaking of rats and other rodents makes a strange kind of sense.

name: Ravening's Desperation
desc: Your study of the Beast of Gluttondark has taught you how to make do in the most trying of circumstances rather than succumb to weakness.

name: Razor Claws
desc: Your have honed your claws to be deadly.

name: Razzle-Dazzle
desc: You've spent considerable time practicing the manipulation of light, weaponizing your blade's reflection or bolstering the luminosity of magical displays to unconventional heights.

name: Reach Spell
desc: You can extend your spells’ range.

name: Reactive Shield
desc: You can snap your shield into place just as you would take a blow, avoiding the hit at the last second.

name: Read Lips
desc: Read the lips of people you can see.

name: Reassuring Presence
desc: You serve as an anchor to your close companions, calming them in times of stress.

name: Recognize Spell
prerequisites: trained in Arcana, Nature, trained in Occultism, or trained in Religion
desc: Identify a spell as a reaction as it's being cast.

name: Remorseless Lash
desc: You’re skilled at beating a foe when their morale is already breaking.

name: Reptile Rider
desc: To you, crocodilians, giant lizards, and dinosaurs are loyal steeds, not monsters.

name: Reptile Speaker
desc: You hear the sounds of reptiles as language.

name: Retractable Claws
desc: You gain a claw unarmed attack that deals 1d4 slashing damage.

name: Ride
desc: Automatically succeed at commanding your mount to move.

name: Riftmarked
desc: Long ago, qlippoth marked someone in your lineage, most likely through their ancient runestones that dot Golarion's surface.

name: Rimesoul
desc: The water inside you is cold and frozen, like sheets of ice and frigid glaciers.

name: Risky Surgery
desc: Deal damage to a patient to gain +2 to Treat Wounds.

name: Rock Runner
desc: Your innate connection to stone makes you adept at moving across uneven surfaces.

name: Root Magic
desc: Create a token that grants a bonus against a spell or haunt.

name: Rough Rider
desc: You are especially good at riding traditional goblin mounts.

name: Round Ears
desc: Your elven lineage is subtle enough that you look barely different from other humans, and you’ve learned to use that to your advantage.

name: Ru-Shi
desc: You were born to a jiang-shi, one of the so-called hopping vampires found most often in Tian-Xia.

name: Saberteeth
desc: You have long fangs, natural or augmented.

name: Saoc Astrology
desc: The ancient Saoc Brethren were the masters of astrology, and while your knowledge may be but a pale shadow of their wisdom, it still comes in handy.

name: Scamper
desc: You instinctively know how to flee danger.

name: Scamper Underfoot
desc: You are used to ducking under foes and can scurry around the battlefield with ease.

name: Scavenger's Search
desc: You're always on the lookout for supplies and valuables.

name: Scholar's Inheritance
desc: Your parents devoted themselves to alchemical experiments involving elemental energy.

name: Schooled in Secrets
desc: Gather Information about secret societies and mystery cults.

name: Seasoned
prerequisites: trained in Alcohol Lore, Cooking Lore, or Crafting
desc: +1 to Craft food and drink, including potions.

name: Secret Speech
desc: Learn the secret language of a society.

name: Seedpod
desc: Your body produces a nearly endless supply of hard seedpods.

name: Sensitive Nose
desc: Your large black nose isn't just for show.

name: Shackleborn
desc: Your lineage shows the signs of velstrac tampering, including some curious quirk bequeathed by those shadowy surgeons of flesh and souls.

name: Shadow Blending
desc: You draw shadows close to create a shroud.

name: Shadow of the Wilds
desc: It’s difficult to notice your passage through wild areas.

name: Shapechanger's Intuition
desc: A lifetime of experience helps you see through disguises.

name: Share Thoughts
prerequisites: Mualijae ethnicity, Ilverani ethnicity, or Vourinoi ethnicity
desc: You have an uncanny knack of communicating with other elves without speaking, though this habit that is often uncomfortable to observers.

name: Sharp Fangs
desc: Your teeth are formidable weapons.

name: Shield Block
desc: Ward off a blow with your shield.

name: Shisk Lore
desc: You hoard knowledge like a dragon hoards gold.

name: Shoony Lore
desc: Growing up in shoony society, you learned the value of honesty, friendship, and hard work, even during trying times.

name: Shrouded Magic
desc: Choose one cantrip from the occult spell list.

name: Shrouded Mien
desc: You're used to dealing with dangerous situations and sinister creatures.

name: Sign Language
desc: Learn sign languages.

name: Sinister Appearance
desc: You possess horns, a tail, or red eyes, or could otherwise be mistaken for a tiefling.

name: Skill Training
desc: Become trained in a skill.

name: Skittertalk
desc: You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the Diplomacy skill with spiders and other arachnids.

name: Skull Creeper
desc: You wear skulls to demoralize foes.

name: Slag May
desc: Your mother was an annis hag, known for physical prowess, and you have one violet or steel-gray eye.

name: Slink
desc: You can move through gloom with the speed of darkness.

name: Slither
desc: You are an expert at moving through extremely tight spaces.

name: Smashing Tail
desc: You have a tail that serves as a potent weapon.

name: Smokesoul
desc: You have a connection to smoke and haze.

name: Snagging Strike
desc: You combine an attack with quick grappling moves to throw an enemy off balance as long as it stays in your reach.

name: Snare Crafting
desc: Craft snares.

name: Snare Setter
desc: You are adept at the time-honored kobold art of trap making.

name: Sneaky
desc: Stealth is an important tool in your arsenal.

name: Snow May
desc: You're the child of a winter hag, with one blue-white eye and an affinity for rime and snow.

name: Sociable
desc: You’re extremely extroverted, and you often spend your time carousing or otherwise socializing.

name: Speak with Bats
desc: You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the Diplomacy skill with bats.

name: Specialty Crafting
desc: Gain bonuses to Craft certain items.

name: Spellbook Prodigy
desc: You are particularly adept at learning spells to add to your spellbook.

name: Spelunker
desc: Living underground, you have learned to find your way without landmarks or even solid ground.

name: Spine Stabber
desc: The quills on your arms are particularly sharp and sturdy.

name: Splinter Faith
desc: Your faith in your deity is represented in an extremely unusual way that some might call heretical

name: Sprite's Spark
desc: You can fling a portion of your magic at foes.

name: Squawk!
desc: You let out an awkward squawk, ruffle your feathers, or fake some other birdlike tic to cover up a social misstep or faux pas.

name: Star Orb
desc: Your magic has crystallized into a spherical stone.

name: Startling Appearance (Fleshwarp)
desc: Your appearance is enough to frighten without words.

name: Steady Balance
desc: Maintain your balance in adverse conditions.

name: Steady on Stone
desc: Your connection to the earth makes natural uneven surfaces less of a hindrance for you.

name: Stone Face
desc: Through conditioning or experience, you've mastered the art of composure, even in the face of fear.

name: Stonecunning
desc: You have a knack for noticing even small inconsistencies and craftsmanship techniques in the stonework around you.

name: Storm Born
desc: You are at home out in the elements, reveling in the power of nature unleashed.

name: Storm's Lash
desc: Wind and lightning have always been close friends to you.

name: Stormsoul
desc: Your elemental ancestor's influence manifests in you as tumultuous, thundering storms, with dark clouds and bolts of lightning.

name: Story Crooner
desc: You're a talented story weaver and use your voice effectively.

name: Straveika
desc: You descend from one of the truly ancient vampires, a nosferatu cursed to eternal life but not eternal youth.

name: Streetwise
desc: Use Society to Gather Information and Recall Knowledge.

name: Striking Retribution
desc: You have an appropriately intense hatred for alghollthus.

name: Strix Defender
desc: Your ancestral feud with humans gives you experience dealing with vicious foes, and your vengeance knows no bounds.

name: Strix Lore
desc: You're well connected to your tribe and perhaps even strix communities beyond your own, where you've learned about the land and techniques of graceful movement.

name: Student of the Canon
desc: More accurately recognize the tenets of your faith or philosophy.

name: Studious Magic
desc: You've taken an interest in anadi arcane traditions.

name: Stumbling Stance
desc: You enter a seemingly unfocused stance that mimics the movements of the inebriated—bobbing, weaving, leaving false openings, and distracting your enemies from your true movements.

name: Subtle Delivery
desc: You can capably deliver toxins with a blowgun.

name: Subtle Theft
desc: Your thefts are harder to notice.

name: Sudden Charge
desc: With a quick sprint, you dash up to your foe and swing.

name: Suli-Jann
desc: Your elemental ancestor was a janni, genies that walk the mortal world and embody all four elements together.

name: Sure Feet
desc: Whether keeping your balance or scrambling up a tricky climb, your hairy, calloused feet easily find purchase.

name: Surface Culture
desc: Your interactions with other cultures on the surface have not only taught you about many other ancestries, but have also helped you realize the value of your own.

name: Surface Skimmer
desc: By sinking gently beneath the waves, you obscure your presence and utilize the water as a barrier between you and land combatants.

name: Survey Wildlife
desc: Identify nearby creatures through signs and clues.

name: Svetocher
desc: You were born to one of the moroi, the most common vampires, and you share their supernatural fortitude and power of persuasion.

name: Swift
desc: You move with the wind always at your back.

name: Syncretism
desc: You have come to see the overlap between two deities’ teachings

name: Tail Whip
desc: By birth or through training, your tail is strong enough to make for a powerful melee weapon.

name: Takedown Expert
desc: You've mastered combat practices that let you get up close and bring down perpetrators alive.

name: Tengu Lore
desc: You learned skills for surviving in the place where your people were dispersed.

name: Tengu Weapon Familiarity
desc: You've trained with a blade and other tengu weapons ever since you hatched.

name: Terrain Expertise
desc: +1 to Survival checks in certain terrain.

name: Terrain Stalker
desc: Sneak in certain terrain without attempting a check.

name: That's Odd
desc: When you enter a new location, such as a room or corridor, you immediately notice one thing out of the ordinary.

name: Theoretical Acumen
desc: You study a creature’s form and behavior to hypothesize likely means of overcoming its strengths.

name: Tide-Hardened
desc: You're at home in the unpredictable tides.

name: Tiger Stance
desc: You enter the stance of a tiger and can make tiger claw attacks.

name: Tinkering Fingers
desc: You're good with your hands and can quickly improvise a fix for broken or damaged equipment.

name: Titan Slinger
desc: You have learned how to use your sling to fell enormous creatures.

name: Titan Wrestler
desc: Disarm, Grapple, Shove, or Trip larger creatures.

name: Toughness
desc: Increase your maximum HP and reduce the DCs of recovery checks.

name: Train Animal
desc: Teach an animal a trick.

name: Trap Finder
desc: You have an intuitive sense that alerts you to the dangers and presence of traps.

name: Trick Magic Item
prerequisites: trained in Arcana, trained in Nature, trained in Occultism, or trained in Religion
desc: Activate a magic item you normally can't activate.

name: Tumble Behind (Rogue)
desc: You tumble under and behind your foe to catch them off guard.

name: Tupilaq Carver
prerequisites: You have a spellcasting class feature with the divine or primal tradition
desc: You know the truth behind old stories that tell of sending a fetish of bone and sinew to seek vengeance.

name: Tusks
desc: You have particularly long, jagged tusks perfect for tearing meat from bone.

name: Twin Feint
desc: You make a dazzling series of attacks with both weapons, using the first attack to throw your foe of guard against a second attack at a different angle.

name: Twin Takedown
desc: You swiftly attack your hunted prey with both weapons.

name: Twitchy
desc: You are naturally suspicious and wary of danger, especially when you suspect someone might be leading you into an ambush.

name: Unassuming Dedication
desc: Your family instilled the values of care and patience into you from a young age.

name: Unburdened Iron
desc: You’ve learned techniques first devised by your ancestors during their ancient wars, allowing you to comfortably wear massive suits of armor.

name: Uncanny Agility
desc: You have near-supernatural poise that lets you move swiftly across the most unsteady surfaces.

name: Unconventional Weaponry
desc: You’ve familiarized yourself with a particular weapon, potentially from another ancestry or culture.

name: Undaunted
desc: Your spirit has endured many challenges over its long existence, and you are certain you can overcome whatever hardships life throws your way.

name: Underwater Marauder
desc: Fight more effectively underwater.

name: Underworld Investigator
desc: Your work as an investigator makes you familiar with the criminal element.

name: Unexpected Shift
desc: Your supernatural connection sometimes causes you to phase from reality when under threat, disappearing for split seconds before reappearing—often surprising you as much as your enemies.

name: Unfettered Halfling
desc: You were forced into service as a laborer, but you’ve since escaped and have trained to ensure you’ll never be caught again.

name: Unimpeded Step
desc: With a burst of divine liberation, your spur your ally’s movement.

name: Unwavering Mien
desc: Your mystic control and meditations allow you to resist external influences upon your consciousness.

name: Vampire Lore
desc: You were raised by your vampiric parent, or you've invested substantial time and energy researching the secrets of your undead progenitors.

name: Vanth's Weapon Familiarity
desc: You seek to emulate vanth reapers' fighting styles.

name: Veil May
desc: Born of a blood hag, a fiery blood drinker hidden behind a false skin, you have one blood-red eye and the ability to slough off your appearance in an instant.

name: Vengeful Hatred
desc: You heart aches for vengeance against those who have wronged your people.

name: Verdant Weapon
desc: You cultivate a seed that can sprout into a wooden staff, vine whip, or another weapon.

name: Versatile Performance
desc: You can rely on the grandeur of your performances rather than ordinary social skills.

name: Very Sneaky
desc: Taller folk rarely pay attention to the shadows at their feet, and you take full advantage of this.

name: Vestigal Wings
desc: You possess small, weak wings that aid in balance.

name: Vibrant Display
desc: Whereas most gnomes’ coloration is static or changes slowly, you can cause your hair, eye, and skin color to scintillate in brief and disorienting bursts.

name: Vicious Incisors
desc: You've let your incisors grow long enough to serve as formidable weapons.

name: Vicious Vengeance
desc: While your vengeance is painful for both you and your foe, none can doubt that your enemies suffer more.

name: Vigorous Health
desc: Your physique is robust and can withstand blood loss startlingly well.

name: Viking Shieldbearer
desc: You trained with shields and weapons as soon as you were old enough to hold them, eager to win honor and glory for yourself.

name: Vile Desecration
desc: You combine unholy might with negative energy to damage angels, archons, and other self-righteous denizens of the Outer Planes.

name: Virga May
desc: Born of a storm hag, you have one crystal-blue or rain-gray eye.

name: Virtuosic Performer
desc: +1 with a certain type of performance.

name: Voice of the Night
desc: You hear and understand the words of creatures you share the darkness with.

name: Warren Friend
desc: You're adept at making contact with other ysoki.

name: Warren Navigator
desc: You're particularly good at solving mazes and navigating twists and turns.

name: Watchful Gaze
desc: You use your many eyes to look in all directions at once, making you extremely observant for a short period of time.

name: Watchful Halfling
desc: Your communal lifestyle causes you to pay close attention to the people around you.

name: Waxed Feathers
desc: Your feathers are coated in a waxy substance that repels water.

name: Weapon Proficiency
desc: Become trained in a weapon type.

name: Web Walker
desc: You have plenty of practice navigating webs.

name: Web Weaver
desc: You can produce a soft silk to weave into useful items.

name: Weight of Guilt
desc: Guilt clouds the minds of those who ignore your Glimpse of Redemption.

name: Well-Met Traveler
desc: You have seen people from so many walks of life in your travels that you naturally adopt a pleasant and affable demeanor when meeting others.

name: Well-Versed
desc: You're resilient to performative influences that aren't your own.

name: Widen Spell
desc: You manipulate the energy of your spell, causing it to spread out and affect a wider area.

name: Wild Shape
desc: You are one with the wild, always changing and adapting to meet any challenge.

name: Wildborn Magic
desc: You have learned to access the old magic of wild places.

name: Willing Death
desc: Once, you died because you valued someone else's life above your own; just as then, you protect an ally by suffering in their stead.

name: Wind Tempered
desc: You are at home in tempestuous weather and accustomed to even the harshest winds.

name: Winter Cat Senses
desc: Your eyes are keen and accustomed to winter conditions.

name: Witch Warden
desc: You and your family have fought long and hard against witches, particularly the winter witches of Irrisen, and you’ve learned to be wary of their curses and the otherworldly powers their patrons grant.

name: Wolf Stance
desc: You enter the stance of a wolf, low to the ground with your hands held like fanged teeth.

name: Woodcraft
desc: You have a innate familiarity with forested areas.

name: Wortwitch
desc: You have a particular affinity for leafy plants.

name: You're Next
desc: After downing a foe, you menacingly remind another foe that you’re coming after them next.

name: Acrobat Dedication
desc: You become an expert in Acrobatics.

name: Acute Scent
desc: When you Rage, your sense of smell improves.

name: After You
desc: You allow your foes to make the first move in a show of incredible confidence.

name: Aggressive Block
desc: You push back as you block the attack, knocking your foe away or off balance.

name: Alchemist Dedication
desc: Become a multiclass alchemist.

name: Aldori Duelist Dedication
desc: Increase your dedication and training to the Aldori dueling sword.

name: Ancestral Weaponry
prerequisites: Monastic Weaponry; a feat granting access to all weapons with an ancestry trait (such as elf or orc)
desc: You blend monastic techniques with the ancestral fighting styles of your people.

name: Animal Trainer Dedication
source: Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God
desc: You gain a young animal companion.

name: Anoint Ally
desc: You forge a mystical connection with an ally using your body as a focus, allowing them to benefit from your magic.

name: Antagonize
desc: Your taunts and threats earn your foes ire.

name: Archaeologist Dedication
prerequisites: trained in Perception; trained in Society and Thievery
desc: You are a student of peoples and their histories, and are in constant pursuit of knowledge and artifacts from the past.

name: Archer Dedication
desc: You become trained in all simple and martial weapons in the bow weapon group.

name: Armored Stealth
desc: Reduce the Stealth penalty of your armor.

name: Assassin Dedication
prerequisites: Alchemical Crafting; trained in Crafting, Deception, and Stealth
desc: You've trained to assassinate your foes, and you do so with tenacity and precision.

name: Assisting Shot
desc: With a quick shot, you interfere with a foe in combat.

name: Assured Identification
prerequisites: expert in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
desc: Avoid misidentifying magic.

name: Athletic Strategist
desc: You know how to calculatedly manipulate joints and body weight.

name: Automatic Knowledge
prerequisites: expert in a skill with the Recall Knowledge action; Assurance in that skill
desc: Recall Knowledge as a free action once per round.

name: Backup Disguise
desc: You have a specific disguise that you keep at the ready, worn underneath your outer garment.

name: Barbarian Dedication
desc: Become a multiclass barbarian.

name: Bard Dedication
desc: Become a multiclass bard.

name: Bashing Charge
desc: You smash, bust, and charge through solid obstacles without hesitation.

name: Basic Lesson
desc: Your patron grants you a special lesson, revealing a hidden facet of its nature.

name: Bastion Dedication
desc: You are particularly skilled at using a shield in combat.

name: Battle Planner
desc: Make a battle plan and roll Warfare Lore for initiative.

name: Beastmaster Dedication
desc: You gain the service of a young animal companion that travels with you and obeys your commands.

name: Blessed One Dedication
desc: You are touched by a deity and gifted with the ability to alleviate the suffering of others.

name: Bonded Animal
desc: An animal becomes permanently helpful to you.

name: Bounty Hunter Dedication
desc: When focused on finding your quarry, you're relentless.

name: Brawling Focus
desc: You know how to make the most of your attacks when fighting hand-to-hand.

name: Bright Lion Dedication
prerequisites: member of the Bright Lions; not a worshipper of Walkena; trained in Stealth
desc: You are one of the Bright Lions, part revolutionary warrior, part undercover spy.

name: Brutal Beating
desc: The brutality of your critical hits shakes your foes’ confidence.

name: Brutish Shove
desc: Throwing your weight behind your attack, you hit you opponent hard enough to make it stumble back.

name: Call of the Wild
desc: You call upon the creatures of nature to come to your aid.

name: Cantrip Expansion
desc: Study broadens your range of simple spells.

name: Cavalier Dedication
desc: You gain a young animal companion that serves as your mount.

name: Celebrity Dedication
desc: The more people you have looking at you, the more content you are.

name: Champion Dedication
desc: You become a multiclass champion.

name: Charmed Life
desc: When danger calls, you have a strange knack for coming out on top.

name: Cleric Dedication
desc: You become a multiclass cleric.

name: Clever Gambit
desc: Your battle tactics are aided by your assessment of your foes' capabilities, allowing you to instantly adjust your movements to maximum advantage.

name: Combat Grab
desc: You swipe at your opponent and grab at them.

name: Communal Healing
desc: You’re a conduit for positive energy, and as you channel it through you, it heals some of your minor injuries.

name: Conceal Spell
desc: Hiding your gestures and incantations within other speech and movement, you attempt to conceal the fact that you are casting a spell.

name: Conceited Mindset
desc: Because you know your mind is superior, you scoff at anyone who would alter your mental state—but this hubris gets the better of you when you're wrong.

name: Confabulator
desc: Reduce the bonuses against your repeated lies.

name: Connections
desc: Leverage your connections for favors and meetings.

name: Continual Recovery
desc: Treat Wounds on a patient more often.

name: Criminal Connections
desc: Leverage your underworld connections for favors from criminals.

name: Crushing Grab
desc: Like a powerful constrictor, you crush targets in your unyielding grasp.

name: Dancing Leaf
desc: You are as light as a leaf whirling in the breeze.

name: Dandy Dedication
desc: You are a consummate student of dignity, etiquette, and fashion.

name: Demolition Charge
desc: You can rig your bombs to inanimate objects in order to cause destruction to the surrounding area.

name: Directed Audience
desc: You can shape the area of your composition spells.

name: Discreet Inquiry
desc: Gather Information without revealing your motive.

name: Distracting Feint
desc: Your Feints are far more distracting than normal, drawing your foes’ attention and allowing you and your allies to take greater advantage.

name: Distracting Performance
desc: Create a Diversion for an ally.

name: Divine Aegis
desc: You summon divine energy to shield yourself, offering protection against other traditions but leaving you exposed to other divine effects.

name: Divine Grace
desc: You call upon your deity’s grace.

name: Domain Acumen
desc: Every oracle's mystery touches on a divine domain of the deities that fuel it; you can access that power.

name: Dragging Strike
desc: You aim your weapon to snag a foe's armor, clothing, or flesh to pull them closer.

name: Dragon Disciple Dedication
desc: You choose to study or worship one type of dragon, and your focus grants you a measure of its power.

name: Dragonslayer Oath
desc: You’ve sworn to slay evil dragons.

name: Drow Shootist Dedication
desc: Every chance you get, you practice with the hand crossbow to increase your draw speed and accuracy.

name: Druid Dedication
desc: You become a multiclass druid.

name: Dual-Weapon Warrior Dedication
desc: You're exceptional in your use of two weapons.

name: Dueling Parry (Fighter)
desc: You can parry attacks against you with your one-handed weapon.

name: Duelist Dedication
prerequisites: trained in light armor and simple weapons
desc: You are always ready to draw your weapon and begin a duel, no matter the circumstances.

name: Edgewatch Detective Dedication
source: Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace
desc: You're a specially trained detective for the Edgewatch guard precinct in Absalom.

name: Eldritch Researcher Dedication
desc: An eager student of occult lore, you enjoy reading rare or forgotten tomes with ancient rituals and hidden secrets.

name: Elemental Fist
desc: You call upon the power of the elements, infusing your ki with elemental energy and allowing your attacks to deal energy damage.

name: Emblazon Armament
desc: Carefully etching a sacred image into a physical object, you steel yourself for battle.

name: Encouraging Words
desc: You give an ally a quick pep talk, helping them recover.

name: Energy Ablation
desc: When you cast energy spells, you retain some of that energy as a protective barrier.

name: Enhanced Familiar
desc: You infuse your familiar with additional primal energy, increasing its abilities.

name: Entreat with Forebears
prerequisites: a bloodline that corresponds with a creature trait
desc: Something about your presence causes creatures of your bloodline to, consciously or not, recognize you as one of their own, and you become inured to their tricks.

name: Esoteric Oath
desc: You've sworn an oath to slay the alien abominations that lurk in the remote corners of Golarion.

name: Esoteric Polymath
desc: You keep a book of occult spells, similar to a wizard’s spellbook.

name: Exhort the Faithful
prerequisites: follower of a specific religion; expert in Religion
desc: +2 to Request something of or Coerce members of your own faith.

name: Eye of the Arclords
desc: The Arclords of Nex have achieved a unique mastery of magic.

name: Familiar Master Dedication
desc: You have forged a mystical bond with a creature.

name: Familiar's Language
desc: You've learned to speak with your familiar and other creatures like it.

name: Fane's Fourberie
desc: Stella Fane has perfected a technique for using playing cards as weapons that's one part sleight of hand and one part magic.

name: Favored Terrain
desc: You have studied a specific terrain to overcome its challenges.

name: Fiendsbane Oath
desc: You’ve sworn an oath to banish the corruption of fiends to the dark planes they call home.

name: Fighter Dedication
desc: You become trained in simple weapons and martial weapons.

name: Finishing Follow-Through
desc: Finishing a foe maintains your swagger.

name: Fresh Ingredients
desc: When using Natural Medicine to Treat Wounds, you can spend a batch of herbs to gain the +2 circumstance bonus from having fresh ingredients, even if not in wilderness.

name: Furious Finish
desc: Desperate to finish the fight, you pour all your rage into one final blow.

name: Ghost Eater Dedication
prerequisites: trained in Occultism or trained in Religion
desc: You have trained as a ghost eater, a hunter specialized in the destruction of spirits.

name: Ghost Hunter Dedication
desc: You have focused your training on hunting and defeating ghosts, spirits, and all manner of haunts.

name: Glad-Hand
desc: Make an Impression on a target you've just met.

name: Gladiator Dedication
desc: You know how to turn combat into a form of entertainment.

name: Godless Healing
prerequisites: Battle Medicine; can't have a patron deity
desc: With limited access to divine healing magic, Rahadoumi often become adept at using ordinary medicine for when dangerous situations arise.

name: Hellknight Armiger Dedication
prerequisites: member of a Hellknight Order; trained in heavy armor as well as your order's favored weapon
desc: You have taken the first step to being a full Hellknight.

name: Herbalist Dedication
desc: You can create remedies and other herbal products.

name: Horizon Walker Dedication
desc: You've mastered travel within a specific type of terrain.

name: Hunter's Aim
desc: When you focus on aiming, your attack becomes particularly accurate.

name: Inspire Competence
desc: You learn to aid your allies’ skills with your performance.

name: Intimidating Prowess
desc: Gain a bonus to physically Demoralize a target.

name: Intimidating Strike
desc: Your blow not only wounds creatures but also shatters their confidence.

name: Investigator Dedication
desc: You gain the on the case class feature, which grants you both the Pursue a Lead activity and Clue In reaction.

name: Juggle
source: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
desc: You can Juggle items and still use your hands between tosses.

name: Juggler Dedication
source: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
desc: You become trained in Performance and gain the Juggle skill feat

name: Lasting Coercion
desc: Coerce a target into helping you longer.

name: Lastwall Sentry Dedication
prerequisites: member of the Knights of Lastwall; Shield Block
desc: Swear yourself as a sentry for the Knights of Lastwall.

name: Lead Climber
desc: Make Climbing safer for allies who Follow the Expert.

name: Lightslayer Oath
desc: You've sworn to rid the world of the self-righteousness of celestial beings.

name: Linguist Dedication
prerequisites: you speak at least three languages
desc: You have studied languages and their development.

name: Lion Blade Dedication
prerequisites: member of the Lion Blades; trained in Performance
desc: You are a Lion Blade, an elite spy in the service of Taldor.

name: Living Hair
desc: You can instantly grow or shrink your hair, eyebrows, beard, or mustache by up to several feet and manipulate your hair for use as a weapon, though your control isn't fine enough for more dexterous tasks.

name: Living Monolith Dedication
prerequisites: Ancient Osiriani and Sphinx languages; trained in Crafting
desc: Begin to process to become a living monolith.

name: Loremaster Dedication
prerequisites: trained in at least one skill to Decipher Writing
desc: You've compiled a vast repository of information that touches on nearly every subject.

name: Loremaster's Etude
desc: You magically unlock memories, making them easier to recall.

name: Lunge
desc: Extending your body to its limits, you attack an enemy that would normally be beyond your reach.

name: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication
prerequisites: member of the Magaambya of attendant rank; trained in Arcana or Nature
desc: You devote much of your study to halcyon magic.

name: Magic Hide
desc: You can defend your companion in battle.

name: Magic Warrior Dedication
desc: You have taken up a nameless mask and sworn the oath of the magic warriors.

name: Magical Crafting
desc: Craft magic items.

name: Magical Shorthand
prerequisites: expert in Arcana, Nature, expert in Occultism, or Religion
desc: Learn spells quickly and at a reduced cost.

name: Marshal Dedication
prerequisites: trained in martial weapons; trained in Diplomacy or Intimidation
desc: You've combined your social skills and combat training to become a talented combat leader.

name: Martial Artist Dedication
desc: You have trained to use your fists as deadly weapons.

name: Mauler Dedication
desc: You specialize in weapons that require two hands.

name: Medic Dedication
desc: You become an expert in Medicine.

name: Minor Magic
desc: You’ve dabbled in a variety of tricks, gaining minor magical abilities from a particular tradition.

name: Mobility
desc: You move in a way that denies your enemies the opportunity to retaliate.

name: Monk Dedication
desc: You become a multiclass monk.

name: Monster Warden
desc: You understand how to defend yourself and others against your prey.

name: Mortal Healing
prerequisites: Godless Healing, you follow the Laws of Mortality
desc: You grant greater healing when the gods don’t interfere

name: Multifarious Muse
desc: Your muse doesn’t fall into a single label.

name: Nimble Crawl
desc: Crawl at a faster rate.

name: No Escape
desc: You keep pace with a retreating foe.

name: Nonlethal Spell
desc: You can alter offensive spells to be less deadly.

name: Oozemorph Dedication
desc: You are plagued by sporadic anatomical rearrangements, which grant you insights into other creatures with unusual anatomies.

name: Oracle Dedication
desc: Choose an oracle mystery.

name: Order Explorer
desc: You have learned the secrets of another druidic order.

name: Pathfinder Agent Dedication
desc: You're a field agent of the globe-trotting Pathfinder Society.

name: Pirate Dedication
desc: As a pirate, you sail the seas in search of enemy ships to plunder.

name: Poison Resistance
desc: Repeated exposure to toxic reagents has fortified your body against poisons of all kinds.

name: Poisoner Dedication
desc: You make a point of always having a few toxins near at hand—you never know when some arsenic or the like might prove useful.

name: Powerful Leap
desc: Jump farther and higher.

name: Quick Contacts
prerequisites: Connections or Underworld Connections; expert in Society
desc: Spend only 1 day to use Connections or Underworld Connections.

name: Quick Disguise
desc: Set up a disguise in only half the time.

name: Quick Draw
desc: You draw your weapon and attack with the same motion.

name: Quiet Allies
desc: Roll a single Stealth check when sneaking with allies.

name: Ranger Dedication
desc: You become a multiclass ranger.

name: Rapid Mantel
desc: Pull yourself onto ledges quickly.

name: Rapid Response
desc: You work quickly and efficiently in times of danger to deliver needed assistance.

name: Rebounding Toss
desc: You bounce your weapon off one foe to strike another.

name: Red Herring
desc: You have a keen sense for avoiding spurious lines of inquiry.

name: Red Mantis Assassin Dedication
prerequisites: trained in sawtooth sabers; worshipper of Achaekek; lawful evil alignment; member of the Red Mantis assassins
desc: Dedicate yourself to the assassins of Achaekek.

name: Relentless Stalker
desc: Stay adjacent to your prey when they attempt to move away.

name: Revivifying Mutagen
desc: While under the effect of a mutagen, you can metabolize that mutagen’s power to heal yourself.

name: Robust Recovery
desc: Greater benefits from Treat Disease and Treat Poison.

name: Rogue Dedication
desc: You become a multiclass rogue.

name: Runescarred Dedication
desc: Overwhelming magic has branded your body with powerful runes.

name: Sap Life
desc: You draw the life force out of your enemies to heal your own wounds.

name: Scout Dedication
desc: You are a highly skilled scout, capable of providing your allies a timely warning of any danger.

name: Scroll Trickster Dedication
prerequisites: trained in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
desc: You've studied scrolls in depth.

name: Scrounger Dedication
desc: You can Craft items even without appropriate tools or a workshop, though you take a –2 item penalty to your Crafting check.

name: Second Wind
desc: You can enter a second rage, but afterward you need to catch your breath.

name: Sentinel Dedication
desc: You have trained carefully to maximize the protective qualities of your armor.

name: Shadow Mark
desc: Targets you’re following take a penalty to notice you.

name: Shake it Off
desc: You concentrate on your rage, overcoming fear and fighting back sickness.

name: Shared Stratagem
desc: The plans you make include your allies as well as yourself.

name: Shining Oath
desc: You’ve sworn an oath to put the undead to rest.

name: Shooting Stars Stance
desc: You enter a stance that lets you throw shuriken with lightning speed.

name: Smoke Bomb
desc: You cause the bomb to create a cloud of thick smoke, in addition to its normal effects.

name: Snare Hopping
desc: You can magically move your snares around.

name: Snarecrafter Dedication
desc: You've learned to create a limited number of snares at no cost.

name: Solid Lead
desc: Sometimes your case splinters into smaller mysteries, but you never lose sight of the big picture.

name: Song of Strength
desc: Your performances inspire strength in your allies.

name: Sorcerer Dedication
desc: You become a multiclass sorcerer.

name: Sow Rumor
desc: You spread rumors, which may or may not be true, about a specific subject.

name: Staff Acrobat Dedication
source: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
prerequisites: trained with at least one of the following weapons: staff, bo staff, halfling sling staff, or any weapon in the spear or polearm group (referred to in this archetype as “your staff”); Dexterity 16; trained in Acrobatics and Athletics
desc: Gain bonuses when using your staff as an implement to aid Acrobatics and Athletics actions.

name: Strong Arm
desc: When you Strike with a thrown weapon, the weapon's range increment increases 10 feet.

name: Student of Perfection Dedication
prerequisites: powerful fist or expert in unarmed attacks; member of a House of Perfection
desc: You have joined one of the Houses of Perfection.

name: Stunning Fist
desc: The focused power of your flurry threatens to overwhelm your opponent.

name: Swashbuckler Dedication
desc: Choose a swashbuckler style.

name: Talisman Dabbler Dedication
desc: You are trained in the use of talismans and similar magical paraphernalia.

name: Terrifying Resistance
desc: +1 to spell saves from a creature you’ve Demoralized.

name: Tumble Behind (Swashbuckler)
desc: Your tumbling catches your foe off guard.

name: Turn Undead
desc: Undead harmed by your positive energy might flee, compelled by an innate aversion to the force opposite undeath.

name: Turpin Rowe Lumberjack Dedication
desc: Your logging training has made you intimately familiar with all aspects of forestry.

name: Tweak Appearances
desc: You can alter a creature's clothing to improve their social impact.

name: Unbalancing Blow
desc: Interweaving your most powerful attacks in a graceful flow, you temporarily unbalance your foes. Whenever your Strike is a critical hit and deals damage, the target is flat-footed against your attacks until the end of your next turn.

name: Unbalancing Finisher
desc: You attack with a flashy assault that leaves your target off balance.

name: Underground Network
desc: Gather Information without drawing attention and gain a bonus to Recall Knowledge about that subject.

name: Underhanded Assault
desc: You capitalize on the distraction provided by an ally.

name: Unmistakable Lore
desc: Recall Knowledge about your Lore more effectively.

name: Vengeful Oath
desc: You’ve sworn an oath to hunt down wicked evildoers and bring them to judgment.

name: Versatile Font
prerequisites: harmful font or healing font; deity that allows clerics to have both fonts
desc: As you explore your deity’s aspects, you move beyond restrictions on healing or harming.

name: Vigilante Dedication
desc: You have two identities, each with its own name, alignment, and abilities.

name: Viking Dedication
