desc: Vikings spend long periods of time at sea, only to leap from their boats at a moment's notice, charge through the surf, and take their enemies by storm.

name: Ward Medic
desc: Treat several patients at once.

name: Wary Disarmament
desc: +2 to AC or saves against devices or traps you trigger while disarming.

name: Weapon Improviser Dedication
desc: You don't take the normal –2 penalty to attack rolls with improvised weapons.

name: Wild Empathy
desc: You have a connection to the creatures of the natural world.

name: Wilderness Spotter
desc: Use Survival for your Initiative when in a specific terrain.

name: Witch Dedication
desc: You cast spells like a witch.

name: Wizard Dedication
desc: You become a multiclass wizard

name: Zephyr Guard Dedication
desc: As a Zephyr Guard, you’re always vigilant against crime and threats to the city’s safety.

name: Additional Circus Trick
source: Come One, Come All, to the Extinction Curse Player’s Guide!
prerequisites: You must have a signature trick
desc: You gain an additional signature trick.

name: Ancestral Paragon
desc: Gain a 1st-level ancestry feat.

name: Hireling Manager
desc: Hirelings gain +2 to skill checks.

name: Improvised Repair
desc: Quickly patch a broken item.

name: Keen Follower
desc: Improve bonuses when you Follow the Expert.

name: Know the Beat
desc: You have been trained to investigate crimes.

name: Pick up the Pace
desc: Your group can Hustle for up to 20 minutes longer.

name: Prescient Planner
desc: Procure a piece of adventuring gear.

name: Skitter
desc: Crawl up to half your Speed.

name: Steel Your Resolve
desc: Regain Stamina Points equal to half your maximum.

name: Thorough Search
desc: +2 to Perception when you spend twice as long Searching.

name: Untrained Improvisation
desc: Become more adept at using untrained skills.

name: Accelerating Touch
desc: Your healing energies are infused with bounding energy.

name: Acclimatization
desc: Your time spent in the hostile parts of the world has inured you to extreme climates.

name: Additional Companion
desc: Another animal joins you in your travels.

name: Alchemical Discoveries
desc: You've devoted extra time in the lab to improve your knowledge of alchemy.

name: Aldori Parry
desc: Increase your AC while wielding an Aldori dueling sword.

name: Animal Feature
desc: You are so connected with the animal world that you can grant yourself an animal's features and abilities.

name: Arcane Evolution
desc: Your arcane legacy grants you an exceptional aptitude for intellectual and academic pursuits.

name: Arcane School Spell
desc: Select one arcane school of magic.

name: Ardent Armiger
desc: You have been trained to resist the manipulations of fiends.

name: Aura of Courage
desc: You stand strong in the face of danger and inspire your allies to do the same.

name: Aura of Despair
desc: Your presence as an avatar of evil makes your foes more susceptible to terror and makes it almost impossible for them to shake off fear when you are near.

name: Axe Climber
desc: You can climb wooden surfaces using axes.

name: Barbarian Resiliency
prerequisites: Barbarian Dedication; class granting no more Hit Points per level than 10 + your Constitution modifier
desc: You gain 3 additional Hit Points for each barbarian archetype class feat you have.

name: Barreling Charge
desc: You rush forward, moving enemies aside to reach your foe.

name: Basic Arcana
desc: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level wizard feat of your choice.

name: Basic Bard Spellcasting
desc: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits for bard spellcasting.

name: Basic Blood Potency
desc: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level sorcerer feat.

name: Basic Bloodline Spell
desc: You gain your bloodline's initial bloodline spell.

name: Basic Cleric Spellcasting
desc: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits of cleric spellcasting.

name: Basic Concoction
desc: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level alchemist feat.

name: Basic Deduction
desc: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level investigator feat of your choice.

name: Basic Devotion
desc: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level champion feat.

name: Basic Dogma
desc: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level cleric feat.

name: Basic Druid Spellcasting
desc: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits for druid spellcasting.

name: Basic Flair
desc: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level swashbuckler feat of your choice.

name: Basic Fury
desc: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level barbarian feat.

name: Basic Hunter's Trick
desc: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level ranger feat.

name: Basic Kata
desc: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level monk feat.

name: Basic Maneuver
desc: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level fighter feat.

name: Basic Muse's Whispers
desc: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level bard feat.

name: Basic Mysteries
desc: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level oracle feat of your choice.

name: Basic Oracle Spellcasting
desc: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits.

name: Basic Red Mantis Magic
prerequisites: Red Mantis Assassin Dedication; trained in Religion
desc: You have learned limited divine magic from your Red Mantis training.

name: Basic Sorcerer Spellcasting
desc: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits for sorcerer spellcasting.

name: Basic Trickery
desc: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level rogue feat.

name: Basic Wilding
desc: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level druid feat.

name: Basic Witch Spellcasting
desc: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits.

name: Basic Witchcraft
desc: You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level witch feat of your choice.

name: Basic Wizard Spellcasting
desc: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits for wizard spellcasting.

name: Battle Assessment
desc: With careful observation during battle, you identify an enemy’s strengths and weaknesses.

name: Beast Speaker
source: Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God
desc: You can speak with animals.

name: Bespell Weapon
desc: You siphon the residual energy from the last spell you cast into one weapon you’re wielding.

name: Blessed Sacrifice
desc: You gain the protector's sacrifice domain spell as a devotion spell.

name: Bullying Staff
source: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
desc: You can Shove and Trip larger creatures.

name: Butterfly Blade Dedication
desc: You've trained in one of Goka's oldest traditions of espionage, intimidation, and combat mastery.

name: Calculated Splash
desc: You have calculated all the angles to maximize a bomb’s splash.

name: Call Bonded Item
desc: You're mystically connected to your bonded item and can call it to your hand.

name: Careful Explorer
desc: You gain a sixth sense for traps, noticing them even when you're not trying to.

name: Cavalier's Banner
desc: You fly the banner of your pledge from your mount, raising your allies' spirits.

name: Cavalier's Charge
desc: You Command an Animal to order your mount to Stride twice.

name: Champion Resiliency
prerequisites: Champion Dedication; class granting no more Hit Points per level than 8 + your Constitution modifier
desc: You gain 3 additional Hit Points for each champion archetype class feat you have.

name: Channel Smite
desc: You siphon the destructive energies of positive or negative energy through a melee attack and into your foe.

name: Claws of the Dragon
desc: Your fingernails grow into razor-sharp claws, and scales speckle your fingers, hands, and wrists.

name: Cobra Stance
desc: You enter a tight stance, coiled up like a lashing cobra with your hands poised as venomous fangs.

name: Combat Reading
desc: You use a performer's cold reading techniques, aura reading, and other tricks to discover your foe's strengths and weaknesses.

name: Command Undead
desc: You grasp the animating force within an undead creature and bend it to your will.

name: Companion's Cry
desc: You can urge your companion to do its utmost.

name: Contortionist
desc: You can squeeze out of tight situations surprisingly quickly, gaining an advantage against foes that try to pin you down.

name: Courageous Advance
desc: With a rousing call, you exhort an ally to advance.

name: Cruelty
desc: The harm you deal with your corrupting touch saps the strength from your enemy's body.

name: Crystal Keeper Dedication
source: Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City
prerequisites: trained in Elven Lore or Society
desc: You can use Arcana, Occultism, Religion, or Society to Decipher Writing by meditating before a crystal, regardless of the type of writing.

name: Crystal Ward Spells
source: Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City
desc: Your study of crystals and the energies held within a gem’s facets grants you special arcane crystal ward spells.

name: Dead Reckoning
prerequisites: Pathfinder Agent Dedication; trained in Survival
desc: You've trained yourself to maintain a strong sense of direction at all times, even when you can't use a compass or see the sky above.

name: Decry Thief
prerequisites: Zephyr Guard Dedication; trained in Intimidation
desc: When you attempt to Demoralize, you can make it harder for the target to flee, in place of the action’s normal effects.

name: Deflect Arrow
desc: Your reflexes allow you to deflect ranged attacks.

name: Deft Cooperation
desc: You gain a bonus to your own checks when Aiding an ally.

name: Detective's Readiness
desc: When you're on a case, you stay watchful and resolute to avoid tricks your suspect might pull.

name: Diabolic Certitude
desc: Your Hellknight training drilled details of Hell’s denizens deep into your mind.

name: Directed Channel
desc: You can shape the energy you channel in a single direction, reaching farther and in a more directed fashion.

name: Disarming Block
desc: You attempt to Disarm the creature whose attack you blocked of the weapon they attacked you with.

name: Disrupt Prey
desc: Make a melee Strike against your prey.

name: Distracting Flattery
desc: You know how to maintain a good impression and manage your image, even while keeping uncouth company.

name: Disturbing Defense
desc: Your internal organs and blood vessels have shifted and changed, and even you don't know precisely where in your body they are.

name: Divine Access
desc: Your ability to tap into divine magic surpasses the spells traditionally available to you (the divine spell list).

name: Divine Evolution
desc: The divine might provided by your bloodline flows through you.

name: Divine Health
desc: Your faith makes you resistant to disease.

name: Doctor's Visitation
desc: You move to provide immediate care to those who need it.

name: Double Shot
desc: You shoot twice in blindingly fast succession.

name: Draconic Scent
desc: Your sense of smell is uncanny, much like a dragon's.

name: Dragon Arcana
prerequisites: ability to cast spells from spell slots; Dragon Disciple Dedication
desc: You've discovered how to add the magic of dragons to your tradition.

name: Dread Marshal Stance
desc: Putting on a grim face for the battle ahead, you encourage your allies to strike fear into their foes with vicious attacks.

name: Dread Striker
desc: You capitalize on your enemies’ fear to slip past their defenses.

name: Dual Thrower
desc: You know how to throw two weapons as easily as strike with them.

name: Dual-Handed Assault
desc: You snap your free hand over to grip your weapon just long enough to add momentum and deliver a more powerful blow to your opponent.

name: Dual-Weapon Reload
desc: You carry your ammunition in a way that allows you to reload while holding two weapons.

name: Duelist's Challenge
desc: Select one foe that you can see and proclaim a challenge.

name: Duelist's Edge
desc: Increase your initiative with the dueling sword.

name: Efficient Alchemy (Alchemist)
desc: Thanks to the time you’ve spent studying and experimenting, you know how to scale your formulas into larger batches that don’t require any additional attention.

name: Elaborate Flourish
desc: You embellish your spellcasting with entrancing flourishes and grand pronouncements, making it harder to identify or counter.

name: Eldritch Nails
desc: Your nails are supernaturally long and sharp.

name: Elemental Summons
desc: You can call the four elements to you.

name: Enduring Alchemy
desc: You’ve learned how to make your personal energy last just a little bit longer when quickly brewing ad hoc concoctions.

name: Environmental Explorer
desc: You've traversed enough untamed wilderness to gain an intuitive understanding of the dangers that exist in such places.

name: Everstand Strike
desc: Your follow-up blow leaves you an opening to set your shield.

name: Expanded Domain Initiate
desc: You have long venerated one of your deity’s lesser-known aspects

name: Expert Backstabber
desc: When you Strike a flat-footed foe with a weapon that has the backstabber weapon trait, you deal 2 extra precision damage instead of 1.

name: Eye of Ozem
prerequisites: Lastwall Sentry Dedication; expert in Perception
desc: Learn how to better spot danger at a distance.

name: Familiar Conduit
prerequisites: Familiar Master Dedication; able to cast spells
desc: Under your tutelage, your familiar has grown attuned to the hidden currents of the world and can serve as a conduit for your magic.

name: Familiar Mascot
desc: Your familiar is the heart and soul of your adventuring team.

name: Fancy Moves
desc: You show off your fighting style to discourage your foes.

name: Fane's Escape
desc: A good getaway requires a good distraction.

name: Far Shot
desc: Your experience in the field has taught you how to focus your aim at a distance.

name: Farabellus Flip
prerequisites: trained in medium armor; trained in Acrobatics
desc: Surprisingly agile even in a breastplate and carrying a full rucksack, Marcos Farabellus developed this evasive maneuver during one of his many adventures.

name: Fast Movement
desc: Your rage is a frenzy of rapid movements.

name: Favored Enemy
desc: You have studied a specific type of wild creature and can hunt it more easily.

name: Fighter Resiliency
prerequisites: Fighter Dedication; class granting no more Hit Points per level than 8 + your Constitution modifier
desc: You gain 3 additional Hit Points for each fighter archetype class feat you have.

name: Finishing Precision
desc: You've learned how to land daring blows when you have panache.

name: Firebrand Braggart Dedication
prerequisites: second mark member of the Firebrands; Charisma 14
desc: Your Firebrand training has taught you that achieving something is more satisfying if you boast about it first.

name: First Revelation
desc: You gain your mystery's initial revelation spell.

name: Flamboyant Athlete
desc: Your panache allows you to perform incredible feats: climbing, swimming, and leaping far beyond your normal capacity.

name: Flurry of Maneuvers
desc: You flurry is a combination of maneuvers.

name: Flying Kick
desc: You launch yourself at a foe.

name: Focused Juggler
source: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
desc: You continue Juggling until the end of your next turn.

name: Form Control
desc: With additional care and effort, you can take on an alternate form for a longer period of time.

name: Gossip Lore
desc: Your time gossiping in fashionable salons keeps you informed on every topic.

name: Grave's Voice
desc: You can influence spirits and haunts

name: Guarded Movement
desc: Your guard is up, even while moving.

name: Guardian's Deflection (Swashbuckler)
desc: You use your weapon to deflect the attack against your ally, granting a +2 circumstance bonus to their AC against the triggering attack.

name: Head Stomp
desc: Make an unarmed melee attack against a prone target.

name: Heal Animal
desc: You can heal your animal companion's wounds.

name: Healing Bomb
desc: By adding a special catalyst, you transform a healing elixir into a topical projectile.

name: Healing Touch
desc: You gain the appropriate devotion spell for your cause.

name: Hidden Magic
prerequisites: Vigilante Dedication; expert in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
desc: You've learned to hide the magical auras of your gear.

name: Hideous Ululation
desc: Your throat has multiple separate chambers that can give your voice an eerie echo.

name: Hunter's Luck
desc: Your recollection of monsters is magically enhanced by luck.

name: Hurling Charge
desc: You make a ranged Strike with a thrown weapon you already have in your hand, Stride, and then Interact to draw another weapon.

name: Impaling Finisher
desc: You stab two foes with a single thrust or bash them together with one punch.

name: Impressive Mount
desc: You've trained your mount to become a powerful force on the battlefield.

name: Improved Communal Healing
desc: You can direct excess channeled energy outward to benefit an ally.

name: Improved Familiar (Witch)
desc: You find it easy to attract a powerful and unusual familiar to your side.

name: Improvised Pummel
desc: You make a Strike with your wielded improvised weapon.

name: Inspire Defense
desc: You learn to protect yourself and your allies with your performance.

name: Inspiring Marshal Stance
desc: You become a brilliant example of dedication and poise in battle, encouraging your allies to follow suit.

name: Investigate Haunting
desc: You are skilled at noticing the telltale signs of ghosts and hauntings.

name: Investigator's Stratagem
desc: You play out battles in your head, allowing you to strike when the time is right.

name: Jalmeri Heavenseeker Dedication
desc: Your skill and dedication have set you on a path to master the techniques of Jalmeray's greatest martial artists.

name: Ka Stone Ritual
prerequisites: Living Monolith Dedication; a sphinx or living monolith with this feat performs a ritual with you
desc: You enchant your ka stone and can use it to wield magic.

name: Knockdown
desc: You make an attack to knock a foe off balance, then follow up immediately with a sweep to topple them.

name: Kreighton's Cognitive Crossover
desc: Kreighton teaches his students that an agile mind can glean clues leading to the truth, even from the most unlikely of sources.

name: Leading Dance
desc: You sweep your foe into your dance.

name: Leshy Familiar Secrets
desc: The leaf order's secrets allow your familiar to take advantage of its leshy form.

name: Lie Detector
desc: You're adept at noticing the tells of a liar—sweat, flushing, a quavering voice, a quickening pulse.

name: Light of Revelation
desc: You’ve learned to call upon light to reveal what is hidden.

name: Linked Focus
desc: You have linked your bonded item to the well of energy that powers your school spells.

name: Log Roll
desc: You shuffle your feet to dislodge the surface beneath you or otherwise cause your opponent to become unsteady.

name: Lost in the Crowd
desc: You’ve learned how to move as one with crowds and hide among them.

name: Magic Warrior Aspect
desc: You can alter your form to gain an aspect of the animal your mask represents.

name: Magic Warrior Transformation
desc: You can transform fully into the animal your mask represents.

name: Magical Edification
desc: You've learned those tidbits of magic that are most conducive to furthering your acquisition and transmission of knowledge.

name: Magical Scholastics
desc: While study is key to your success, a bit of magic is a helpful tool in discovering the secrets of the past.

name: Magical Trickster
desc: You can sneak spells past your foes’ defenses as easily as any blade.

name: Mask Familiar
desc: Your mask takes on a personality of its own, allowing it to serve as your familiar.

name: Mature Animal Companion (Druid)
desc: Your animal companion grows up, becoming a mature animal companion, which grants it additional capabilities.

name: Mature Beastmaster Companion
desc: All of your animal companions grow up, becoming mature animal companions and gaining additional capabilities.

name: Melodious Spell
desc: You subtly weave your spellcasting into your performance.

name: Mercy
desc: Your touch relieves fear and restores movement.

name: Minion Guise
prerequisites: animal companion or familiar; Vigilante Dedication; expert in Deception
desc: When you are in your social identity, you can also grant a social identity to an animal companion, familiar, or other minion.

name: Monk Resiliency
prerequisites: Monk Dedication; class granting no more Hit Points per level than 8 + your Constitution modifier
desc: You gain 3 additional Hit Points for each monk archetype class feat you have.

name: Mortification
desc: Your reckonings have prepared your body for physical punishment.

name: Mug
desc: You make a quick attack and rob your foe in the process.

name: Multilingual Cipher
desc: You use multiple languages to create and break codes.

name: Necromantic Resistance
desc: Gain resistance to necromancy effects and damage.

name: Necrotic Infusion
desc: You pour negative energy into your undead subject to empower its attacks.

name: Never Tire
desc: As long as you have an audience, you can continue to perform.

name: Observant Explorer
desc: You've gained an intuitive sense about creatures.

name: Occult Evolution
desc: Glimpses of the obscure secrets of the universe loan you power.

name: Ongoing Investigation
desc: You're always investigating what's around you, even as you perform other activities.

name: Opportunist
desc: You gain the Attack of Opportunity reaction.

name: Order Magic
desc: You have delved deeper into the teaching of a new order, gaining access to a coveted order spell.

name: Order Spell
desc: You gain the initial order spell from your order.

name: Orthographic Mastery
desc: You understand the principles that underlie all written words, allowing you to read nearly any text.

name: Oversized Throw
desc: With a great heave, you seize a piece of your surroundings, such as a boulder, log, table, wagon, or chunk of earth, and hurl it at your foes.

name: Parting Shot
desc: You jump back and fire a quick shot that catches your opponent off guard.

name: Peafowl Stance
desc: You enter a tall and proud stance while remaining mobile, with all the grace and composure of a peafowl.

name: Perfect Strike
desc: You call upon insight from your training to recover accuracy.

name: Phonetic Training
desc: You can pronounce and repeat words with near-perfect accuracy even if you don't understand their meaning.

name: Pirate Weapon Training
desc: You're particularly skilled at wielding traditional pirate weapons.

name: Play to the Crowd
desc: You show off for the crowd.

name: Poison Weapon
desc: You apply poison to a weapon.

name: Poisoner's Twist
desc: Poisons attack specific parts of the body.

name: Posse
desc: By spending 1 minute giving guidance to help hunt down your prey, you instruct up to five willing creatures to assist you.

name: Poultice Preparation
desc: When you create an herbal elixir, you can prepare it as a poultice instead.

name: Powerful Shove
desc: You can push larger foes around with your attack.

name: Predictable!
desc: By observing an opponent, you can get a sense of their next move and prepare to counter or resist it.

name: Primal Evolution
desc: You can call upon the creatures of the wild for aid.

name: Quick Alchemy
desc: You gain the Quick Alchemy action.

name: Quick Fix
desc: You can attach a talisman using only a bit of glue and some string.

name: Quick Juggler
source: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
desc: When you start to Juggle or add another item to those you are Juggling, you add two items instead of one.

name: Quick Mount
desc: You and your mount can spring into action at a moment's notice.

name: Quick Reversal
desc: You turn your foes’ flanking against them with a quick reverse.

name: Quick Shot
desc: You draw your bow and attack with the same action.

name: Quick Study
desc: During your daily preparations, you can study a particular subject to gain the trained proficiency rank in one Lore skill of your choice.

name: Radiant Infusion
desc: You pour invigorating positive energy into a living ally.

name: Raging Athlete
desc: Physical obstacles can’t hold back your fury.

name: Ranger Resiliency
prerequisites: Ranger Dedication; class granting no more Hit Points per level than 8 + your Constitution modifier
desc: You gain 3 additional Hit Points for each ranger archetype class feat you have.

name: Reach Beyond
desc: You've learned to move your spiritual energy past yourself to attack spirits where others can't.

name: Reactive Pursuit
desc: You keep pace with a retreating foe.

name: Reflexive Catch
source: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
desc: Grab an item thrown at you.

name: Remember Your Training
desc: You were schooled on a wide variety of creatures you might encounter.

name: Repeating Hand Crossbow Training
desc: You become trained in the repeating hand crossbow and gain access to repeating hand crossbows and shootist bandoliers.

name: Rescuer's Press
desc: Any shield you wield gains the shove trait.

name: Reverse Engineering
desc: You are able to reverse engineer items into formulas more effectively than most.

name: Rites of Convocation
desc: Your patron grants you the power to summon other creatures to aid you.

name: Ritual Researcher
desc: Careful research into the art of rituals has made you better at performing them.

name: Ritualist Dedication
prerequisites: expert in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
desc: You have begun to master the difficult art of casting rituals.

name: Rope Runner
prerequisites: Pirate Dedication; trained in Acrobatics and Athletics
desc: You run and climb across ropes and rigging almost as easily as on the ground.

name: Running Reload
desc: You can reload your weapon on the move.

name: Sabotage
desc: You subtly damage others’ equipment.

name: Sacred Ki
prerequisites: Ki Strike; you follow a deity
desc: The power of your faith suffuses your ki

name: Safe House
desc: You establish a safe house—a secure space in which to hide your secrets from the outside world.

name: Scales of the Dragon
desc: Scales grow across your body, protecting you against physical and magical threats.

name: Scalpel's Point
desc: Your stratagems benefit from your precise knowledge of anatomy.

name: Scout's Charge
desc: You meander around unpredictably, and then ambush your opponents without warning.

name: Scout's Warning
desc: You visually or audibly warn your allies of danger.

name: Seeker of Truths
desc: Your devotion to discovering and hoarding abstruse truths borders on the fanatical, and you can bring this devotion to bear.

name: Sense Alignment
source: Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace
desc: You read the body language of an intelligent creature within 30 feet and pick up on subtle cues to detect its general propensity for good or evil and law or chaos.

name: Settlement Scholastics
desc: Your studies open up new horizons.

name: Shielded Stride
desc: When your shield is up, your enemies’ blows can’t touch you.

name: Silent Spell
desc: You’ve learned how to cast many of your spells without speaking the words of power you would normally need to provide.

name: Snap Out of It! (Marshal)
desc: You give a quick shout, hoping to shake the fog clouding your ally's thoughts.

name: Snare Specialist
desc: You specialize in creating quick traps to obstruct your enemies on the battlefield.

name: Sneak Attacker
desc: You gain the sneak attack class feature.

name: Social Purview
desc: You have built a reputation for yourself in your social identity.

name: Soothing Mist
desc: You have a connection to the healing properties of nature and can produce a magical mist to heal damage and stop burning or bleeding.

name: Spell Runes
desc: The magical runes on your body grant you several magical abilities.

name: Spirit Spells
desc: Your ability to confront incorporeal menaces develops into full-fledged spellcasting.

name: Spiritual Explorer
desc: You're familiar with the danger that lingering spirits can pose to an unwary adventurer.

name: Spiritual Guides
desc: Though no one sees them and only you can hear them, the spirits around you constantly chatter, save when you are raging.

name: Split Shot
desc: You fragment a ranged spell into a pair of smaller shots.

name: Spot Translate
desc: You interpret a creature's words, repeating their message in a different language that you know.

name: Stage Fighting
desc: You pull punches to give a better show.

name: Stand Still
desc: You strike out when your foe tries to flee.

name: Steel Skin
desc: You wear your armor like a second skin.

name: Steel Yourself!
desc: You encourage an ally to toughen up, giving them a fighting chance.

name: Strange Script
desc: You have such familiarity with obscure texts that you can compel them to reveal their secrets.

name: Strategic Assessment
desc: You learn your foes' strengths and weaknesses by watching them move.

name: Sun Blade
desc: You can unleash burning sunlight from your sword or spear.

name: Supernatural Senses
prerequisites: Acute Scent or precise or imprecise scent
desc: Your scent is preternaturally sharp, and you can always rely on your sense of smell to help guide you when your vision is compromised.

name: Sure Foot
prerequisites: Horizon Walker Dedication; expert in Acrobatics and Athletics
desc: You know the secrets of moving in your favored terrain.

name: Surprise Attack
desc: You act before foes can react.

name: Surprise Snare
desc: You install one of your snares prepared for quick deployment in a space that's occupied by an opponent.

name: Swaggering Initiative
desc: You swagger readily into any fight—even an ambush.

name: Swipe
desc: You make a wide, arcing swing.

name: Syu Tak-Nwa's Skillful Tresses
desc: You can expertly control your living hair and use it to perform various tasks.

name: Tenacious Toxins
desc: Your victims tend to expire long before your poisons, since the latter have been specifically formulated to last longer.

name: Terrain Scout
desc: You gain the Terrain Stalker skill feat twice, choosing a different terrain each time.

name: The Harder They Fall
desc: You make your foes fall painfully when you trip them.

name: Thorough Reports
desc: Recalling Knowledge adds creatures to your list, granting you bonuses to Recall in future encounters.

name: Thousand Faces
desc: Your form is as mutable as the weather, changing to meet your whim.

name: Tools of the Trade
desc: You're well-versed in weapons that allow you to bring bounties in alive.

name: Treat Condition
desc: You treat an adjacent creature in an attempt to reduce the clumsy, enfeebled, or sickened condition.

name: Triple Time
desc: You learn to speed up yourself and your allies with your performance.

name: Twin Distraction
desc: Your movements with two weapons are so swift and disorienting that they befuddle your opponent.

name: Twin Parry
desc: You use your two weapons to parry attacks.

name: Versatile Signature
desc: You’re always tweaking your available repertoire.

name: Viking Weapon Familiarity
desc: From childhood, you have been exposed to traditional viking weapons, and you soon learned to handle them in battle.

name: Vision of Weakness
desc: You can call upon divine insights to single out your foes' weak points.

name: Warding Light
desc: You gain a tattoo that serves as a special ward to defend you against Walkena's forces.

name: Watch and Learn
desc: Pathfinder agents serve as members of diverse teams with complementary skill sets.

name: Wayfinder Resonance Tinkerer
desc: Access a new cantrip by using your Wayfinder.

name: Wholeness of Body
desc: You can restore your health by tapping into your ki.

name: Woodland Stride
desc: You can always find a path, almost as if foliage parted before you.

name: Wounded Rage
desc: You roar in pain, awakening the rage within you.

name: Adaptive Adept
desc: You’ve continued adapting your magic to blend your class’s tradition with your adapted tradition.

name: Advanced Targeting System
desc: Your ocular processors are augmented with advanced targeting systems, which allow you to more easily pinpoint your enemy and read their movements.

name: Ageless Patience
desc: You work at a pace born from longevity that enhances your thoroughness.

name: Agonizing Rebuke
desc: When you terrorize your enemies, you also cause them painful mental distress.

name: Ally's Shelter
desc: In stressful circumstances, you find strength in your allies' example.

name: Ambush Awareness
desc: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks attempted as initiative rolls.

name: Amorphous Aspect
desc: Your body is supremely flexible.

name: Ancestral Suspicion
desc: Long-lived elves have seen civilizations rise and fall, often at the hands of outside forces.

name: Anchoring Roots
desc: Small roots sprout from your feet, steadying you as you move.

name: Animal Elocutionist
desc: You hear animal sounds as conversations instead of unintelligent noise, and can respond in turn.

name: Animal Speaker
prerequisites: ability to communicate with some type of animals (such as bats or arthropods)
desc: You can speak to all animals, not just a particular subset.

name: Animalistic Resistance
desc: Your animalistic connections help you resist natural afflictions.

name: Ankle Bite
prerequisites: Fang Sharpener or Razortooth Goblin heritage
desc: Whenever someone grabs onto you, you instinctively bite down hard.

name: Aquatic Conversationalist
desc: You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the Diplomacy skill with animals with the amphibious or aquatic traits.

name: Athletic Might
desc: Surviving in hostile terrain has given you a great talent for mobility.

name: Azarketi Weapon Aptitude
desc: You become familiar with using your weapons both in and out of water.

name: Blessed Blood (Aasimar)
desc: Your freshly spilled blood is sanctified, and ingesting it causes effects similar to those of holy water.

name: Bloody Blows
desc: Your lethal unarmed attacks leave bloody gouges or cause severe internal bleeding.

name: Boulder Roll
desc: Your dwarven build allows you to push foes around, just like a mighty boulder.

name: Bristle
desc: You curl into a posture that splays out your bone spines.

name: Called
desc: You have heard the Call, and in constantly resisting that persistent demand, you've developed a mental bulwark against effects that would target your mind.

name: Catchy Tune
desc: You create a tune so catchy, your foes can't help but dance along.

name: Catfolk Weapon Rake
desc: You know how to efficiently use weapons that rake across your enemies.

name: Celestial Resistance
desc: Your growing connection to your celestial forebears has granted you one of their resistances as well.

name: Ceremony of Knowledge
desc: You tap into aeon knowledge.

name: Ceremony of Sunlight
desc: You have learned how to master the power contained within sunlight, just like the trees that form your body.

name: Chosen of Lamashtu
desc: You bear the favor and blessings of Lamashtu, the Mother of Monsters.

name: Clan Protector
desc: Your clan dagger can protect your allies as easily as yourself.

name: Clever Improviser
desc: You’ve learned how to handle situations when you’re out of your depth.

name: Clever Shadow
desc: You can perform simple Interact actions with your shadow, such as opening an unlocked door.

name: Climbing Claws
desc: You can extend your claws to aid you in climbing.

name: Cloud Gazer
desc: Your connection to air allows you to see through obscuring mists.

name: Conrasu Weapon Understanding
desc: You have come to know conrasu weapons as you know yourself.

name: Cornered Fury
desc: When physically outmatched, you fight with unexpected ferocity.

name: Crystalline Dust
desc: You've learned to disperse the crystalline motes coating your body as a haze.

name: Cultural Adaptability
desc: During your adventures, you’ve honed your ability to adapt to the culture of the predominant ancestry around you.

name: Cunning Hair
desc: Your hair moves under your control.

name: Darkseer
desc: Zon-Kuthon smiles upon you—even if you curse his name—granting you pitch-black eyes that allow you to see in shadows and darkness.

name: Defiance Unto Death
desc: You loathe the alghollthus and their mind magic, and you’ve been trained to be willing to die rather than give into mental manipulation.

name: Defy Death
desc: You're exceptionally difficult to kill.

name: Defy the Darkness
desc: Using ancient dwarven methods developed to fight enemies wielding magical darkness, you've honed your darkvision and sworn not to use such magic yourself.

name: Demonblood Frenzy
desc: Just the taste of fiendish blood is enough to send blood rushing through your veins in a supernatural fury.

name: Devil in Plain Sight
desc: You've learned to draw your fiendish nature into a small ball of corruption and hide it in your soul.

name: Devilish Wiles
desc: Traditionally, fiends are exceptionally good at persuading people to do things, even when their targets know it's a bad idea.

name: Distant Cackle
desc: It takes a very brave person to enter the laughter-haunted forest where you dwell.

name: Dogfang Bite
desc: You can swing your beak to slash your foes when piercing attacks won't do.

name: Drag Down
desc: While swimming in water at least 10 feet deep, you grab an adjacent creature (on nearby land or in the water) and pull it below the surface.

name: Dwarven Reinforcement
desc: You can use your knowledge of engineering and metalwork to temporarily strengthen thick objects and structures.

name: Dwarven Weapon Cunning
desc: You’ve learned cunning techniques to get the best effects out of your dwarven weapons.

name: Easily Dismissed
desc: You are practiced at blending into the background of the streets and halls of larger folk to ensure that you are overlooked.

name: Eat Fortune
desc: As someone tries to twist fate, you consume the interference.

name: Eclectic Obsession
desc: Your desire for stimulation has led you from one pursuit to another and granted you a smattering of expertise with myriad crafts and professions.

name: Elemental Bulwark
desc: You call upon the corresponding elements of your suli heritage to resist the effect.

name: Elven Instincts
desc: Your senses let you react rapidly.

name: Elven Weapon Elegance
desc: You are attuned to the weapons of your elven ancestors and are particularly deadly when using them.

name: Empyreal Blessing
desc: You can call forth a benediction upon your allies, whether you pray to a deity of the celestial realms or just find the power within yourself.

name: Energized Font
prerequisites: focus pool, at least one innate spell from a gnome heritage or ancestry feat that shares a tradition with at least one of your focus spells
desc: The magic within you provides increased energy you can use to focus.

name: Enthralling Allure
desc: The powers of domination employed by your progenitors have manifested in you as well.

name: Envenom Fangs
desc: You envenom your fangs.

name: Expanded Luck
desc: You are luckier even than most catfolk.

name: Expert Drill Sergeant
desc: You know how to get the most out of your allies.

name: Extinguish Light
desc: You wrap shadow around a single unattended light source within 120 feet that's no larger than a torch.

name: Favorable Winds
desc: You wrap a shell of favorable wind around a weapon you wield.

name: Feathered Cloak
desc: To blend in with the grounded and wingless, you fold your wings just so on your back, creating the illusion of a feathered cloak.

name: Feed on Pain
desc: The psychic feedback of another creature's pain fills you with false life.

name: Fey Disguise
desc: You can disguise yourself with magical illusions.

name: Fey Influence
source: Pathfinder Society Scenario #1-17: The Perennial Crown Part 2, The Thorned Monarch
desc: Your exposure to fey influence has given you some primal magic

name: Fiendish Resistance
desc: Your connection to your fiendish forebears has granted you one of their resistances as well.

name: Finned Ridges
desc: The ridges and flaps of your skin steer you through the water.

name: Firesight
desc: You can see through the haze of flame.

name: Fledgling Flight
desc: You can fly through the air in short bursts at half your land Speed.

name: Flexible Tail
desc: You can perform simple Interact actions with your tail, such as opening an unlocked door.

name: Fluid Contortionist
desc: You can ignore difficult terrain caused by moving through tight spaces that aren't tight enough to force you to Squeeze.

name: Focused Cat Nap
desc: When you Cat Nap, you can also Refocus as you dream of a relevant activity.

name: Forest Stealth
desc: You are skilled at quickly hiding behind bits of underbrush or foliage.

name: Formation Training
desc: You know how to fight in formation with your brethren.

name: Fortify Shield
desc: You reinforce your shield with a rocky outgrowth of metal and stone.

name: Friendform
desc: The shared bond between you and your allies allows you to act on their behalf.

name: Gaping Flesh
desc: Your wound yawns open, appalling your attacker.

name: Garuda's Squall
desc: Garudas' marksmanship and magic are second nature to you.

name: Gecko's Grip
desc: You stick to walls with a preternatural grip.

name: Genie Weapon Flourish
desc: Whenever you critically hit using a falchion, ranseur, scimitar, trident, or a geniekin weapon, you apply the weapon's critical specialization effect.

name: Gnaw
desc: With enough time and determination, you can chew through nearly anything.

name: Gnoll Weapon Practicality
desc: You have come to know gnoll weapons as you know yourself.

name: Gnome Weapon Innovator
desc: You produce outstanding results when wielding unusual weapons.

name: Goblin Weapon Frenzy
desc: You know how to wield your people’s vicious weapons.

name: Graceful Guidance
desc: You can demonstrate how to quickly twist out of the way of dangerous effects.

name: Greater Animal Senses
desc: Your senses advance to match those of your animal aspect.

name: Grippli Glide
desc: You can use your webbed feet to guide your fall.

name: Grippli Weapon Innovator
desc: You've learned devious ways to make the most of your grippli weapons.

name: Grovel
desc: With obsequious words and begging gestures, you convince your foe you're less of a threat.

name: Guided by the Stars
desc: The stars grant you insights that guide your actions.

name: Halfling Ingenuity
desc: While your willingness to dig into a task you know little about might get you into trouble, your incredible luck often saves you from danger.

name: Halfling Weapon Trickster
desc: You are particularly adept at fighting with your people’s favored weapons.

name: Healer's Halo
desc: Your halo can enhance positive energy.

name: Heatwave
desc: You harness the oncoming flames and twist them into a screen of heat and smoke, granting you concealment until the beginning of your next turn.

name: Hobgoblin Weapon Discipline
desc: You know how to efficiently utilize the weapons soldiers use in close quarters.

name: Hold Mark
desc: You bear scars or tattoos enhanced by the mark of your community's prowess.

name: Hopping Stride
desc: You've internalized the hopping gait of your vampiric forebear.

name: Hunter's Fangs
desc: Your fangs are exceptionally painful.

name: Hybrid Form
desc: When you Change Shape, you retain elements of your kitsune form, allowing you to speak in a fox form, use kitsune unarmed attacks in a tailless form, or gain a tail in your tailless form to use abilities that require one.

name: Hybrid Shape
desc: Mastery of your shapeshifting lets you combine the best features of your humanoid and spider forms.

name: Inoculation Subroutine
desc: Your nanites reject diseases with ease.

name: Inspire Imitation
desc: Your own actions inspire your allies to great achievements.

name: Intercorporate
desc: Your ordered physiology rejects unwelcome elements.

name: Intuitive Illusions
desc: Illusion magic comes to you so naturally that you can effortlessly sustain your magical ruses.

name: Inured to the Heat
desc: Your have a love for extreme heat.

name: Iruxi Glide
desc: You glide slowly toward the ground, 5 feet down and up to 25 feet forward through the air.

name: Iruxi Unarmed Cunning
desc: You make the most of your iruxi unarmed attacks.

name: Kitsune Spell Mysteries
prerequisites: at least one innate spell from a kitsune heritage or ancestry feat
desc: You know more kitsune magic.

name: Kneecap
desc: You deliver a punishing blow to an enemy's knee, shin, or other vulnerable anatomy within your reach.

name: Kobold Weapon Innovator
desc: You've learned devious tactics with your kobold weapons.

name: Lab Rat
desc: You've spent more than your share of time in an alchemy lab.

name: Leshy Glide
prerequisites: Leaf Leshy heritage or Cat Fall
desc: Using your own leaves, you can control your descent.

name: Lifesense
desc: You have a limited ability to sense life force, like your psychopomp forebears.

name: Light Paws
desc: You can balance on your toes to step carefully over obstructions.

name: Lightless Litheness
desc: Your body is almost as flexible as your shadow.

name: Long Tongue
desc: You've learned to stretch your exceptionally long tongue beyond its original limits.

name: Long-Nosed Form
desc: You can transform into a specific, curious-looking human form.

name: Loud Singer
desc: Staying on pitch, proper breath control, and remembering the words are all less important than the real measure of a good singer: volume! The range of your Goblin Song is increased to 60 feet, and you can target one additional enemy when you use it.

name: Loyal Empath
desc: You have incredible empathy for your friends and family, and you have an innate timing for helping others in distress.

name: Lucky Break
desc: You catch yourself as you make a mistake.

name: Magpie Snatch
desc: You move quickly, snatching a shiny item that catches your eye.

name: Malicious Bane
desc: Whether your heart is pure or corrupt, you can call forth a malediction upon your foes.

name: Marine Ally
desc: You've befriended a sea creature, which becomes magically bonded to you.

name: Martial Experience
desc: You've crossed blades with a wide variety of foes wielding a wide variety of weapons, and you've learned the basics of fighting with nearly any of them.

name: Mask of Power
desc: Your warmask sharpens your connection to the source of your mask's power.

name: Mask of Rejection
desc: Your warmask projects a white-hot fury that attempts to vaporize the offending magic.

name: Mist Child
desc: You blend in with unnatural subtlety.

name: Mutate Weapon
desc: deal more damage with your Living Weapon.

name: Myriad Forms
desc: With a bit of self-discovery, you find a new form.

name: Nanite Shroud
desc: Your nanites fly out of your body, swarming around you in a cloud.

name: Natural Illusionist
desc: By drawing upon the First World’s magic, you can siphon a portion of that malleable world to create a convincing illusion.

name: Necromantic Physiology
desc: Your unusual physiology has developed in a way that makes it difficult for parasites and other infestations to prey upon you.

name: Offensive Analysis
desc: You can enhance your senses and mental state to consider every aspect of an attack.

name: One-Toed Hop
desc: Assuming a peculiar stance, you make a short hop on each toe.

name: Orc Weapon Carnage
desc: You are brutally efficient with the weapons of your orc ancestors.

name: Ornate Tattoo
desc: You expand your tattoos to encompass greater magic.

name: Pack Stalker
desc: Ambushes are an honored gnoll tradition.

name: Plague Sniffer
desc: You can sniff out the pungent tang of disease.

name: Powerful Guts
desc: Your stomach is particularly durable.

name: Practiced Paddler
desc: You’re skilled at navigating bogs and marshes, even for a paddler shoony.

name: Pride Hunter
desc: You avoid the attention of creatures focused on your allies.

name: Project Persona
desc: Where others etch their armor to serve as a conduit for their imaginations, your vivid mind and bold personality allow you to project a more fitting persona over your lackluster armor.

name: Protective Claws
desc: The chitin on your claws is so hard you can defend against attacks with them.

name: Protective Sheath
desc: When you lash out with your clan dagger, you keep its sheath close at hand.

name: Protective Subroutine
desc: Your nanites can augment your defenses.

name: Quick Stow (Ratfolk)
desc: You are adept at quickly moving items into your cheek pouches.

name: Rat Magic
desc: There always seems to be a little rat around to carry messages for you.

name: Ratfolk Roll
desc: Your ability to curl up into a tight ball comes in handy.

name: Recognize Ambush
desc: Your combat training has honed you to be ready for an attack at all times.

name: Renewing Quills
desc: Your spines grow back much faster than other shisks.

name: Right-Hand Blood
desc: It's said that the flesh of the right side of a hyena can heal diseases, but that of the left side is poisonous.

name: Ritual Reversion
desc: You can temporarily revert to a less conspicuous form without diminishing your senses.

name: Runtsage
desc: Unlike most of your kind, who dismiss goblins as embarrassments or expendable annoyances, you have studied the methodology behind their irresponsible and incomprehensible actions.

name: Scar-Thick Skin
desc: Glorious, storied scars cover and protect much of your body.

name: Sense Allies
desc: Like many humans raised in a close-knit community, you have always been strongly attuned to the presence of others.

name: Shadowy Disguise
desc: You wrap yourself in shadow to change your appearance.

name: Shared Luck (Halfling)
desc: You are evidence that it’s lucky to travel with a halfling.

name: Shed Tail
desc: You can shed your tail to escape.

name: Sheltering Slab
desc: The stone around you is your ally, and you have learned to use it to shore up your weaknesses.

name: Shifting Faces
desc: You wear many faces, even those that don't belong to you.

name: Shoki's Argument
desc: You feel a connection to shokis, the rambling collectors of wayward souls, and might have found old texts written by one.

name: Skillful Tail
desc: You've always had a tail, but with practice, you've learned to use it for more than signaling your mood.

name: Skillful Tail (Ganzi)
desc: You have a tail or similar body part that is always willing to lend a hand (so to speak).

name: Skillful Tail (Geniekin)
desc: You were born with a tail, and with practice you've learned how to perform simple Interact actions with it, such as opening an unlocked door.

name: Slip with the Breeze
desc: You create gusts of wind when you jump, allowing you to carry yourself across greater distances.

name: Snare Genius
desc: Your expertise makes your snares more powerful, and you can place them quickly and efficiently.

name: Speak with Kindred
desc: You have a connection with creatures that share your physiology.

name: Spirit Soother
desc: You are attuned to the minute sounds and sensations of restless spirits.

name: Springing Leaper
desc: Your powerful legs allow you to make sudden and dramatic leaps.

name: Steam Spell
desc: You transform your fire spells into steam, making them more effective underwater.

name: Step Lively
desc: You are an expert at avoiding the lumbering footsteps of larger creatures.

name: Strix Vengeance
desc: You dedicate yourself to destroying those who harm your kin.

name: Supernatural Charm
desc: The elven magic in your blood manifests as a force you can use to become more appealing or alluring.

name: Swift Swimmer
desc: You swim faster than most iruxi.

name: Tail Spin
desc: You excel at using your tail as a weapon to upend your foes.

name: Taste Blood
prerequisites: Cel Rau, Straveika, Svetocher, or another lineage from a vampire with the Drink Blood ability
desc: You retain not only your vampiric parent's taste for blood but their ability to gain vitality from it.

name: Tenacious Net
desc: Escaping your nets is no simple task.

name: Tengu Feather Fan
desc: You've learned to bind some of your feathers together into a fan to focus your ancestral magic.

name: Tengu Weapon Study
desc: You've learned techniques for using blades and other tengu weapons.

name: Thrown Voice
desc: You've learned how to throw your voice through the winds, tricking others as to your location.

name: Tomb-Watcher's Glare
desc: When you critically hit an undead creature, or an undead creature critically fails a saving throw against one of your abilities, you drive your divine wrath home in your enemy’s heart.

name: Tongue Disarm
desc: You lash out with your tongue to disarm your foe.

name: Torch Goblin
desc: You’ve spent enough time on fire that you know how to use it to your advantage.

name: Tough Tumbler
desc: You’ve taken your share of licks while scurrying around the battlefield and know how to defend yourself against opportunistic attackers.

name: Tranquil Sanctuary
desc: Whenever possible, you follow the serene path and encourage others to do the same.

name: Treacherous Earth
desc: You have the power to shatter the earth into a shape of your devising.

name: Tree Climber (Goblin)
prerequisites: Tailed Goblin heritage or Treedweller Goblin heritage
desc: Your time in forest or jungle canopies has taught you how to scramble across branches with sure feet.

name: Uncanny Awareness
desc: You have a keen sense of movement around you.

name: Undead Companion
prerequisites: an animal companion or a familiar
desc: Your companion is also touched by undeath, a mix of a traditional companion and a skeleton, zombie, or stranger form of unlife.

name: Undead Slayer
desc: Your knowledge of your own not-quite-living anatomy, combined with your experience in combat, helps you take down undead foes with ease.

name: Vandal
desc: You have a knack for breaking and dismantling things.

name: Vanth's Weapon Execution
desc: You've trained in the finer points of dealing death.

name: Victorious Vigor
desc: Your victories in battle fill you with pride and imbue you with the energy to fight a bit longer despite your wounds.

name: Ward Against Corruption
desc: Your soul is warded against the power of undeath and plague, as well as that of the evil former psychopomps known as sahkils.

name: Water Conjuration
desc: You carry the ocean with you wherever you go.

name: Wavetouched Paragon
desc: You have been blessed by the sea, granting you the ability to swim like a fish.

name: Wildborn Adept
desc: The whispers of the jungle grant you more diverse access to simple primal magic.

name: Winglets
desc: You're among the few kobolds who grow a set of draconic wings later in life.

name: Abundant Step
desc: You can teleport yourself a short distance.

name: Adaptive Mask Familiar
desc: Your mask familiar adapts quickly to material form, allowing it to gain more familiar and master abilities.

name: Additional Recollection
desc: You scan the battlefield quickly, remembering critical details about multiple opponents you face.

name: Advanced Arcana
desc: You gain one wizard feat.

name: Advanced Blood Potency
desc: You gain one sorcerer feat.

name: Advanced Bloodline
desc: You have studied your bloodline to learn the secrets of its magic.

name: Advanced Bow Training
desc: Through constant practice and the crucible of experience, you increase your skill with advanced bows.

name: Advanced Concoction
desc: You gain one alchemist feat.

name: Advanced Deduction
desc: You gain one investigator feat.

name: Advanced Devotion
desc: You gain one champion feat.

name: Advanced Dogma
desc: You gain one cleric feat.

name: Advanced Flair
desc: You gain one swashbuckler feat.

name: Advanced Fury
desc: You gain one barbarian feat.

name: Advanced Hunter's Trick
desc: You gain one ranger feat.

name: Advanced Kata
desc: You gain one monk feat.

name: Advanced Maneuver
desc: You gain a fighter feat.

name: Advanced Muse's Whispers
desc: You gain one bard feat.

name: Advanced Mysteries
desc: You gain one oracle feat.

name: Advanced Red Mantis Magic
desc: Your Red Mantis magical training has improved.

name: Advanced Revelation
desc: You learn an advanced revelation spell associated with your mystery.

name: Advanced Trickery
desc: You gain one rogue feat.

name: Advanced Weapon Training
desc: You’ve studied the art of wielding an advanced weapon.

name: Advanced Wilding
desc: You gain one druid feat.

name: Advanced Witchcraft
desc: You gain one witch feat.

name: Advantageous Assault
desc: When an enemy’s movement is compromised, you deliver a more deadly blow.

name: Agile Maneuvers
desc: Your easily maneuver against your foes.

name: Aldori Riposte
desc: Learn to strike back at your opponent when they fail to attack you.

name: Align Ki
desc: The power of your ki soothes your wounds and energizes you for battle.

name: Analyze Idiolect
prerequisites: Linguist Dedication; expert in Deception and Society
desc: You break down a specific individual's idiolect, memorizing their speech mannerisms and habits.

name: Analyze Weakness
desc: Your knowledge of a creature's physiology and understanding of tactics helps you attack with pinpoint accuracy.

name: Animal Skin
desc: When you are raging and unarmored, your skin transforms into a thick hide.

name: Anticipate Ambush
desc: Using your extensive knowledge of ambush tactics, you keep watch for any hidden creatures or dangerous sites, moving at half your travel speed.

name: Arcane Sensitivity
source: Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace
desc: You can sense the presence of the supernatural, even if you don't have any magical ability yourself.

name: Archaeologist's Warning
desc: You visually or audibly warn your companions of danger, granting them a +1 circumstance bonus to their initiative rolls.

name: Armor Specialist
desc: You have trained hard to optimize your armor's protective qualities.

name: Artokus's Fire
desc: Artokus developed a mixture of volatile materials that burns hotter and longer than typical alchemist's fire.

name: Assured Knowledge
desc: You can procure information with confidence.

name: Attack of Opportunity
desc: You swat a foe that leaves an opening.

name: Axe Thrower
desc: You have mastered the weight and balance of a variety of axes and can lob them with ease.

name: Basic Scroll Cache
desc: You have a vast and overflowing collection of scroll scraps, riddled with errors and misspellings and leaking energy like a sieve.

name: Beastmaster's Trance
desc: You can enter a trance that allows you to briefly inhabit the body of one of your animal companions and share its senses.

name: Bellflower Dedication
prerequisites: member of the Bellflower Network; expert in Stealth and Survival; Charisma 14
desc: You dedicate yourself to freeing slaves and escorting them to freedom.

name: Blazing Talon Surge
desc: You rush forward and latch onto your enemy with talons of hungering fire.

name: Boaster's Challenge
prerequisites: Firebrand Braggart Dedication; expert in Deception, Diplomacy, or Intimidation
desc: You call out a foe, causing them to become flustered and easier to defeat.

name: Bolera's Interrogation
source: Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace
desc: You can force a creature to tell the truth

name: Brutal Bully
desc: You push your foes around and leave bruises.

name: Butterfly's Kiss
desc: You can make nonlethal Strikes with a butterfly sword without taking a penalty.

name: Butterfly's Sting
desc: You gain the sneak attack class feature.

name: Cadence Call
desc: You call out a quick cadence, guiding your allies into a more efficient rhythm.

name: Cascade Bearer's Flexibility
prerequisites: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication; Cascade Bearers affiliation
desc: You call upon your Cascade Bearer training to help you adjust a spell for the current situation.

name: Cast Down
desc: The sheer force of your faith can bring a foe crashing down.

name: Champion's Reaction
desc: You can use the champion’s reaction associated with your cause.

name: Clear the Way
desc: You put your body behind your massive weapon and swing, shoving enemies to clear a wide path.

name: Cleave
desc: You swing clear through one foe and into another.

name: Combination Finisher
desc: You combine a series of attacks with a powerful finishing blow.

name: Combine Elixirs
desc: You’ve discovered how to mix two elixirs into a single hybrid concoction.

name: Connect the Dots
desc: Ephemeral connections between people, places, and concepts are invisible to most, but seeing them is your stock and trade.

name: Convincing Illusion
desc: You use your deceptive skills to make your illusions seem even more real.

name: Corrupted Shield
desc: Your shield ally is more than just a spirit of protection— it's a conduit for deadly divine magic.

name: Counter Perform
desc: You gain the counter performance composition spell.

name: Craft Facsimile
prerequisites: Pathfinder Agent Dedication; expert in Crafting
desc: You're renowned for your ability to recover important items and sometimes that requires creating a stand-in.

name: Crane Flutter
desc: You interpose your arm between yourself and your opponent.

name: Crimson Shroud
desc: You can surround yourself with bloody mist.

name: Crossbow Terror
desc: You are a dynamo with the crossbow.

name: Crowd Mastery
desc: You use the crowd to your advantage, diverting your foes’ attention to potential hidden dangers in the crowd.

name: Current Spell
desc: As you use your magic to manipulate air or water, you divert some of its currents to form a barrier around you.

name: Daring Act
prerequisites: Firebrand Braggart Dedication; trained in Acrobatics or Athletics
desc: You attempt a death-defying maneuver to distract your enemies.

name: Dazing Blow
desc: You pummel a held foe, hoping to stagger them.

name: Debilitating Bomb
desc: Your bombs impose additional effects on your enemies.

name: Defend Mount
desc: You interpose yourself between an attacker and your mount, defending your mount from harm.

name: Defensive Coordination
desc: Like the storied heroes who persist in the face of overwhelming odds, you and your allies will hold the line.

name: Directional Bombs
desc: You can lob bombs with great force and a precise trajectory to angle the splash in a cone spraying in a single direction.

name: Dirge of Doom
desc: You learn to frighten your enemies with your performance.

name: Disarming Stance
desc: You adopt a fencing stance that improves your control over your weapon.

name: Discerning Strike
desc: Identifying a creature is the first step in finding its weaknesses.

name: Disrupting Strikes
desc: You call forth positive energy from within to help you destroy undead.

name: Diverting Vortex
desc: You transfer vestiges of magical energy to the air around you, creating a vortex that deflects ranged attacks.

name: Divine Ally
desc: You gain a divine ally of your choice.

name: Divine Weapon
desc: You siphon residual spell energy into a weapon you’re wielding.

name: Dodge Away
desc: You use your acrobatic prowess to evade an attack, using momentum to keep yourself moving, if you choose.

name: Dragon Roar
desc: You bellow, instilling fear in your enemies.

name: Dragon's Rage Breath
desc: You exhale powerful draconic energy.

name: Educate Allies
desc: You tweak the properties of your composition spell to convey a bit of your defensive knowledge.

name: Eldritch Archer Dedication
prerequisites: expert in at least one type of bow
desc: You blend magic with your archery, leading to powerful results.

name: Emerald Boughs Accustomation
prerequisites: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication; Emerald Boughs affiliation; expert in Society
desc: You are comfortable and socially capable in almost any cultural context.

name: Endemic Herbs
desc: During your daily preparations, you find medicinal plants endemic to your location.

name: Energetic Resonance
desc: Your blood resonates with magical energy, mitigating the effects of harmful spells.

name: Ephemeral Tracking
desc: You are able to track your quarry through impossible places.

name: Expeditious Advance
desc: You advance and retreat quickly.

name: Expert Alchemy
desc: Your advanced alchemy level increases to 3.

name: Expert Herbalism
desc: Your advanced alchemy level for herbalism increases to your level – 3.

name: Expert Poisoner
desc: Your advanced alchemy level for poison increases to your level – 3.

name: Far Throw
desc: When you Strike with a thrown weapon, you take only a –1 penalty for each additional range increment between you and the target, rather than a –2 penalty.

name: Fleeting Shadow
desc: You're able to quickly disappear and then move about stealthily.

name: Flexible Ritualist
desc: You can perform two aspects of a ritual yourself.

name: Follow-Up Strike
desc: You have trained to use all parts of your body as a weapon.

name: Forced Entry
prerequisites: Pathfinder Agent Dedication; expert in Athletics
desc: You are trained to preserve the archaeological value of your location when entering.

name: Furious Focus
desc: You’ve learned to maintain your balance even when swinging furiously.

name: Gang Up
desc: You and your allies harry an opponent in concert.

name: Ghost Strike
desc: You can infuse a weapon you are carrying with magical energies that allow it to strike true against incorporeal undead.

name: Giant's Stature
desc: You grow to incredible size.

name: Gorilla Pound
desc: You pound your chest before slamming into your foes.

name: Grave Sense
desc: Learn how to sense undead in the area.

name: Greater Lesson
desc: Your patron grants you greater knowledge.

name: Green Empathy
desc: You can communicate with plants on a basic level and use Diplomacy to Make an Impression on them and to make very simple Requests of them.

name: Guardian's Deflection (Fighter)
desc: You use your weapon to deflect the attack against your ally.

name: Halcyon Speaker Dedication
prerequisites: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication; member of the Magaambya of conversant rank
desc: You devote much of your study to halcyon magic.

name: Harmonize
desc: You can perform multiple compositions simultaneously.

name: Heaven's Thunder
desc: With a loud shout, you unleash your ki in a crackling shroud of thunder and lightning that engulfs your body.

name: Hellknight Dedication
prerequisites: Hellknight Armiger Dedication; lawful alignment; member of a Hellknight Order; passed the Hellknight Test
desc: You have forged your body to comply with the commands of your mind—orders steeped in the Measure and the Chain.

name: Hellknight Signifer Dedication
prerequisites: spellcasting class feature; Hellknight Armiger Dedication; lawful alignment; member of a Hellknight Order; passed the Hellknight Test
desc: You have bolstered your force of will with the power of the Measure and the Chain.

name: High-Quality Scrounger
desc: When you Craft a temporary item using Scrounger Dedication, it can be an item of up to 3rd level.

name: Holistic Care
desc: You provide emotional and spiritual care.

name: Improved Familiar (Familiar Master)
desc: You find it easy to attract a powerful and unusual familiar to your side.

name: Inner Strength
desc: Your strength is part of your rage, so as long as your anger remains, you can gather your strength and rage to overcome any sort of enfeeblement.

name: Insect Shape
desc: Your understanding of life expands, allowing you to mimic a wider range of creatures.

name: Instinct Ability
desc: You gain the instinct ability for the instinct you chose for Barbarian Dedication.

name: Invigorating Mercy
desc: Your divine touch rejuvenates the weak and tired.

name: Jellyfish Stance
desc: You relax your posture and loosen your joints, allowing yourself to move with incredible fluidity.

name: Keen Recollection
desc: You can recall all sorts of information.

name: Keep Pace
desc: Your prey can't Escape.

name: Ki Blast
desc: You can unleash an impactful cone of force by channeling your ki.

name: Knight Reclaimant Dedication
prerequisites: any non-evil alignment; member of the Knights of Lastwall of knight rank; trained in Stealth and Survival
desc: You have sworn the Crimson Oath and become a full member of the Crimson Reclaimers.

name: Knight Vigilant
prerequisites: any good alignment; member of the Knights of Lastwall of knight rank; trained in Religion
desc: You are dedicated to the cause of the Shining Sentinels.

name: Light Step
desc: You aren’t bothered by tricky footing.

name: Litany Against Wrath
desc: You excoriate a foe for its wrath against goodly creatures.

name: Living Rune
desc: You’ve bridged a connection between the runes on your body and the magic of runestones, allowing you to place an armor rune on your living flesh.

name: Loyal Warhorse
desc: You and your mount have grown closer, and your loyalty to each other is unbreakable.

name: Mage Hunter
desc: You use your hatred of magic to lash out at the sight of spellcasting, allowing you to interrupt an enemy's spell.

name: Magic Hands
desc: The blessing of your deity heightens your healing ability, making your mundane healing work as if by magic.

name: Mastermind's Eye
desc: When you identify a creature with Recall Knowledge, that creature is flat-footed to you.

name: Mature Animal Companion (Ranger)
desc: Your animal companion grows up, gaining additional capabilities.

name: Mature Trained Companion
source: Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God
desc: Your animal companion grows up, becoming a mature animal companion.

name: Mesmerizing Gaze
desc: When you meet someone's gaze, they are unable to look away.

name: Mountain Stronghold
desc: You focus on your connection to the earth and call upon the mountain to block attacks against you.

name: Mounted Shield
desc: You've trained with your shield to defend both yourself and your mount.

name: Nameless Anonymity
desc: Your mask protects you further from divination.

name: Nimble Shield Hand
desc: You are so used to wielding a shield that you can do so even while using the hand that's holding it for other purposes.

name: Nocturnal Sense
prerequisites: Acute Scent or precise or imprecise scent and low-light vision
desc: Your senses gain even greater clarity.

name: One-Inch Punch
desc: You put all your force into a single mighty, carefully controlled blow.

name: Perfect Ki Adept
desc: You gain the appropriate ki spell for your School of Perfection.

name: Performative Weapons Training
desc: You're skilled with flashy weapons.

name: Perpetual Scout
desc: You spot anything out of place in the areas you know best.

name: Poison Coat
desc: In nature, certain animals are covered in venomous spines, such that even touching them is deadly.

name: Precise Finisher
desc: Even when your foe avoids your Confident Finisher, you can still hit a vital spot.

name: Predictive Purchase (Investigator)
desc: You have just the thing for the situation.

name: Quick Snares
desc: You can rig a snare in only moments.

name: Rain-Scribe Sustenance
desc: You use the power of your Rain-Scribe magic to draw on a stream of primal power for sustenance.

name: Rallying Charge
desc: Your fearless charge into battle reinvigorates your allies to carry on the fight.

name: Ranger's Bramble
desc: You can cause plants to grow and trap your foes with thorns.

name: Reflexive Shield
desc: You can use your shield to fend off the worst of area effects and other damage.

name: Relentless Disarm
prerequisites: Zephyr Guard Dedication; trained in Athletics
desc: You have been trained to disarm foes.

name: Reloading Trick
desc: You can fire off a single shot even when unprepared. You Interact to reload your hand crossbow and Strike with it.

name: Remote Trigger
desc: You've learned how to trigger snares from afar.

name: Resourceful Ritualist
desc: You can cast difficult rituals that might otherwise be just beyond your skill.

name: Return Fire
desc: Snatching an arrow out of the air, you instantly put it to your bow and return fire.

name: Revealing Stab
desc: You drive your piercing weapon into an imperceptible foe, revealing its location to your allies.

name: Ricochet Stance (Fighter)
desc: You adopt a stance designed to rebound your thrown weapons back toward you.

name: Scholarly Defense
desc: Your knowledge of strange creatures and their bizarre anatomy allows you to anticipate their physical attacks and reduce the damage you take from them.

name: Scouring Rage
prerequisites: an instinct that allows you to change your additional damage from Rage to a different damage type
desc: You emit a powerful surge of instinctual energy when you unleash your potential.

name: Scout's Speed
desc: You move faster, especially when traveling, allowing you to scout ahead and report back without slowing your allies.

name: Scrollmaster Dedication
prerequisites: expert in any Lore skill; member of the Pathfinder Society affiliated with the School of Scrolls
desc: Your experience chronicling adventures and discoveries grants you heightened discernment and memory.

name: Second Shield
desc: You're used to your shield breaking in the middle of battle.

name: Selective Energy
desc: As you call down divine power, you can prevent some enemies from benefiting or some allies from being hurt.

name: Shatter Defenses
desc: Your offense exploits your enemy’s fear. Make a melee Strike against a frightened creature.

name: Shield Warden
prerequisites: [Champion] divine ally (shield); tenets of good; [Fighter] Shield Block
desc: You use your shield to protect your allies as well as yourself.

name: Shove Down
desc: You leverage your weight to topple foes that you move.

name: Simple Crystal Magic
source: Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City
desc: You are capable of seeing magic as flowing runes and can scribe a personal rune that represents you.

name: Skirmish Strike
desc: Your feet and weapon move in tandem.

name: Sky and Heaven Stance
desc: You enter a stance allowing you to make jagged strikes like flashes of lightning through the sky.

name: Slice and Swipe
desc: Steal from your target when you successfully strike them.

name: Smite Evil
desc: Your blade ally becomes an even more powerful tool against evildoers.

name: Smite Good
desc: Your blade ally shares your lust for the blood of good creatures.

name: Snap Shot
desc: You’ve learned to react with ranged weapons when a creature is in close quarters.

name: Song of Marching
desc: You learn the song of marching composition cantrip, which enables you and your allies to cross vast distances without strain.

name: Spell Penetration
desc: You’ve studied ways of overcoming the innate magical resistance that certain powerful creatures have.

name: Spell Relay
desc: You open the power in your blood to your ally's spellcasting, using your magic to boost their range.

name: Spellmaster Dedication
prerequisites: ability to cast focus spells; member of the Pathfinder Society affiliated with the School of Spells; Intelligence 14, Charisma 14, or Wisdom 14
desc: As a Spellmaster, you are adept at identifying magic.

name: Spirits' Interference
desc: You call forth protective spirits to ward off ranged attacks.

name: Spiritual Sense
desc: You have a vague connection to the Ethereal Plane that enables you to notice spirits.

name: Split Slot
desc: You can prepare two spells in one slot, giving you the freedom to choose the spell when you cast it.

name: Staff Sweep
source: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
desc: You sweep your foes away with your staff.

name: Startling Appearance (Vigilante)
desc: You can startle foes who are unaware of your presence.

name: Steady Spellcasting
desc: You don’t lose spells easily.

name: Stella's Stab and Snag
desc: You dart towards your opponent, seeking to stab them and slice their purse-strings with a single movement.

name: Sticky Poison
desc: A combination of additional viscosity and careful application keeps your weapons poisoned even when suffering significant wear and tear.

name: Stone Blood
desc: Your blood clots quickly.

name: Storm Retribution
prerequisites: storm order; tempest surge order spell
desc: You lash out, directing a burst of storming fury toward a creature that has harmed you.

name: Stumbling Feint
desc: You lash out confusingly with what seems to be a weak move but instead allows you to unleash a dangerous flurry of blows upon your unsuspecting foe.

name: Sun's Fury
desc: The Old Sun Gods have granted you a gift in your fight against Walkena.

name: Surprise Strike
desc: Your sudden use of improvised weapons can take opponents off guard.

name: Swashbuckler's Riposte
desc: You've learned to riposte against ill-conceived attacks.

name: Swift Tracker
desc: Your keen eyes catch signs of passage even when you’re moving.

name: Swordmaster Dedication
prerequisites: member of the Pathfinder Society affiliated with the School of Swords; Strength 14, Constitution 14, or Dexterity 14
desc: Your Swords training taught you to never lose hold of your weapon.

name: Syu Tak-Nwa's Deadly Hair
desc: Your hair deals increased damage and can grapple.

name: Tempest-Sun Redirection
prerequisites: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication; Tempest-Sun Mages affiliation
desc: If the next action you use is to Cast a Spell from your spell slots that damages other creatures, you can bend some of that spell’s offensive energy, protecting allies in the area and boosting your own defenses against certain foes.

name: Thorough Research
desc: When you succeed at a Recall Knowledge check, you learn an additional fact about the subject.

name: Tiger Slash
desc: You make a fierce swipe with both hands.

name: Triple Shot
desc: You can quickly fire multiple shots with greater control.

name: Twist the Knife
desc: After stabbing your opponent in a weak spot, you tear the wound open.

name: Unnerving Prowess
desc: Make a free Demoralize check when you critically succeed with your dueling sword.

name: Uzunjati Storytelling
prerequisites: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication; Uzunjati affiliation; master in a Recall Knowledge skill
desc: You tell a quick story or begin telling a longer tale.

name: Vacate Vision
desc: You cause your eyes to liquefy and run out of your eye sockets, leaving them empty.

name: Vexing Tumble
desc: You tumble around your foes, expertly avoiding their reactions.

name: Viking Weapon Specialist
desc: You are even more skilled in the weapons of your people.

name: Warding Rune
desc: Your runes provide a warding effect that protects you against a specific school of magic.

name: Watch Your Back
desc: You menace the target, stoking their fears and drawing their attention.

name: Water Step
desc: You can Stride across liquid and surfaces that don’t support your weight.

name: Westyr's Wayfinder Repository
prerequisites: Pathfinder Agent Dedication; Wayfinder Resonance Tinkerer
desc: You can use your wayfinder to store a little extra magic for when you need it most.

name: Whirling Throw
desc: You propel your grabbed or restrained foe a great distance.

name: Witch's Charge
desc: You forge a magical link with another creature, granting you awareness of that creature's condition and creating a conduit for spellcasting.

name: Wolf Drag
desc: You rip your enemy off their feet.

name: Advanced First Aid
desc: Use First Aid to reduce frightened and sickened condition values.

name: Aerobatics Mastery
desc: Improve your ability to Maneuver in Flight.

name: Battle Cry
desc: Demoralizes foes when you roll for initiative.

name: Battle Prayer
prerequisites: you follow a deity; master in Religion
desc: Calling out to your deity, you recite scripture to harm a foe

name: Biographical Eye
desc: Intuit details about someone’s profession and residence.

name: Bizarre Magic
desc: Your magic becomes more difficult to identify.

name: Bless Tonic
prerequisites: deity who grants heal divine font; master in Crafting
desc: You channel positive energy into restoratives that ward against harm

name: Bless Toxin
prerequisites: deity who grants harm divine font; master in Crafting
desc: You pour negative energy into toxins you create to further debilitate your targets
