name: Consult the Spirits
prerequisites: master in Nature, Occultism, or Religion
desc: Learn about your environment from resident spirits.

name: Disturbing Knowledge
desc: Frighten foes with occult secrets.

name: Doublespeak
desc: Pass a secret message to allies in your conversation.

name: Entourage
desc: You have a small group of admirers who tend to follow you around while you’re in civilized settlements.

name: Environmental Grace
prerequisites: deity who grants the cold, fire, nature, or travel domain; master in Survival
desc: You rapidly adapt to environments through a combination of skill, meditation, and divine grace

name: Evangelize
prerequisites: you follow a deity or philosophy; master in Diplomacy
desc: You point out a detail that incontrovertibly supports your faith, causing a listener’s mind to whirl

name: Expeditious Search
desc: Search areas in half the time.

name: Expert Disassembler
desc: You can apply the same techniques you use to reverse engineer objects to disable them.

name: Fabricated Connections
desc: You can lie about having taken an action so convincingly that you acquire all the tangible benefits of having successfully completed it.

name: Foil Senses
desc: Take precautions against special senses.

name: Graceful Leaper
desc: Mass and muscle are meaningless when you leap; only grace and balance matter.

name: Impeccable Crafter
desc: Craft items more efficiently.

name: Influence Nature
desc: Influence the behavior of certain animals in the area.

name: Inventor
desc: Use Crafting to create item formulas.

name: Kip Up
desc: Stand up for free without triggering reactions.

name: Numb to Death
prerequisites: Diehard; you have died at least once
desc: Your past has left you numb to death’s call

name: Paragon Battle Medicine
desc: Kassi Aziril taught you her techniques that originated the modern use of Battle Medicine.

name: Party Crasher
desc: You attend all the fashionable society parties, no matter how exclusive they might be.

name: Planar Survival
desc: Use Survival to Subsist on different planes.

name: Prescient Consumable
desc: Procure consumable items with Prescient Planner.

name: Quick Change
desc: You can shift between your identities with ease.

name: Quick Climber
desc: Climb swiftly.

name: Quick Recognition
prerequisites: Recognize Spell; master in Arcana, master in Nature, master in Occultism, or master in Religion
desc: Master in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, Identify spells as a free action.

name: Quick Swim
desc: Swim quickly.

name: Quick Unlock
desc: Pick a Lock with 1 action.

name: Rapid Affixture
desc: Afﬁx a Talisman in less time.

name: Read Shibboleths
desc: All communication is filled with slight tells and signals.

name: Sacred Defense
prerequisites: you follow a deity; master in Religion
desc: You call upon your deity to grant you their protective blessing

name: Sanctify Water
prerequisites: good or evil deity; master in Religion
desc: You imbue water with your deity’s blessing

name: Scholastic Identification
desc: You have the knowledge needed to understand ancient texts and cultural artifacts.

name: Shameless Request
desc: Make Requests of others with lesser consequences.

name: Slippery Secrets
desc: Evade attempts to uncover your true nature.

name: Subjective Truth
desc: Your disparate identities allow you to defeat magic that detects lies.

name: Supertaster
desc: Gain secret checks to detect poison by taste.

name: Swift Sneak
desc: Move your full Speed while you Sneak.

name: Terrified Retreat
desc: Cause foes you Demoralize to flee.

name: Wall Jump
desc: Jump off walls.

name: Water Sprint
desc: Stride across the surface of a body of water.

name: Able Ritualist
desc: Your readings on rituals make you a skilled participant.

name: Accompany
desc: You use your performances to supplement an ally's spellcasting, providing magical energy for their spells.

name: Achaekek's Grip
desc: You sense if a creature you have slain in the last year has been restored to life, as long as you and that creature are on the same plane.

name: Acquired Tolerance
desc: A small amount of poison, taken at nonlethal doses, can help the body build up a resistance against a more deadly dosage.

name: Advanced Deity's Domain
desc: Through your conviction, you have glimpsed the deeper secrets of your deity’s domain.

name: Advanced Domain
desc: Your studies or prayers have unlocked deeper secrets of your deity’s domain.

name: Advanced School Spell
desc: You gain access to a powerful new school spell depending on your arcane school.

name: Align Armament
prerequisites: chaotic, evil, good, or lawful deity
desc: You bring a weapon into metaphysical concordance with your deity’s beliefs.

name: Ambushing Knockdown
desc: You emerge from hiding and deliver a blow that can knock an enemy sprawling to the ground.

name: Animal Rage
desc: You transform into your animal.

name: Arcane Breadth
desc: You can cast more arcane spells each day.

name: Archaeologist's Luck
desc: You are more than just skillful; your drive to find the secrets of the past manifests as a strange kind of luck.

name: Archer's Aim
desc: You slow down, focus, and take a careful shot.

name: Armiger's Mobility
prerequisites: expert in heavy armor; Hellknight Armiger Dedication
desc: You’ve learned how best to move in heavy armor.

name: Armored Rebuff
desc: You rebuff puny attacks with your armor, knocking back your foe.

name: Arrow Snatching
desc: You pluck missiles from the air and hurl them back at their source.

name: Back to Back
desc: You excel at watching your allies' backs and helping them watch yours.

name: Basic Eldritch Archer Spellcasting
desc: You gain the basic spellcasting benefits.

name: Bleeding Finisher
desc: Your blow inflicts profuse bleeding.

name: Blessed Spell
prerequisites: Blessed One Dedication; ability to cast spells from spell slots; Mercy
desc: When you focus your magic on an ally, you can remove harmful conditions.

name: Blind-Fight
desc: Your battle instincts make you more aware of concealed and invisible opponents.

name: Bloodline Breadth
desc: Your repertoire expands, and you can cast more spells of your bloodline’s tradition each day.

name: Bloodline Resistance
desc: Your magical blood makes you more resistant to magic.

name: Bond Conservation
desc: By carefully manipulating the arcane energies stored in your bonded item as you drain it, you can conserve just enough power to cast another, slightly weaker spell.

name: Bravo's Determination
prerequisites: Firebrand Braggart Dedication; expert in Deception
desc: Your confidence borders on self-delusion, but it keeps you going against overwhelming odds.

name: Breath of the Dragon
desc: You can use a powerful breath weapon, much like the dragon you emulate.

name: Bullseye
desc: You carefully take aim before making your attack in order to avoid your foe's concealment and cover.

name: Call and Response
desc: Your composition takes the form of a call-and-response chant, which lets your allies continue the effect without you.

name: Call Your Shot
desc: When you successfully Play to the Crowd, add additional benefits to the list you can choose from.

name: Channeled Succor
desc: You can remove conditions with divine grace.

name: Clinging Shadows Initiate
desc: You learn a mystical stance that transforms your ki into sticky smoke that shrouds your limbs, clinging to everything you touch.

name: Clue Them All In
desc: You can clue in all your allies at once.

name: Courageous Opportunity
desc: You bellow a ferocious call to arms, inspiring yourself to lash out at a foe.

name: Cremate Undead
desc: Your positive energy sets undead alight.

name: Crossblooded Evolution
desc: Odd interactions in your bloodline provide you with unexpected spells.

name: Crude Communication
desc: Even if you don't speak a creature's language, you can rely on inflection, root words, and body language to infer rudimentary meaning.

name: Deadly Aim
desc: You aim for your prey’s weak spots, making your shot more challenging but dealing more damage if you hit.

name: Deadly Butterfly
desc: You gain access to the butterfly sword's critical specialization effect.

name: Debilitating Dichotomy
desc: You can give others a glimpse of the impossible conflicts and unchecked power that courses through your body.

name: Deeper Dabbler
desc: With some streamlining to your process and a deeper collection of talisman materials, you make a greater number of talismans every day.

name: Deimatic Display
desc: Imitating animal threat displays, you make yourself appear larger and more imposing.

name: Delay Trap
desc: You can jam the workings of a trap to delay its effects.

name: Disarming Assault
desc: You attack with enough force to knock the weapon out of your foe's hands.

name: Disorienting Opening
desc: You use your foes' openings to expose even greater weaknesses.

name: Diverse Recognition
prerequisites: Pathfinder Agent Dedication; master in a skill used to Recall Knowledge
desc: Your Pathfinder training allows you to quickly size up numerous threats.

name: Divine Breadth
desc: You can cast more divine spells each day.

name: Dual Finisher
desc: You split your attacks.

name: Dualistic Synergy
desc: If your next action is to Cast a Spell from your spell slots, you gain a benefit.

name: Dueling Riposte
desc: You riposte against your flailing enemy.

name: Eclectic Skill
desc: Your broad experiences translate to a range of skills.

name: Efficient Rituals
desc: You can perform some rituals in less time.

name: Elude the Divine
desc: You are able to escape inquisitions involving divine magic, allowing you to blend in well in Mzali but also to avoid unwanted attention in other oppressive theocracies.

name: Emblazon Energy
desc: With elemental forces, you make your emblazoned symbols more potent.

name: Enchanting Arrow
desc: With a single whisper carried on the wind, you enchant your ammunition to make a foe more vulnerable to your attacks.

name: Enlarge Companion
desc: You make your companion enormous.

name: Familiar Form
desc: You can use your magic to transform into a small creature of a type that commonly serves as a spellcaster's familiar, potentially allowing you to safely scout for your party while retaining a degree of spellcasting ability.

name: Felling Strike
desc: Your attack can ground an airborne foe.

name: Feral Mutagen
desc: Your bestial mutagen brings out the beast lurking within you.

name: Ferocious Shape
desc: You have mastered the shape of ferocious dinosaurs.

name: Fey Caller
desc: You have learned some of the tricks the fey use to bend primal magic toward illusions and trickery.

name: Flamboyant Cruelty
desc: You love to kick your enemies when they're down, and you look fabulous when you do.

name: Flensing Slice
desc: When you hit with both attacks with Double Slice, you flense the target, making it bleed and creating a weak spot.

name: Follow-Up Assault
desc: Even in the face of failure you press the attack, determined to succeed.

name: Foolproof Instructions
desc: You feel confident that you can explain your scrolls so well that even your allies can use them.

name: Form Retention
desc: You have trained your mind and body to tolerate polymorph magic for longer periods of time, so long as you prepare for the change appropriately.

name: Fortified Flesh
desc: Your flesh is resistent to physical damage.

name: Friendly Toss
desc: You toss your friends around the battlefield.

name: Furious Bully
desc: You bully foes across the battlefield.

name: Garden Path
desc: You can guide your crop to move without notice.

name: Glyph Expert
desc: You've learned to recognize the telltale writings and other signs that indicate the presence of magical traps.

name: Golden League Xun Dedication
desc: You are a xun for the Golden League, aiding the organization.

name: Golem Grafter Dedication
prerequisites: expert in Arcana and Crafting, or an ally with expert proficiency in those skills willing to augment you
desc: Your flesh has been specially treated with the same arcane and alchemical processes used to toughen the skin of flesh golems.

name: Great Boaster
desc: Your bragging is particularly effective.

name: Greater Cruelty
desc: The extent of the corruption within you does more than simply sap your foes' strength, it devastates their minds and reflexes.

name: Greater Mercy
desc: Your faith enhances your ability to remove conditions.

name: Grievous Blow
desc: You know how to deliver focused, powerful blows that bypass your enemies' resistances.

name: Hazard Finder
desc: You have an intuitive ability to sense hazards.

name: Heal Mount
prerequisites: divine ally (steed); devotion spell (lay on hands)
desc: Your devotion to your mount manifests as a surge of positive energy.

name: Impassable Wall Stance
desc: You refuse to let foes past your guard.

name: Improved Poison Weapon
desc: You deliver poisons in ways that maximize their harmful effects.

name: Improvised Crafting
desc: You've learned to repair your equipment even in challenging circumstances, making use of what you have available.

name: Improvised Critical
desc: You can apply critical specialization effects to improvised weapons you wield.

name: Incredible Aim
desc: By spending a moment to focus, you can ensure your attack strikes true.

name: Incredible Beastmaster's Companion
desc: Your mature animal companions continue to grow and develop.

name: Incredible Companion (Druid)
desc: Your animal companion continues to grow and develop.

name: Incredible Familiar (Witch)
desc: Your familiar is imbued with even more magic than other familiars.

name: Incredible Mount
desc: Under your care and training, your mount has realized its innate potential.

name: Innate Magic Intuition
desc: You've spent countless hours learning to recognize and predict a creature's innate magical abilities.

name: Insistent Command
source: Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God
prerequisites: Animal Trainer Dedication; master in Nature
desc: When you roll a success to Command an Animal, you get a critical success.

name: Inspirational Performance
desc: You gain the inspire courage composition cantrip.

name: Inspire Heroics
desc: Your performances inspire even greater deeds in your allies.

name: Inspired Stratagem
desc: You quickly advise your ally, using your earlier planning to make sure luck can't throw a wrench in the cogs of your schemes.

name: Instinctive Strike
prerequisites: Acute Scent or precise or imprecise scent
desc: You trust your instincts and your sense of smell, using all of your senses to pinpoint your opponent's location.

name: Invoke the Crimson Oath
desc: You can invoke the Crimson Oath to unleash blasts of ruby energy from your weapon.

name: Ironblood Stance
desc: You enter the stance of impenetrable iron, refusing to yield to any blow.

name: Know-It-All
desc: Your knowledge of the world expands beyond what you have read.

name: Lethargy Poisoner
prerequisites: Drow Shootist Dedication; trained in Crafting
desc: You've learned more than the use of hand crossbows from drow lore.

name: Levering Strike
source: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
desc: Strike your foe and make them unbalanced

name: Loaner Spell
prerequisites: trained in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
desc: During your daily preparations, you can gain the assistance of an allied prepared spellcaster to prepare one spell for the day.

name: Lobbed Attack
source: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
desc: Make an unexpected ranged attack with a Juggled item.

name: Lore Seeker
desc: You see what others don’t, and you’ve developed magical tricks to find hidden truth.

name: Lorefinder
desc: You know that fate sometimes conspires to keep dangerous knowledge or items from the eyes of those most able to understand them.

name: Magic Arrow
desc: You imbue your ammunition with eldritch power.

name: Magic Finder
desc: You've learned a few tricks to ensure you find every last magic item and interesting magical effect during your missions.

name: Makeshift Strike
desc: You quickly snatch up whatever's nearby and then attack with it as an improvised weapon.

name: Mantis Form
desc: You can transform yourself into a mantis battle form.

name: Many Guises
desc: You can take on any number of mundane guises.

name: Martyr
desc: You go to extreme lengths to support your allies, even when it means bringing harm to yourself.

name: Masked Casting
desc: You harness the magical energy flowing through your eyeless mask to effortlessly protect you from visual effects.

name: Mixed Maneuver
desc: You combine two different maneuvers together into a single flowing whole.

name: Mobile Shot Stance
desc: Your shots become nimble and deadly.

name: Monk Moves
desc: You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed when you’re not wearing armor.

name: Murksight
desc: Your vision pierces through non-magical fog, mist, rain, and snow.

name: Mutable Familiar
desc: Your familiar's supernatural spirit has outgrown its corporeal body.

name: Mysterious Breadth
desc: Increase the spell slots you gain from oracle archetype feats by 1 for each spell level other than your two highest spell levels.

name: Necromantic Tenacity
desc: Reduce the power that necromantic effects hold over you.

name: Nimble Roll
desc: You throw yourself into a roll to escape imminent danger.

name: Occult Breadth
desc: Your repertoire expands, and you can cast more occult spells each day.

name: Ooze Empathy
prerequisites: Oozemorph Dedication; at least two other class feats from the oozemorph archetype
desc: You can connect with oozes (and other amorphous aberrations, at the GM's discretion) on a rudimentary level.

name: Opportune Backstab
desc: When your enemy is hit by your ally, you capitalize upon the distraction.

name: Opportunistic Grapple
desc: You attempt an Athletics check to Grapple your prey.

name: Order Training
desc: You gain the lesser order benefit for the Hellknight order to which you belong.

name: Patron's Breadth
desc: You can cast more spells each day.

name: Peer Beyond
desc: You have uncanny insight into the way ghosts and haunts manifest, manipulate the mind, and rejuvenate.

name: Perpetual Breadth
desc: You have expanded your supply of near-infinite items.

name: Persistent Creation
desc: You can cast creation as an innate spell at will, choosing whether it is arcane or primal each time.

name: Physical Training
prerequisites: Swordmaster Dedication; expert in Acrobatics and Athletics
desc: You spend a lot of time focusing on your physical fitness.

name: Pinning Fire
desc: You target your opponent's clothing, equipment, or loose flesh with piercing projectiles to pin them to the ground or a nearby surface.

name: Pinpoint Poisoner
desc: Unsuspecting targets are especially vulnerable to your poisons.

name: Positioning Assault
desc: With punishing blows, you force your opponent into position.

name: Powerful Snares
desc: Your snares are particularly dif cult for enemies to avoid.

name: Practiced Guidance
desc: You can better Aid your crop.

name: Precious Arrow
desc: You enchant a piece of ammunition with the magical essence of a precious material, allowing you to leverage certain creatures' weaknesses.

name: Predictive Purchase (Rogue)
desc: You somehow manage to have just the thing for the situation.

name: Primal Breadth
desc: You can cast more primal spells per day.

name: Protect Ally
desc: You place your body between your friends and your enemies, protecting your allies against oncoming attacks.

name: Quick Block
desc: You can block with your shield instinctively.

name: Quick Shield Block
desc: You can bring your shield into place with hardly a thought.

name: Quick Stow (Swordmaster)
desc: You know that situations can change rapidly and might leave you needing to change equipment in the middle of combat.

name: Read Disaster
desc: You spend 10 minutes and open yourself to the divine mysteries of the world, peering into the most sinister portents of the future.

name: Recognize Threat
prerequisites: master in a Recall Knowledge skill; Pathfinder Agent Dedication
desc: You quickly assess the threat so you can relay the information to your team.

name: Reflexive Grip
desc: You keep hold of your weapons even when knocked out.

name: Renewed Vigor
desc: You pause to recover your raging vigor.

name: Resounding Bravery
desc: Even your fears serve as fuel for your fighting spirit.

name: Ricochet Stance (Rogue)
desc: You adopt a stance to rebound your thrown weapons toward you.

name: Sacrifice Armor
desc: With divine awareness, you twist your body to lessen the impact of an attack.

name: Safeguarded Spell
desc: You bring the magical wavelengths of your spell into sync with the ones produced by your own body.

name: Scarecrow
desc: You fight fiercely to protect your crop.

name: Second Ally
desc: Your inner grace attracts the attention of a second protective spirit.

name: Selfless Parry
desc: You protect those near you with a flash of steel.

name: Sense Chaos
desc: You sense chaos as an unsettling feeling of nervous energy.

name: Sense Evil
desc: You sense evil as a queasy or foreboding feeling.

name: Sense Good
desc: The presence of goodness sickens you with its saccharine self-righteousness.

name: Shadowdancer Dedication
prerequisites: expert in Performance and master in Stealth
desc: You dedicate yourself to the shadows.

name: Share Rage
desc: You stoke an ally’s fury.

name: Shoving Sweep
desc: You swing your weapon at your foe, rebuffing them back.

name: Sidestep
desc: You deftly step out of the way of an attack, letting the blow continue to the creature next to you.

name: Sixth Pillar Dedication
prerequisites: ability to cast spells; Dexterity 14; expert in Acrobatics
desc: You use your physical discipline to channel your magic.

name: Skill Mastery (Investigator)
prerequisites: Investigator Dedication; trained in at least one skill and expert in at least one skill
desc: Increase your proficiency rank in one of your skills from expert to master and in another of your skills from trained to expert.

name: Skill Mastery (Rogue)
prerequisites: Rogue Dedication; trained in at least one skill and expert in at least one skill
desc: Increase your proficiency rank in one of your skills from expert to master.

name: Skim Scroll
desc: You can activate the magic of a scroll with a cursory read as you draw it from your belt.

name: Skyseeker
desc: You Leap toward an opponent.

name: Sly Striker
desc: Your attacks deal more damage, even against creatures that aren’t flat-footed.

name: Snap Out of It! (Pathfinder Agent)
prerequisites: Pathfinder Agent Dedication; master in Medicine
desc: Pathfinders are trained to help each other be safe and successful, and you know how to jolt your allies back to their senses.

name: Soaring Shape
desc: Wings free you from the shackles of the ground below.

name: Soulsight
prerequisites: [Sorcerer] bloodline that grants divine or occult spells
desc: Your muse has opened your senses to the world beyond.

name: Sticky Bomb
desc: You mix in an additive to make your bomb’s contents adhere to the target and continue to deal damage.

name: Stunning Finisher
desc: You attempt a dizzying blow.

name: Subtle Shank
desc: You draw a concealed weapon, attack with it, and then hide it away again in one smooth motion.

name: Sudden Leap
desc: You swing at a foe while mid-leap.

name: Surging Focus
desc: When an ally you can see falls in battle, your fight or flight response triggers a surge in your deity's might within you.

name: Surreptitious Spellcaster
desc: You’ve learned that it pays for a Pathfinder to be able to cast spells without being noticed.

name: Survivor of Desolation
desc: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against unnatural weather events or environmental hazards occurring in blighted or otherwise unnaturally marred regions.

name: Swashbuckler's Speed
desc: You move faster, with or without panache.

name: Syu Tak-Nwa's Hexed Locks
desc: Your hair attacks gain the reach trait and you can deliver hexes through it.

name: Tactical Entry
desc: Stride without triggering reactions

name: Tangled Forest Stance
desc: You extend your arms like gnarled branches to interfere with your foes’ movements.

name: Terrain Master
desc: You adapt to your surroundings in any natural terrain.

name: Thrash
desc: You thrash the grabbed foe around.

name: To Battle!
desc: With a resounding cry, you rally your ally to the offensive.

name: Transcribe Moment
desc: You gain the transcribe moment focus spell.

name: Tumbling Strike
desc: Attempt an Acrobatics check against the Reflex DC of an enemy adjacent to you.

name: Unfazed Assessment
prerequisites: Zephyr Guard Dedication; expert in Perception
desc: You have witnessed hundreds of fighting styles and quickly adapt to defend against complicated maneuvers.

name: Universal Versatility
prerequisites: universalist wizard; Hand of the Apprentice
desc: You can access the fundamental abilities of any school of magic.

name: Unravel Mysteries
prerequisites: master in a Decipher Writing skill; Scrollmaster Dedication
desc: You can understand the true meaning of texts quickly, and even when you get lost or hit a dead end, you aren’t discouraged from making further attempts to get to the bottom of things.

name: Unshakable Idealism
prerequisites: Knight Vigilant; expert in Will saves
desc: Your faith and hope can’t be shaken, and you won’t flee when lives are at stake.

name: Vivacious Bravado
desc: Your ego swells, granting you a temporary reprieve from your pain.

name: Walk the Plank
desc: You frighten a foe into moving where you want them, traditionally demanding they walk the plank.

name: Wall Run
desc: You defy gravity, traversing vertical planes as easily as the ground.

name: Warden's Boon
desc: By pointing out vulnerabilities, you grant an ally benefits from your hunting abilities.

name: Wayfinder Resonance Infiltrator
prerequisites: Pathfinder Agent Dedication; Wayfinder Resonance Tinkerer
desc: You are adept at using the unusual resonance of your wayfinder to aid in any deceptions you might employ.

name: Whodunnit?
desc: You carefully consider your case and narrow down some of the details.

name: Wild Winds Initiate
desc: You learn a mystical stance that lets you attack from a distance.

name: Wind Caller
desc: You bid the winds to lift and carry you through the air.

name: Witch's Bottle
desc: You spend 10 minutes and 1 Focus Point brewing a special potion containing the power of one of your hexes that targets a creature.

name: Aboleth Transmutation
desc: You have tapped into the ancient magic used by alghollthu masters to mold the flesh of your ancestors.

name: Absorb Toxin
prerequisites: You are not immune to diseases or poisons
desc: Your skin readily absorbs poison and can consciously draw toxins into your body to spare others.

name: Accursed Claws
desc: Your claws carry your mother's hag magic.

name: Agathion Magic
desc: The harmonious magic of Nirvana flows through you.

name: Aggravating Scratch
desc: Your claws carry an irritant that is harmless to you but can be damaging to others.

name: Analyze Information
desc: You can stoke your mind into a burst of analytical prowess.

name: Anarchic Arcana
desc: The magic in your blood is unpredictable.

name: Ancillary Motes
desc: You can use Crystalline Dust one more time per day.

name: Angelic Magic
desc: You can tap into the magic of angels that runs through your blood.

name: Animal Magic
desc: Your shapeshifting grants you a magical connection to the animal world.

name: Archon Magic
desc: You can tap into the heavenly magic that is your birthright.

name: Azarketi Purification
desc: You can cast purify food and drink as a primal innate spell, but only on liquids.

name: Azata Magic
desc: Your lineage traces back to the realm of Elysium, and you can harness its magic using this connection.

name: Bark and Tendril
desc: You wield primal magic.

name: Battleforger
desc: You can sharpen weapons, polish armor, and apply special techniques to temporarily gain better effects from your armaments.

name: Between the Scales
desc: Underestimating you is a grave mistake, but it's one others keep making.

name: Big Mouth
desc: Your cheek pouches are especially stretchy.

name: Bloodletting Fangs
desc: You emulate your vampiric parent's techniques for drawing blood from a victim.

name: Bone Caller
desc: Using a mixture of dinosaur bones and the bones of your ancestors to focus your magic, you animate lizards and dinosaurs to carry messages or serve as mounts.

name: Breath Like Honey
desc: You smell of honey and savory things.

name: Briar Battler
desc: You've learned to use roots, crevices, uneven ground, and dense underbrush to your advantage.

name: Brightness Seeker
desc: Once per day, you can spend 10 minutes studying your surroundings in search of omens related to a particular course of action to cast augury as an innate divine spell.

name: Call of Elysium
desc: The wild wonder of Elysium harmonizes within you, and in dire straits, you can share its benefits with your allies.

name: Cantorian Rejuvenation
desc: The life-giving energy that flows in your blood revitalizes you.

name: Captivating Curosity
desc: You can snare the attentions of onlookers with your unique appearance.

name: Catrina's Presence
desc: You've adopted the calming presence of catrinas, the festive dead..

name: Cautious Curiosity
prerequisites: at least one arcane or occult innate spell gained from a gnome heritage or gnome ancestry feat
desc: You've learned a few magical techniques for getting yourself both into and out of trouble unnoticed.

name: Cave Climber
desc: After years of crawling and climbing through caverns, you can climb easily anywhere you go.

name: Celestial Wings
desc: With effort, you can call forth magical wings from your back, similar in appearance to those of your celestial forebears.

name: Ceremony of Aeon's Guidance
desc: Your patron aeon has allowed you to call upon their gifts to serve their ends.

name: Ceremony of Aeon's Shield
desc: Your patron aeon graced you with powers of protection.

name: Ceremony of Fortification
desc: Your exoskeleton arranges itself into an optimal defensive shape.

name: Ceremony of the Strengthened Hand
desc: Your exoskeleton's weapons are even more potent.

name: Charred Remains
desc: Your next fire spell leaves embers in its wake.

name: Cling
desc: You hang onto a foe to harry them into submission.

name: Close Quarters
desc: You've trained to fight with allies in tunnel warrens, dense undergrowth, or similarly cramped terrain.

name: Coating of Slime
desc: An acidic ooze coats your limbs.

name: Constant Gaze
desc: Your eyes keep a continual watch for dangers from all sides.

name: Cooperative Soul
desc: You have developed a soul-deep bond with your comrades and maintain an even greater degree of cooperation with them.

name: Crystalline Cloud
desc: When you use Crystalline Dust, you can spend one additional action to disperse the motes as a 10-foot-radius cloud centered on you instead of as haze; the activity gains the concentrate trait.

name: Cunning Climber
desc: Whether you are climbing a ship’s rigging, a jungle tree, or a clock tower, you have an uncanny knack for finding footholds and handholds where larger creatures can’t.

name: Daemon Magic
desc: The magic of Abaddon runs through your blood, and you can wield that power.

name: Dance Underfoot
desc: You dart under the legs of your enemies in combat.

name: Dangle
desc: You can hang by your tail from any suitable anchor point, such as a tree branch, balcony, or rocky outcropping (subject to the GM's discretion), typically while climbing.

name: Death's Drums
desc: Your life has been spent challenging death itself, and proximity to that implacable foe only makes your heart beat harder.

name: Defensive Instincts
desc: Your body tenses up when surrounded, putting you on edge just enough to anticipate an attack.

name: Demon Magic
desc: You can channel the power of the Abyss through your heritage, producing terrible tangible effects.

name: Devil Magic
desc: Drawing on the infernal power of your sinister forbears, you mislead your foes with magical deception.

name: Dig Up Secrets
desc: You are an endless well of knowledge and can remember several vital pieces of information at once.

name: Disorienting Venom
desc: The venom injected by your fangs disorients your foes.

name: Divine Countermeasures
desc: You've studied your celestial heritage with the intent of better defending yourself, and you've found that your techniques are equally powerful against celestials, fiends, and other divine entities.

name: Djinni Magic
desc: The magic of djinn runs through your blood.

name: Dracomancer
desc: Your inborn arcane power manifests as your exemplar's most time-honored spells.

name: Dragon Grip
desc: Your hold has a unique draconic connection.

name: Dragon Prince
desc: The blood of the Dragon Kings runs strong in your veins.

name: Dragonblood Paragon
prerequisites: Strongjaw Kobold heritage, Dracomancer, Kobold Breath, or Venomtail Kobold heritage
desc: Your draconic anatomy becomes especially pronounced.

name: Dragon's Breath
desc: You can put more effort into your Kobold Breath to channel greater draconic power, though it takes more out of you.

name: Duskwalker Magic
desc: Your connection to psychopomps gives you the power to glimpse the near future and protect corpses from the ravages of undeath.

name: Earthsense
desc: Your connection to earth and stone allows you to feel the slightest displacement that disturbs them, down to the shift of a pebble.

name: Echoes in Stone
desc: You pause a moment to attune your senses to the stone around you.

name: Eclectic Sword Training
desc: You were always taught that you needed to be able to use whatever weapon came your way.

name: Eerie Compression
desc: Your limbs and even your torso can collapse in on themselves, allowing you to fit through tight spaces as though you were a Small creature.

name: Efreeti Magic
desc: The magic of your efreeti ancestors flows through you.

name: Elf Step
desc: You move in a graceful dance, and even your steps are broad.

name: Energize Wings
desc: You stoke your magic to energize your wings, temporarily transforming them into glowing, majestic forms.

name: Energy Blessed
desc: Energy runs through your blood more powerfully.

name: Evade Doom
desc: You can elude supernatural disaster.

name: Expert Longevity
desc: You’ve continued to refine the knowledge and skills you’ve gained through your life.

name: Fade Away
desc: Your ability to blend into the background allows you to fade away entirely or appear innocuous even to magical effects.

name: Fell Rider
desc: You have trained with your animal companion to become a terrifying, unified juggernaut on the battlefield.

name: Ferocious Gust
desc: With heavy wing beats, you whip up a furious gust and direct it at your opponents.

name: Fey Magic
desc: You can use faerie magic to hide yourself and expose hidden foes.

name: Fiendish Wings
desc: You can strain to call forth bat-like or otherwise fiendish wings from your back, similar in appearance to those of your fiendish ancestors.

name: First World Adept
prerequisites: at least one primal innate spell
desc: Over time your fey magic has grown stronger.

name: Fortutious Shift
desc: You have grown more comfortable with your penchant for supernatural disappearance.

name: Fox Trick
desc: You always have time for a joke or prank.

name: Freeze It!
desc: You are no rime hag or Jadwiga, but the magic of the north has still left a mark on you.

name: Garuda Magic
desc: You are descended from the wondrous garudas, and their keen senses manifest in your magical prowess.

name: Glory and Valor!
desc: You are descended from the einherji, the worthy warriors of chaos.

name: Grandmother's Wisdom
desc: You carry the bones of your ancestors with you, and you can ask them for counsel.

name: Gripping Limbs
desc: Nodules, hooks, or claws on your limbs allow you to cling to surfaces with ease.

name: Group Aid
desc: Your upbringing emphasized teamwork and helping your allies comes naturally to you.

name: Guiding Luck
desc: Your luck guides you to look the right way and aim your blows unerringly.

name: Hardy Traveler
desc: There's no journey too far or burden too heavy when your friends are at your side.

name: Hefting Shadow
desc: Your shadow can contain objects.

name: Heir of the Saoc
desc: In the past, you would have been a proud initiate of the Saoc Brethren.

name: Helpful Halfling
desc: When you aid a friend with a task, you find many ways to help and avoid interfering.

name: Heroes' Call
desc: The songs of ancient heroes echo through your mind and quicken your pulse, especially in dire straits.

name: Hungry Goblin
desc: You’ll eat anything and anyone.

name: Improvisational Warrior
desc: You have increased skill with improvised weapons.

name: Incredible Improvisation
desc: A stroke of brilliance gives you a major advantage with a skill despite your inexperience.

name: Inner Breath
desc: Your body is capable of recycling its own air.

name: Internal Respirator
desc: Your body can internally synthesize oxygen for limited periods of time.

name: Invoke the Elements
prerequisites: Brine May, Snow May, Veil May, or Virga May
desc: You summon an aura of shimmering heat, flurrying snow, crashing waves, or swirling wind and lightning.

name: Irrepressible
desc: You are easily able to ward off attempts to play on your fears and emotions.

name: Janni Hospitality
desc: You can use magic to show others desert hospitality.

name: Janni Magic
desc: The magic of jann runs through your blood.

name: Juvenile Flight
desc: You unfold your wings for travel and can keep them unfolded for 10 minutes.

name: Kneel for No God
desc: Your ancestors’ defiance of magic and your people’s strictly egalitarian mindset mean that certain forms of magic have little effect on you.

name: Larcenous Tail
desc: Your tail's chaotic and independent nature causes it to perform mischief even when you don't intend it, and it can somehow steal things it shouldn't be able to handle.

name: Laughing Gnoll
desc: A gnoll's sinister giggle is a sound of warning and threat.

name: Life Leap
desc: You phase through a space that a living creature occupies in a flash, spontaneously appearing on the opposite side of it in a vibrant display of colorful light.

name: Light from Darkness
desc: You've battled the fiendish power within your nature and come out on top; whatever you decide to do with your life, for good or evil, will be your choice and your choice alone.

name: Lucky Keepsake
desc: You have a keepsake that grants you luck.

name: Marid Magic
desc: You channel the magic of marids.

name: Mask of Pain
desc: Your mask has grown into a manifestation of your pain, which you can release.

name: Morrigna's Spider Affinity
desc: Much like morrignas, you feel an affinity for spiders.

name: Mother's Mindfulness
desc: You have the protective instinct your own mother lacks and will gladly suffer in another's place.

name: Mountain's Stoutness
desc: Your hardiness lets you withstand more punishment than most before going down.

name: Multitalented
desc: You’ve learned to split your focus between multiple classes with ease.

name: Night Magic
desc: You can tap into the magic that runs through your blood.

name: No Evidence
desc: You leave little sign when attempting to remain unseen.

name: Occult Resistance
desc: Your study of occult practices has shown you how to best defend against them.

name: Offensive Subroutine
desc: Nanites augment your attacks.

name: Otherworldly Acumen
prerequisites: at least one innate spell gained from an elf ancestry feat
desc: The arcane magic you possess grows in power and complexity.

name: Overcrowd
desc: Your physiology is slight, and you can pack into small spaces with others of similar stature.

name: Pack Tactics
desc: You have mastered how to hunt with your pack.

name: Peri Magic
desc: The shimmering embers of the righteous peris crackle at your fingertips.

name: Pervasive Superstition
desc: You steep yourself in superstition and practice ancient orc mental exercises for shrugging off the effects of magic.

name: Piercing Quills
desc: Your quills can dig particularly deep into the flesh of your opponents.

name: Pinch Time
desc: One of your parents has a human life span and another an elven life span, with your own somewhere between.

name: Predator's Growl
desc: You give a throaty growl to attempt to Demoralize a creature you just found.

name: Preemptive Reconfiguration
desc: Your body anticipates the blow.

name: Pride in Arms
desc: With a shout of triumph, you grant inspiration to an ally fight on.

name: Qlippoth Magic
desc: You've deeply studied the secrets of your blood and can force reality to act against its own wishes.

name: Quill Spray
prerequisites: Quillcoat Shisk heritage or quill unarmed attack
desc: You can launch a mass of quills at opponents.

name: Rakshasa Magic
desc: You remember the secrets of your rakshasa forebears and know how to apply those memories to get results.

name: Rat Form
desc: You can transform into an innocuous-looking rat to scout an area or slip through tight spaces.

name: Read the Stars
prerequisites: trained in Astrology Lore or Occultism
desc: You're incredibly skilled in iruxi astrology, and you can gain useful (if cryptic) hints from the stars' alignment.

name: Repair Module
desc: You trigger your body's repair programming, causing your body's nanites to heal your wounds.

name: Replenishing Hydration
desc: You draw life from the water around you.

name: Returning Throw
desc: You have mastered the technique of arcing a projectile so that it returns to your hand after being thrown, though this requires a moment to precisely calculate the trajectory and possible ricochets.

name: Ricocheting Leap
desc: You quickly use your momentum to topple and spring off of foes.

name: Riptide
desc: Drag a grabbed creature into nearby water

name: Rokoan Arts
desc: Ancestral spirits have begun to bond themselves to you, granting you powers characteristic of a rokoa.

name: Roll with It
desc: When you take a big hit, your foe bounces you around like a rubber ball, but you escape the worst of the blow.

name: Scalding Spit
desc: Your bodily fluids burn with surprising volatility, as if you ran on oil instead of blood.

name: Scorching Disarm
desc: You make a weapon unbearable to hold.

name: Sculpt Shadows
desc: You coax nearby shadows into the shape of a simple weapon or a simple tool or item, using a tiny piece of your shadow to make it solid; in doing so, you lose 1 Hit Point.

name: Sense for Trouble
desc: You can tell when something's off.

name: Sense Thoughts
desc: You have an even stranger knack for knowing what other people are thinking.

name: Shadow Sight
desc: You draw on your connection with the Shadow Plane to see through all but the deepest darkness.

name: Shaitan Magic
desc: The magic of shaitans runs through your blood.

name: Shared Luck (Catfolk)
desc: Other creatures can benefit from your luck

name: Shory Aeromancer
prerequisites: Garundi ethnicity, Mauxi ethnicity, or Tian-Yae ethnicity
desc: Your ancestors hailed from the flying cities of the Shory, and a few simple tricks have come down through the ages to you.

name: Silent Step
desc: You vanish with silent treads.

name: Skittering Scuttle
desc: You can scuttle farther and faster when maneuvering alongside allies.

name: Slip into Shadow
prerequisites: ability to cast at least one spell with the darkness trait
desc: Your shadow magic bleeds into the space around you.

name: Slip the Grasp
desc: You have some feature that allows you to quickly evade effects that restrain you.

name: Snare Commando
prerequisites: Snare Crafting; expert in Deception or Intimidation
desc: Your snares are so befuddling that your victims rarely notice you slipping out of sight.

name: Soaring Flight
desc: To be a tengu is to be unburdened by the concerns of the world below.

name: Sodbuster
desc: Years toiling in soil have made you an expert digger.

name: Solar Rejuvenation
desc: If you rest outdoors for 10 minutes during the day, you regain Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier × half your level.

name: Spirit Strikes
desc: Your connection to the Boneyard empowers you to bring death to all forms of life and unlife, exploiting their weaknesses.

name: Spore Cloud
desc: You unleash a cloud of pollen or similar spores.

name: Squad Tactics
desc: You are adept at working with your allies to surround a foe.

name: Stone Bones
desc: Your intractable nature can help you shrug off even the most grievous injuries.

name: Stonewalker
desc: You have a deep reverence for and connection to stone.

name: Strand Strider
desc: Your eight legs serve you well when climbing walls and webs alike.

name: Strong Swimmer
desc: Your swim Speed increases to match your land Speed.

name: Studious Adept
desc: You achieve a breakthrough in your exploration of magic.

name: Terrain Advantage
desc: You can take advantage of the terrain to bypass foes’ defenses.

name: Tetraelemental Assault
desc: Your Elemental Assault cycles through all four elements.

name: Thorned Seedpod
desc: When your seedpods strike a felling blow, they burst into viciously thorny vines.

name: Tongue Tether
desc: Your tongue can momentarily latch on as readily as your hands.

name: Tree Climber (Elf)
desc: You've spent much of your life among the treetops and have become an expert at quickly and safely climbing them.

name: Uncanny Cheeks
desc: You squirrel away useful objects and seem to retrieve them at just the right time.

name: Undying Ferocity
desc: You resist death's clutches with supernatural vigor.

name: Unhampered Passage
desc: You won't allow others to restrain you.

name: Velstrac Magic
desc: You know there's so much more to sensation than whips and chains—but whips and chains also have their place.

name: Virtue-Forged Tattoos
desc: Your tattoos are a work of eldritch genius, a masterpiece of art, magic, and skin.

name: Vivacious Conduit
desc: Your connection to the First World has grown, and its positive energy flows into you rapidly.

name: Wary Skulker
desc: Ever alert, you scout for danger even when you are trying to stay hidden.

name: Water Dancer
desc: You glide through the water with graceful ease.

name: Water Strider
desc: Water cradles your every step, allowing you to walk on its surface.

name: Web Hunter
desc: Through the careful cultivation of highly sensitive hairs, you've developed the ability to sense creatures without seeing them.

name: Well-Groomed
desc: You are fastidious about keeping yourself clean

name: Wind God's Fan
desc: Your fan can stir up even more powerful winds.

name: Wing Step
desc: With a sharp flap of your wings, you stay light on your feet as you move.

name: Wings of Air
desc: You can strain to call forth feathered or cloudy wings from your back.

name: Accursed Clay Fist
prerequisites: Golem Grafter Dedication; expert in unarmed attacks
desc: You have replaced one of your forearms with one made of clay and infused with cursed arcane magic.

name: Agile Grace
desc: Your graceful moves with agile weapons are beyond compare.

name: Ancestral Mage
desc: The magic of your ancestry and bloodline are one and the same.

name: Angel of Death
desc: All your Strikes against a creature you have Marked for Death have the death trait, causing the mark to be instantly killed when reduced to 0 Hit Points.

name: Annotate Composition
desc: By putting composition to paper, you can create a source of stirring words or song that others can read and understand.

name: Armor Rune Shifter
source: Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City
desc: You learn the secrets of armor runes by viewing them through gems and can alter them at your discretion.

name: Armored Rest
prerequisites: Swordmaster Dedication; trained in light, medium, or heavy armor
desc: You've slept many nights in your armor and gotten used to it.

name: Assured Ritualist
desc: You can cover for a secondary caster's error.

name: Attunement to Stone
desc: You can feel vibrations through the ground.

name: Beastmaster Bond
desc: You can communicate telepathically with your animal companions within 100 feet.

name: Beneath Notice
prerequisites: Golden League Xun Dedication; expert in Deception
desc: You are skilled at hiding from your foes and targets among the common populace.

name: Bestiary Scholar
prerequisites: Scrollmaster Dedication; master in Arcana, Crafting, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
desc: You learn how to apply your extensive knowledge of certain creatures using the lore you know.

name: Buckler Dance
desc: You spin your buckler defensively toward every attack.

name: Camouflage
desc: You alter your appearance to blend in to the wilderness.

name: Cascade Bearer's Spellcasting
prerequisites: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication; Cascade Bearers affiliation
desc: Your Cascade Bearer training allows you to broaden the horizons of your halcyon spells further than most Magaambyans, weaving in spiritual magic.

name: Castigating Weapon
desc: The force of your deity’s castigation strengthens your body so you can strike down the wicked.

name: Cautious Delver
desc: You've studied the many ways that ancient architects and spellcasters protected their possessions, such as by implementing deadly traps and curses, and learned some magic to counteract them.

name: Certain Strike
desc: Even when you don’t hit squarely, you can still score a glancing blow.

name: Cobra Envenom
prerequisites: Cobra Stance; expert in unarmed attacks
desc: You lash out with devious intent and the power to envenom your foe.

name: Combat Reflexes
desc: You are particularly swift at punishing foes who leave you openings.

name: Come and Get Me
desc: You open yourself to attacks so you can respond in turn.

name: Command Attention
desc: You command the attention of all around you with style, ensuring their gaze falls only upon you until the end of your next turn.

name: Courageous Assault
desc: With a mighty shout, you can stir an ally to attack.

name: Cut from the Air
desc: You can knock aside ranged attacks.

name: Daring Flourish
desc: You make quick use of an opening from your daring stunts.

name: Debilitating Shot
desc: Aiming for a weak point, you impede your foe with a precise shot.

name: Demanding Challenge
desc: If your skill check to challenge a foe is a success, the target of your challenge takes a –1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls (or –2 if you critically succeed) until the end of your next turn.

name: Deny Support
desc: Keep opponents from flanking when you Feint them.

name: Derring-Do
desc: When you compound panache with even more derring-do, it somehow tends to work out.

name: Destructive Block
desc: You can protect yourself more effectively, at the expense of your shield.

name: Determined Dash
desc: Nothing can keep you from your enemy.

name: Devoted Focus
desc: Your devotion is strong enough to increase your focus to incredible heights.

name: Disarming Twist
desc: After your initial attack redirects your foe’s defenses, your follow-up wrests their weapon from their grasp.

name: Disruptive Stance
desc: The slightest distraction can provoke your wrath, and you’re prepared to foil enemies’ actions.

name: Dual-Weapon Blitz
desc: You attack as you dash among foes.

name: Dueling Dance (Swashbuckler)
desc: Using your free hand as pivot and balance, you both attack and defend with your weapon.

name: Eidetic Memorization
desc: Pathfinders are often asked to study the intricacies of ancient history under less than ideal conditions, and you've trained your brain to make the most of your limited time.

name: Elastic Mutagen
desc: You can cause your body to twist and flow like the quicksilver within your mutagens.

name: Eldritch Debilitations
desc: You know how to apply debilitations that are particularly troublesome for spellcasters.

name: Elemental Shape
desc: You understand the fundamental elements of nature such that you can imbue them into your body.

name: Elucidating Mercy
desc: Your mercy grants clarity to those around you just when they need it most.

name: Emerald Boughs Hideaway
prerequisites: Magaambyan Attendant Dedication; Emerald Boughs affiliation
desc: You use Emerald Bough techniques to create a small extradimensional space called a hideaway that lasts as long as you are conscious.

name: Endure Death's Touch
prerequisites: Knight Vigilant; expert in medium or heavy armor
desc: Your conviction redirects the undead’s attack through your armor and then harmlessly away.

name: Energy Fusion
desc: You fuse two spells together, combining their energy types.

name: Energy Ward
desc: You trap energy from the last spell you cast within your body, coating your flesh in a protective ward.

name: Entwined Energy Ki
desc: You can transform your inner power into a type of energy to empower your ki abilities.

name: Everyone Duck!
desc: You intentionally set off the trap, but you take special precautions to protect yourself and your allies from the trap’s effects.

name: Expanded Splash
desc: The particularly volatile compounds that you brew into your bombs result in them creating especially large and powerful explosions.

name: Fading
desc: You fade partially from reality.

name: Fearsome Brute
desc: Fear makes your foes weak and more vulnerable to your attacks.

name: Font of Knowledge
desc: Experience or focused study have granted you mastery of a number of topics.

name: Furious Sprint
desc: You rush forward.

name: Gaze of Veracity
prerequisites: Hellknight Signifer Dedication; ability to cast focus spells
desc: You can channel your mask’s power to pierce through lies and see the truth in any situation.

name: Giant Snare
desc: You can create bigger snares for quick deployment, making it more likely for a creature to walk into your snares.

name: Great Cleave
desc: Your fury carries your weapon through multiple foes.

name: Greater Bloodline
desc: Further communion with the legacy of your bloodline has uncovered greater secrets.

name: Greater Debilitating Bomb
desc: You have learned enhanced techniques and alchemical secrets that allow you to expand the range of effects you can impose with your bombs.

name: Greater Magical Edification
desc: You've continued to expand your compendium of tools to compile knowledge.

name: Greater Magical Scholastics
desc: You broaden your magical studies, allowing you to find the right path, detect objects, and conceal those objects from unscrupulous rivals.

name: Greater Spell Runes
desc: You gain more powerful spell runes.

name: Halcyon Spellcasting Initiate
desc: Your knowledge of halcyon magic increases.

name: Harrying Strike
desc: Your attack prevents a foe from pursuing your allies.

name: Healing Transformation
desc: You can take advantage of shapechanging magic to close wounds and patch injuries.

name: Heroic Recovery
desc: The restorative power of your healing invigorates the recipient.

name: House of Imaginary Walls
desc: You erect an imaginary barrier others believe to be real.

name: Hunter's Vision
desc: You are so focused on your hunted prey that you can see it clearly even beyond the limits of your senses.

name: Imposing Destrier
desc: Under your care, your mount has realized its innate potential.

name: Impressive Landing
desc: You slam into the ground, shattering it around you.

name: Improved Command Undead
prerequisites: harmful font; Command Undead; evil alignment
desc: Undead creatures find it all but impossible to resist your commands.

name: Improved Knockdown
desc: You can dash your foe to the ground with a single blow.

name: Incredible Companion (Ranger)
desc: Your animal companion continues to grow and develop.

name: Incredible Familiar (Familiar Master)
desc: Your familiar is infused with even more magic than other familiars.

name: Just One More Thing
desc: After your attempt to influence someone goes poorly, you add another bit of information or ask a pointed question, possibly salvaging your previous attempt.

name: Knockback
desc: The weight of your swing drives your enemy back.

name: Knockback Strike
desc: You focus your strength into a blow powerful enough to push an enemy away from you.

name: Know it All
desc: Your knowledge of abstruse topics is unparalleled.

name: Lastwall Warden
desc: Use your shield to protect your allies.

name: Litany Against Sloth
desc: You rail against the sin of sloth, turning a foe’s laziness against it.

name: Litany of Self-Interest
desc: You compel a creature to act toward its own ends rather than consider others.

name: Magical Adaptation
desc: When an obstacle bars your path, you pull a trick from your sleeve to overcome it.

name: Major Lesson
desc: Your patron grants you even greater secrets.

name: Martial Exercise
desc: You've become comfortable in using weapons that you might not have picked up before training with the Swords.

name: Master Monster Hunter
desc: You have a nearly encyclopedic knowledge of all creatures of the world.

name: Masterful Obfuscation
prerequisites: master in a skill with the Recall Knowledge action; Scrollmaster Dedication
desc: You've mastered the art of deceiving others about your area of study.

name: Menacing Prowess
prerequisites: Golden League Xun Dedication; expert in Intimidation
desc: Scaring off multiple people at once is your specialty.

name: Merciful Elixir
desc: You mix a special additive into your elixir that calms the drinker’s body and mind.

name: Methodical Debilitations
desc: You strategically craft your debilitations to lessen or negate an enemy's tactical advantages.

name: Mighty Bulwark
desc: Thanks to your incredible connection to your armor, you can use it to shrug off an incredible array of dangers.

name: Mirror Shield
desc: You reflect the spell back against the triggering opponent.

name: Monk's Flurry
desc: You gain the Flurry of Blows action.

name: Ode to Ouroboros
desc: You learn the ode to ouroboros composition spell, which enables you to temporarily spare your allies from death.

name: Ongoing Strategy
desc: You're constantly studying small aspects of everyone's movements, even if you don't have a stratagem in place ahead of time.

name: Oracular Warning
desc: You have a flash of insight about impending danger related to one ally, and you can shout or gesture to warn that ally of the threat a moment before it materializes.

name: Overpowering Charge
desc: You trample your foes as you charge past them.

name: Overwhelming Energy
desc: You alter your spells to overcome resistances.

name: Peafowl Strut
desc: You slowly move across the battlefield with dangerous grace.

name: Penetrating Shot
desc: You shoot clear through an intervening creature to hit your prey.

name: Plant Shape
desc: You can take the form of a plant creature.

name: Potent Poisoner
desc: By concentrating your poisons’ toxic components, you make them harder for victims to resist.

name: Practiced Defender
desc: After extensive practice with the Swords, you're comfortable enough with your shield to move at a normal pace with it raised.

name: Precise Debilitation
desc: You carefully aim and gracefully deliver your debilitations.

name: Prevailing Position
desc: Your willingness to flow from one stance to another lets you sacrifice their benefits to better protect yourself.

name: Pristine Weapon
desc: Your verdant weapon can cut through the resistances of magical creatures.

name: Provocator Dedication
desc: For you, fighting is as much about style as skill.

name: Quicken Heartbeat
desc: You’ve replaced your heart with one made of animated quicksilver and living adamantine.

name: Quickened Casting
desc: You are able to quickly cast a spell.

name: Radiant Blade Spirit
desc: Your divine ally radiates power, enhancing your chosen weapon.

name: Rain-Scribe Mobility
desc: You surround yourself in a mantle of Rain-Scribe magic and Stride twice; difficult terrain does not reduce your Speed, even if the difficult terrain has been manipulated by magic.

name: Recover Spell
desc: You recover the energy of a recently disrupted spell, allowing you to cast it again as long as you do so immediately before the energy dissipates.

name: Reflexive Riposte
desc: You can riposte almost without a thought.

name: Replenishment of War
prerequisites: expert in your deity’s favored weapon
desc: Striking out against your enemies draws praise and protection from your deity.

name: Resilient Touch
desc: Your healing energies create an aura of protection that defends your allies against more than just blades and arrows.

name: Resounding Blow
desc: You strike your enemy in the head with such force that their ears ring.

name: Rope Mastery
prerequisites: Golden League Xun Dedication; expert in Athletics
desc: Ropes are your tool of choice, and you deploy them in versatile ways.

name: Rubbery Skin
desc: Your skin develops a malleable, rubbery quality.

name: Saving Slash
desc: Make a check to reduce a critical hit against you to a normal hit.

name: Scout's Pounce
desc: You leap from the shadows to strike your foes.

name: Scroll Savant
desc: During your daily preparations, you can create two temporary scrolls containing arcane spells from your spellbook.

name: Shadow Magic
desc: You gain the ability to fuse and play with shadows by using focus spells specific to shadowdancers.

name: Shadow Sneak Attack
desc: You gain the sneak attack class feature, except you deal 1d6 precision damage regardless of your level.

name: Shall Not Falter, Shall Not Rout
desc: You gain the shall not falter, shall not rout focus spell.

name: Shared Avoidance
desc: You can project your premonitions of danger to your allies.

name: Shared Synergy
desc: You can grant the benefit from Dualistic Synergy to an ally within 30 feet instead of yourself, either allowing that ally to Recall Knowledge, granting that ally temporary Hit Points, or both, depending on the spell’s tradition.

name: Shattering Strike (Weapon Improviser)
desc: The improvised weapon shatters, destroying it completely but dealing an additional 3d6 piercing damage to the creature you hit with the Improvised Pummel.

name: Shield of Faith
desc: Residual energy from your domain spells bolsters your defenses.

name: Shield of Reckoning
desc: When you shield your ally against an attack, you call upon your power to protect your ally further.

name: Side by Side (Druid)
desc: You and your animal companion fight in tandem, distracting your foes and keeping them off balance.

name: Signature Spell Expansion
desc: Your innate connection to magic lets you cast more spells with greater freedom.

name: Signifer's Sight
desc: The magic flowing through your signifer’s mask allows you to see in the dark, and the mask dampens the distraction caused by sudden flashes of bright light.

name: Silencing Strike
desc: A quick strike to the face or mouth silences your opponent.

name: Silent Sting
prerequisites: Golden League Xun Dedication; expert in Stealth
desc: You quickly hide your weapon to make it difficult to pin the attack on you.

name: Six Pillars Stance
desc: You stand firm, steeling your mind and body, allowing you to use your magic unperturbed.

name: Sleeper Hold
desc: You pinch crucial points of your target’s nervous system, impeding its ability to function.

name: Sneak Savant
desc: It is almost impossible to spot you without taking effort to look.

name: Spellmaster's Ward
desc: You can create a number of powerful shielding runes that bolster your defenses against damaging spells by absorbing the worst of the energy to keep you safe.

name: Spy's Countermeasures
desc: You’ve learned how to analyze and fake your responses to the most common magic used against spies.

name: Steal the Sky
desc: You can take away the air that keeps a flying foe aloft.

name: Surging Might
desc: With a complex gesture, you focus the divine power of your spell to overcome enemies' resistances.

name: Suspect of Opportunity
desc: Sometimes something intrudes upon your case unexpectedly, such as an ambush sent to bring your investigation to a close.

name: Symphony of the Unfettered Heart
desc: You learn the symphony of the unfettered heart composition spell, which enables you to protect an ally against incapacitating conditions.

name: Tactical Debilitations
desc: You learn new debilitations that grant you tactical advantages against your foes.

name: Tangle of Battle
desc: Your incredibly vicious Strike pulls you right in close, giving you the opportunity to grab your foe.

name: Targeting Finisher
desc: Your attack harms and hinders your foe.

name: Tempest-Sun Shielding
desc: You transform unrealized spell energy into a protective shield.

name: Temporary Potions
desc: During your daily preparations, you can create a batch of two temporary oils or potions using a formula you know.

name: Terrain Transposition
desc: You are so connected to the wilderness that you can magically jump from place to place within it.

name: Terrifying Howl
desc: You unleash a terrifying howl.

name: Through Spell
desc: Spells you cast can transform briefly into vital essence, traveling harmlessly through living and undead creatures between you and your target, blocked only by solid objects.

name: Tiller's Aid
desc: You can quickly Aid your crop.

name: Tiller's Drive
desc: Increase your Speed and that of your crop.

name: Topple Foe
desc: You take advantage of the opening created by your ally to tip your foe off their feet.

name: Trampling Charge
desc: You urge your mount forward, trampling enemies in your path.

name: Tumbling Opportunist
desc: You use a burst of stamina to perform a breathtaking feat of Acrobatics as you speed through a foe's space, leaving your foe lying flat on their back.

name: Twin Riposte
desc: A clever parry with one weapon leaves your opponent open to an attack with the other weapon.

name: Uncanny Dodge
desc: You gain the deny advantage class feature.

name: Unseat
desc: You attempt to knock an opponent off their mount.

name: Unstable Concoction
desc: You can create extraordinary—albeit volatile—alchemical wonders, though they have an unfortunate tendency to violently explode when you use them.

name: Unusual Composition
desc: You can translate the emotion and power of a composition to other mediums.

name: Uzunjati Recollection
prerequisites: Uzunjati Storytelling; master in a Recall Knowledge skill
desc: You tell a story spontaneously from nearly forgotten facts, delving into your memory and entertaining your audience in the process.

name: Vicious Debilitations
desc: The debilitations you dish out seriously impair your foes.

name: Vigil's Walls Rise Anew!
desc: You can train your allies to Raise a Shield on your order

name: Ward Casting
desc: You carefully ward your spell by drawing from a mantle of magical energy you prepared to protect your casting, increasing your chance of retaining the spell.

name: Warden's Step
desc: You can guide your allies to move quietly through the wilderness.

name: Weapon-Rune Shifter
source: Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City
desc: You learn how to alter the magic of weapon runes by using a crystal as a focusing component.

name: Whirlwind Stance
source: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
prerequisites: Staff Acrobat Dedication; expert proficiency in your staff
desc: You use your staff as a defensive implement as well as an offensive one.

name: Widen the Gap
desc: Once you have penetrated a foe’s defenses, you can home in on the same spot to exploit your opponent’s wound and deal some serious damage.

name: Wind Jump
desc: You gather the wind beneath you, allowing you to soar as you jump.

name: Winding Flow
desc: Any journey consists of more than simply reaching your destination.

name: Witch's Communion
desc: You can keep watch over multiple charges.

name: Wronged Monk's Wrath
desc: You gain the wronged monk's wrath ki spell.

name: A Home in Every Port
desc: Spend downtime to gain free lodging for a night.

name: Caravan Leader
desc: Your group can Hustle for much longer.

name: Incredible Investiture
desc: Invest up to 12 magic items.

name: Incredible Scout
desc: Grant allies +2 to initiative rolls when Scouting.

name: Additional Shadow Magic
desc: Choose an additional shadowdancer focus spell you haven't already selected from Shadow Magic.

name: Advanced Order Training
prerequisites: Hellknight Armiger Dedication; Hellknight Dedication or Hellknight Signifer Dedication
desc: You gain the greater order benefit for the Hellknight order to which you belong.

name: Advanced Seeker of Truths
prerequisites: Eldritch Researcher Dedication; Seeker of Truths
desc: You have unlocked deeper secrets to uncovering and hoarding lore.

name: Aegis of Arnisant
prerequisites: Knight Vigilant; Shield Block; master in Religion
desc: Inspired by the tale of Arnisant, you transform your shield into a magic ward.

name: Affliction Mercy
desc: The divine grace that flows through you grants reprieve from an affliction.

name: Amplifying Touch
desc: Your healing energies empower attacks.

name: Assassinate
desc: You strike with one swift movement, trying to instantly slay your mark.

name: Aura of Faith
desc: You radiate an aura of pure belief that imbues your attacks and those of nearby allies with holy power.

name: Beastmaster's Call
desc: You quickly call in a primal projection of a non-active companion to provide the companion's support benefit.

name: Blade of Justice
desc: You call upon divine power and make a weapon or unarmed Strike against a foe you have witnessed harming an ally or innocent.

name: Blade of Law
desc: You call upon the power of law and make a weapon or unarmed Strike against a foe you have witnessed breaking or disrespecting the law or otherwise acting disorderly.

name: Blade of the Crimson Oath
desc: You call upon the Crimson Oath to smite undead and then make a weapon or unarmed Strike against an undead foe.

name: Blessed Denial
desc: You exude peace and protection, lessening a harmful condition as it falls upon an ally.

name: Blood Component Substitution
desc: You can bypass the need for incantations and gestures by drawing energy directly from your blood, causing you to visibly glow the color of your blood and crackle with magical energy.

name: Bloodline Focus
desc: Your bloodline cause you to recover focus faster.

name: Bloody Debilitations
desc: Your attacks slice arteries and veins.

name: Brutal Finish
desc: Your final blow can make an impact even if it rebounds off a foe’s defenses.

name: Cartwheel Dodge
desc: You can dodge away from damaging effects.

name: Champion's Sacrifice
desc: You can suffer so that others might live.

name: Charged Creation
desc: Your magic is drawn to your persistent creations.

name: Cheat Death
desc: Somehow you always escape the reaper by a hair's breadth.

name: Clever Counterspell
desc: You creatively apply your prepared spells to counterspell a much wider variety of your opponents’ magic.

name: Communal Sustain
desc: Choose one spell with a sustained duration that one of your allies has in effect.

name: Coordinated Charge
desc: You heroically dash into the fray, inspiring your allies to follow.

name: Coordinated Distraction
desc: You distract an opponent from the fact that one of your allies is about to attack them.

name: Critical Debilitations
desc: Your debilitations are especially effective on your most powerful attacks.

name: Cut the Bonds
prerequisites: Bellflower Dedication; expert in a melee weapon
desc: You can counteract a magical effect that impedes movement.

name: Daredevil's Gambit
desc: If you critically succeed at your Daring Act, you can enter the target’s space and remain there until the beginning of your next turn or until the target moves, whichever comes first.

name: Deadly Poison Weapon
desc: Your poisons are devastatingly potent.

name: Defensive Recovery
desc: Your faith provides temporary protection in addition to healing.

name: Determined Lore Seeker
desc: You've mastered useful spells that let you find hidden truths others might miss.

name: Diamond Soul
desc: You have fortified your body and mind against eldritch effects.

name: Disrupt Ki
desc: Your strike can block a creature's inner life force.

name: Distracting Shot
desc: The sheer power of your attacks, or the overwhelming number of them, leaves an enemy flustered.

name: Diverse Weapon Expert
prerequisites: Fighter Dedication; expert in any kind of weapon or unarmed attack
desc: Your proficiency ranks for simple weapons and martial weapons increase to expert.

name: Divine Wall
desc: You use your shield to harry your enemies, preventing them from stepping away from or around you.

name: Diviner Sense
desc: You sense magical dangers.

name: Dodging Roll
desc: You dodge a blow at the last possible moment.

name: Domain Fluency
desc: You command a deep understanding of the divine domains related to your mystery.

name: Domain Focus
desc: Your devotion to your deity’s domains grows greater, and so does the power granted to you.

name: Double Prey
desc: You can focus on two foes at once, hunting both of them down.

name: Dragon Shape
desc: You can take on the form of some of the world’s most fearsome creatures.

name: Dragon's Rage Wings
desc: You sprout dragon wings from your back.

name: Dueling Dance (Fighter)
desc: Using your free hand as pivot and balance, you both attack and defend with your weapon.

name: Eclectic Polymath
desc: Your flexible mind can quickly shift spells.

name: Educated Assessment
desc: You attempt to Recall Knowledge about a creature, and the GM uses the same secret roll result against the creature’s Deception or Stealth DC, giving you the information from a Battle Assessment.

name: Emblazon Antimagic
desc: Your deity’s symbol protects against offensive magic.

name: Embrace the Pain
desc: Ignoring your pain, you reach out and grab the creature or weapon that caused you harm.

name: Emergency Medical Assistance
desc: You've learned a variety of methods for helping allies who are bleeding, burning, or otherwise suffering persistent damage, from brushing off acid to patting down fires.

name: Enforce Oath
prerequisites: You've sworn to an oath against a specific type of creature.
desc: You call on your oath to embolden you in combat.

name: Enigma's Knowledge
desc: Your muse whispers knowledge to you at all the right times.

name: Evasiveness (Rogue)
prerequisites: Rogue Dedication; expert in Reflex saves
desc: You gain the deny advantage class feature.

name: Evasiveness (Swashbuckler)
prerequisites: Swashbuckler Dedication; expert in Reflex saves
desc: Your proficiency rank for Reflex saves increases to master.

name: Expert Bard Spellcasting
prerequisites: Basic Bard Spellcasting; master in Occultism
desc: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits for bard spellcasting.

name: Expert Cleric Spellcasting
prerequisites: Basic Cleric Spellcasting; master in Religion
desc: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits for cleric spellcasting.

name: Expert Druid Spellcasting
prerequisites: Basic Druid Spellcasting; master in Nature
desc: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits for druid spellcasting.

name: Expert Eldritch Archer Spellcasting
desc: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

name: Expert Oracle Spellcasting
prerequisites: Basic Oracle Spellcasting; master in Religion
desc: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

name: Expert Scroll Cache
desc: Your scroll collection is more powerful.

name: Expert Sorcerer Spellcasting
prerequisites: Basic Sorcerer Spellcasting; master in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion, depending on bloodline
desc: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits for sorcerer spellcasting.

name: Expert Witch Spellcasting
prerequisites: Basic Witch Spellcasting; master in the skill associated with your patron's tradition
desc: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits.

name: Expert Wizard Spellcasting
prerequisites: Basic Wizard Spellcasting; master in Arcana
desc: You gain the expert spellcasting benefits for wizard spellcasting.

name: Extend Elixir
desc: Integrating your own personal energy into the elixirs you create causes them to affect you for longer.

name: Familiar's Eyes
desc: You use your familiar's senses as easily as your own.

name: Fantastic Leap
desc: You launch yourself through the air at a foe.

name: Felling Shot
desc: Your ranged attacks can shoot an unprepared foe right out of the air.

name: Flexible Halcyon Spellcasting
desc: You broaden your ability to channel your power into halcyon magic.

name: Flicker
desc: You use your movements and disguises to make yourself a flickering blur.

name: Flinging Shove
desc: Your opponets go even farther when push them around.

name: Flourishing Finish
desc: Your martial prowess demoralizes all who can see you.

name: Focused Shot
desc: You achieve a state of perfect calm before unleashing your attack, opening your mind to the minute movements of the world around you to increase your accuracy.

name: Forcible Energy
desc: You perform complex manipulations to make the energy from your spells so powerful that your enemies remain vulnerable to it afterward.

name: Foresee Danger
desc: You perceive every possible way your foe's attack could land and attempt to avoid them all.

name: Frightening Appearance
desc: Your dramatic appearances can frighten bystanders.

name: Furious Grab
desc: You grab your foe while it’s distracted by your attack.

name: Greater Physical Evolution
desc: You hold a deep understanding of the innate fundamental structures of the physical world, and you can enforce your will upon that structure as far as your own blood is concerned.

name: Greater Revelation
desc: You learn a greater revelation spell associated with your mystery.

name: Greater Spiritual Evolution
desc: Your magical blood is rich with spiritual essence, and this infusion within you allows your spells to be fully effective against incorporeal creatures, spirits, and creatures on the Ethereal Plane.

name: Green Tongue
desc: You share a special kinship with all things green and living.

name: Gruesome Strike
prerequisites: tenets of evil; champion's reaction that grants extra damage with your Strikes
desc: Make a Strike against the creature that triggered your champion's reaction.

name: Hellknight Order Cross-Training
prerequisites: Hellknight Armiger Dedication; Hellknight Dedication or Hellknight Signifer Dedication
desc: You gain the lesser order benefit of a Hellknight order other than the one to which you belong.

name: Hell's Armaments
desc: You’ve trained with your order’s weapon and your Hellknight plate long enough to apply your expertise from other weapons and armor.

name: Hex Focus
desc: Your patron's teachings have allowed you to achieve a deeper focus.

name: Improved Dueling Riposte
desc: Your weapon whirls and darts, striking foes whenever the opportunity presents itself.

name: Improved Knockback
desc: Your shoves cause the target to go farther.

name: Incredible Ricochet
desc: After your first shot singles out your opponent's position, you direct another that ricochets around obstacles and strikes unerringly.

name: Inspirational Focus
desc: Your connection to your muse has granted you unusual focus.

name: Invincible Mutagen
desc: The fortifying additives you brew into your mutagens make your juggernaut form impervious.

name: Janatimo's Lessons
desc: Thanks to Janatimo's secret techniques, you can weave your knowledge and words into powerful tools to assist your allies in life-threatening situations.

name: Judgement of the Monolith
desc: You can use your ka stone to compel the truth.

name: Juggernaut's Fortitude
