prerequisites: Barbarian Dedication; expert in Fortitude Saves
desc: Your proficiency rank in Fortitude saves increases to master.

name: Knight in Shining Armor
prerequisites: Knight Vigilant; expert in light armor, medium armor, or unarmored defense; trained in heavy armor
desc: As a knight in shining armor, you train daily in the heaviest armor, expanding your expertise to heavy armor.

name: Lasting Doubt
desc: When you cast doubt upon your foes, the effect lasts longer than usual.

name: Legs of Stone
desc: You gain a +2 status bonus to your Fortitude and Reflex DCs against attempts to Shove or Trip you.

name: Liberating Stride
desc: Your allies can move farther when you release them from harm.

name: Lightning Snares
prerequisites: Quick Snares; Snare Specialist; master in Crafting
desc: You can rig a trap with incredible speed.

name: Lunging Stance
desc: Your body coiled to strike, you can lash out at distant enemies.

name: Magic Sense
desc: You have a literal sixth sense for magic.

name: Maneuvering Spell
desc: You instantly tap into the magical power of a spell you're casting to quickly pounce around the battlefield.

name: Master Alchemy
desc: Your advanced alchemy level increases to 7.

name: Master Spotter (Investigator)
desc: Your proficiency rank in Perception increases to master.

name: Master Spotter (Ranger)
desc: Your proficiency rank in Perception increases to master.

name: Meditative Focus
desc: Your meditation is so effective that you can achieve a deep focus.

name: Mobile Finisher
desc: You attack in motion.

name: Overwhelming Breath
desc: You control your breathing and align it with your ki, exhaling with controlled force in order to overcome your opponent's resistance.

name: Pale Horse
desc: Your mount becomes a grotesque creature of foreboding when you ride it.

name: Paragon's Guard
desc: Once you’ve had a moment to set your stance, you always have your shield ready without a thought.

name: Perfection's Path
prerequisites: Monk Dedication; expert in at least one saving throw
desc: Increase the proiciency rank for one saving throw to master.

name: Pesh Skin
desc: Your plant form sprouts hundreds of spines, and your blood causes mild hallucinations in creatures exposed to it.

name: Plentiful Snares
desc: You can prepare incredible numbers of snares each day out of simple ingredients.

name: Predator's Pounce
desc: You close the distance to your prey in a blur.

name: Preparation
desc: You survey the battlefield, calculating the possibilities.

name: Primal Focus
desc: Your connection to nature is particularly strong, and the spirits of nature flock around you, helping you replenish your focus.

name: Primal Summons
desc: Whenever you summon an ally, you can empower it with the elemental power of air, earth, fire, or water.

name: Reactive Interference
desc: You reflexively foil an enemy’s response.

name: Reaper of Repose
prerequisites: Knight Reclaimant Dedication; master proficiency in a weapon
desc: Your skill and fervor allow you to pierce undead defenses and exploit their weaknesses.

name: Reason Rapidly
desc: Your mind works through clues at an unbelievable speed.

name: Recollect Studies
prerequisites: Swordmaster Dedication; expert in a skill used to Recall Knowledge
desc: You paid attention during your studies and remember the right way to attack various creatures.

name: Reverberate
desc: You can manipulate the acoustics around you to deflect sonic damage back at its source.

name: Ricochet Feint
desc: While in Ricochet Stance, you can bounce a thrown weapon off a foe to distract them.

name: Rugged Survivalist
desc: You've studied survival skills with the School of Swords experts and are comfortable spending long periods of time in the wilderness.

name: Second Sting
desc: You read your prey’s movements and transform them into openings, so failures with one weapon set up glancing blows with the other.

name: Sense Ki
desc: You can read the presence of ki in your area.

name: Shadow Illusion
desc: With an artful eye, you shape shadows into illusory forms.

name: Shaped Contaminant
desc: Through a combination of careful manipulation and precise breath control, you can deploy inhaled toxins precisely.

name: Shared Assault
desc: In the triumph of battle, you can share the glory with another ally.

name: Shared Replenishment
desc: When your deity blesses your warlike acts, you can extend that favor to your allies.

name: Shield Salvation
desc: You can save your shield from total destruction, even after a devastating attack.

name: Shoulder Catastrophe
desc: You’ve trained to protect your allies by diverting the worst attacks to yourself.

name: Side by Side (Ranger)
desc: You and your animal companion fight in tandem, distracting your foes and keeping them of balance.

name: Signifer Armor Expertise
desc: You’ve spent enough time helping your comrades equip medium and heavy armor that you spread your own expertise to those armors as well.

name: Silver's Refrain
desc: Learn the silver's refrain composition cantrip.

name: Speaking Sky
desc: You can hear air movement like soft whispers.

name: Spellmaster's Resilience
desc: Your experience with a specific type of harmful magic makes you more resistant to it.

name: Spirit's Wrath
desc: You call forth an ephemeral apparition.

name: Splendid Companion
source: Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God
desc: Your animal companion continues to develop.

name: Spring Attack
desc: Springing away from one foe, you Strike at another.

name: Spring from the Shadows
desc: Leaping out from hiding, you assail your target when they least expect it.

name: Stance Savant (Monk)
desc: You enter a stance without a thought.

name: Student of the Dueling Arts
desc: You have studied a great many combat techniques, which you can review each day.

name: Sunder Spell
desc: You draw upon your superstitious fury to destroy a spell.

name: Swap Investment
desc: Your time as a Pathfinder has taught you how to improvise, and you've learned to make use of the resources you find in the field.

name: Tense Negotiator
desc: You often find that the best way to win a conflict means avoiding a fight in the first place.

name: Titan's Stature
desc: You grow to even greater size.

name: Unbalancing Sweep
desc: You make a great sweep about yourself, knocking creatures off their feet and away from you.

name: Uncanny Bombs
desc: You lob bombs unerringly, despite obstructions or distance.

name: Uncanny Suction
desc: Your limbs produce strange, sucker-like growths that allow you to adhere to walls, objects, and most other surfaces.

name: Vernai Training
prerequisites: Achaekek's Grip; Advanced Red Mantis Magic
desc: To resurrect a creature you've slain, a spellcaster must counteract your influence on its death.

name: Wandering Oasis
desc: You're surrounded by soothing energy.

name: Warden's Focus
desc: Your connection with your surroundings grows deeper as you focus.

name: Wild Strider
desc: Natural obstacles pose no obstacle to you.

name: Wings of the Dragon
desc: You can manifest draconic wings to soar through the air at great speed.

name: Words of Unraveling
desc: You have unlocked abstruse methods to tangle with reality itself, altering the fate of a single individual.

name: Aasimar's Mercy
desc: Your celestial powers allow you to remove lesser afflictions with ease.

name: Advanced General Training
desc: Over the course of adventuring, your adaptability has let you pick up numerous useful abilities.

name: Airy Step
desc: You create a blanket of fog in a 5–foot burst centered on one corner of your space.

name: Alter Resistance
desc: You focus on your protean forebears to change your energy resistance.

name: Ancestor's Rage
desc: You transform into an enormous otherworldly hyena.

name: Ancestor's Transformation
desc: You can commune with ancestor spirits to assume the form of an enormous primeval strix.

name: Aquatic Adaptation
desc: If you and up to four other creatures are in contact with a body of water deep enough for you to fully submerge, you can spend 10 minutes adapting the creatures to that specific body of water.

name: Aquatic Camouflage
desc: You blend into the waves.

name: Arcane Sight
prerequisites: ability to cast the detect magic cantrip
desc: You've trained yourself to constantly be on the lookout for magical effects, even when focusing on looking out for other things.

name: Arise, ye Worthy!
desc: You are descended from the valkyries who protect worthy souls, and can hold back death's grasp.

name: Augment Senses
desc: You open vestigial eyes, unfurl tympanic flaps of skin, or otherwise enhance your senses.

name: Avenge Ally
desc: Though you know that you will eventually outlive your companions, seeing them at death's door brings clarity to your attacks.

name: Azarketi Weapon Expertise
desc: Your mastery with weapons both above and below water is unmatched.

name: Black Cat Curse
desc: You hiss a spiteful curse at the creature.

name: Bone Investiture
desc: You encase yourself in spiritual dinosaur bones to become a Huge dinosaur.

name: Bounce Back
desc: You recover from near-death experiences with astounding resilience.

name: Calaca's Showstopper
desc: You've spent many an evening learning songs and tales featuring calacas, death's wandering minstrels.

name: Call of the Green Man
desc: You can call forth nearby nature spirits to augment your body.

name: Can't Fall Here
desc: You physically help an ally remain standing and encourage them to push through their pain against dire odds.

name: Caterwaul
desc: You give a daring yowl in the face of adversity, calling your companion back from the brink of unconsciousness.

name: Catfolk Weapon Expertise
desc: You are well-trained in traditional catfolk weapons

name: Ceaseless Shadows
desc: You excel at going unnoticed, especially among a crowd.

name: Celestial Strikes
desc: Your connection to good arms all your attacks against forces of evil.

name: Ceremony of Growth
desc: You can alter your exoskeleton's size.

name: Cloak of Poison
desc: You secrete a cloak of concentrated poison that harms any who dare attack you.

name: Cobble Dancer
desc: You know how to take advantage of foes thrown off-balance by unstable flooring, loose cobblestones, or similar impediments.

name: Conrasu Weapon Expertise
desc: Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency for conrasu weapons.

name: Consistent Surge
desc: Your nanites are incredibly effective, capable of improving your body's efficiency regularly.

name: Continuous Assault
desc: You can use Elemental Assault once per hour instead of once per day.

name: Daywalker
desc: Whether through painstaking exposure, devoted prayer, or simple luck, you've found a greater affinity for life through the sun's light.

name: Delver
desc: Subterranean life taught you to swim through the ground like water.

name: Dire Form
desc: Your hybrid shape is a hulking beast.

name: Dwarven Weapon Expertise
desc: Your dwarven affinity blends with your training, granting you great skill with dwarven weapons.

name: Eclectic Sword Mastery
desc: You instinctively learn how to use a sword with just a few practice swings.

name: Elite Dracomancer
desc: Your magic rivals that of lesser dragons.

name: Elven Weapon Expertise
desc: Your elven affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with elven weapons.

name: Enforced Order
desc: You never fail to strike down the ever-expanding reaches of chaos.

name: Envenomed Edge
desc: With a combination of your poison glands and herbal concoctions, you can consistently deliver venomous attacks when you hit an enemy's weak points.

name: Ferocious Beasts
prerequisites: Beast Trainer or animal companion; Orc Ferocity
desc: Since ancient times, the mightiest orc beast tamers would draw out the true fighting spirit of their companion beasts by feeding the creatures a draft incorporating the orc's own blood.

name: Fey Skin
desc: While you are more susceptible to cold iron than most of the Wingless, you also have an incredible resilience and a deeper connection to the healing energies of the First World.

name: Fiendish Strikes
desc: Your festering connection to the forces of evil infuses your weapons with debilitating malevolence, tearing down creatures of good with every attack.

name: Fiend's Door
desc: Like many fiends, you have the supernatural ability to teleport yourself to safety.

name: Finest Trick
desc: Many fiends—rakshasa rajas and demonic succubi most famously—can take on the forms of others.

name: Flame Jump
desc: Your peri lineage has opened your mind to fire's raw, purging essence.

name: Form of the Bat
desc: You can transform into a harmless bat.

name: Formation Master
desc: You can assemble a formation even with members of ancestries that lack the hobgoblins’ military discipline, and you can extend these benefits to your hobgoblin allies.

name: Fully Flighted
desc: You gain the effects of Juvenile Flight at all times, rather than just once per day for 10 minutes.

name: Genie Weapon Expertise
desc: Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency in falchions, ranseurs, scimitars, tridents, and all geniekin weapons in which you are trained.

name: Gift of the Moon
desc: You can share your power with others, but they can't escape the werecreature's curse as easily as you can.

name: Gnoll Weapon Expertise
desc: You fight with effortless expertise with gnoll weapons.

name: Gnome Weapon Expertise
desc: Your gnome affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with gnome weapons.

name: Goblin Weapon Expertise
desc: Your goblin affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with goblin weapons.

name: Grippli Weapon Expertise
desc: You fight with effortless expertise with grippli weapons.

name: Hag Magic
desc: Through your heritage, you can replicate some of a hag's magic.

name: Halfling Weapon Expertise
desc: Your halfling affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with halfling weapons.

name: Harbinger's Caw
desc: You caw ominously, cursing the creature with misfortune.

name: Hatchling Flight
desc: You can fly a little!

name: Hobgoblin Weapon Expertise
desc: You increase your training in battlefield weapons.

name: Hydraulic Maneuvers
desc: You batter your foes with a torrent of water siphoned from your surroundings.

name: Impose Order
desc: You shift the underlying fabric of reality to impose a baseline of order.

name: Improved Elemental Bulwark
desc: You gain resistance 10 from Elemental Bulwark instead of 5.

name: Incredible Ferocity
desc: Given time to collect yourself after a near-death scrape, you can rebuild your ferocity and withstand additional finishing blows.

name: Incredible Luck (Halfling)
desc: Even other halflings consider you to be particularly lucky.

name: Inspirit Hazard
desc: You awaken a spirit of creation within the hazard.

name: Instinctive Obfuscation
prerequisites: at least one arcane or occult innate spell gained from a gnome heritage or gnome ancestry feat
desc: The magic within you manifests as a natural reaction to threats.

name: Invisible Trickster
desc: You have learned how to become invisible and remain so.

name: Irriseni Ice-Witch
desc: You can trace your direct descent from one of the Queens of Irrisen and thus from Baba Yaga herself.

name: Iruxi Spirit Strike
desc: Your iruxi unarmed attacks channel the spiritual energy of your ancestors.

name: Jinx Glutton
desc: You can Eat Fortune once per hour, rather than once per day.

name: Killing Stone
desc: Your star orb hides a deadly miasma.

name: Kitsune Spell Expertise
desc: Your tails show your magical mastery.

name: Kobold Weapon Expertise
desc: Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the crossbow, greatpick, light pick, pick, and spear, as well as any kobold weapons in which you are trained.

name: Lifeblood's Call
desc: The impulse to survive and continue fighting resonates deep within you.

name: Mask of Fear
desc: Your warmask burns off of your face, releasing your apprehension.

name: Metal-Veined Strikes
desc: Metallic veins grow throughout your body, giving your unarmed attacks a metallic sheen.

name: Mischievous Tail
desc: Your tail can bedevil your foes.

name: Mist Strider
desc: You condense the moisture in the air, solidifying it so it can hold your weight.

name: None Shall Know
desc: Even magical means have a hard time prying information from you.

name: One with Earth
desc: You've learned to harness your connection to the earth to travel through it.

name: Orc Weapon Expertise
desc: Your orc affinity blends with your class training, granting you great skill with orc weapons.

name: Primal Rampage
desc: You tap into the unstoppable, primeval strength of your ancient kin.

name: Purge Sins
desc: You call on your celestial forebears to rid your body of all toxins and impurities.

name: Radiant Burst
desc: Your skin glows with intensity.

name: Rehydration
desc: You surround your body with a thin layer of water drawn from the moisture in the air.

name: Resist Ruin
desc: Your duskwalker heritage allows you to extend protection against negative energy to yourself or an ally in need.

name: Revivification Protocal
desc: Your nanites are programmed to automatically revive you.

name: Secret Eyes
desc: You can call forth an invisible eye to let you peek on secrets.

name: See the Unseen
desc: You notice things that others can't see at all.

name: Shadow Pact
desc: Thousands of years ago, your ancestors made a pact with Zon-Kuthon.

name: Shadow's Assault
desc: Your shadow assaults your foes.

name: Shaitan Skin
desc: When in danger, you can harden the stone in your skin into armor, much like a shaitan.

name: Shinstabber
desc: You can dart around and between your larger allies' legs without tripping them up.

name: Shory Aerialist
prerequisites: Garundi ethnicity, Mauxi ethnicity, or Tian-Yae ethnicity; Shory Aeromancer or ability to cast fly
desc: Unique in Golarion’s history, the Shory people developed fighting styles dedicated to combat in the air.

name: Skirt the Light
desc: You can travel the border between the Material and Shadow Planes and even bring others along.

name: Skittering Sneak
desc: You squish, slink, and skitter from cover to cover with great speed and stealth.

name: Spell Devourer
desc: You don't just resist magic; you devour it.

name: Spew Tentacles
desc: You can open your mouth to an immense size and spew forth an impossibly large field of tentacles.

name: Spiteful Rake
desc: Your instincts sing of spite and malice, and you've learned a devastating trick: go for the eyes.

name: Steadfast Ally
desc: Your presence alone is enough to provide your allies with emotional support.

name: Stubborn Persistence
desc: Humans are renowned for their ability to persist through the most grueling of trials.

name: Suli Amir
desc: You have power connected to the powerful jann amirs.

name: Summon Air Elemental
desc: You have a connection to the Inner Spheres, allowing you to summon an elemental ally.

name: Summon Celestial Kin
desc: You have a connection to the celestial realms, allowing you to summon a celestial ally.

name: Summon Earth Elemental
desc: You have a connection to the Inner Sphere, allowing you to summon an elemental ally.

name: Summon Fiendish Kin
desc: You have a deep connection to the fiendish realms, allowing you to summon a fiend matching your own lineage.

name: Summon Fire Elemental
desc: You can summon an elemental ally.

name: Summon Water Elemental
desc: You can summon an elemental ally.

name: Telluric Power
desc: You channel strength from the earth beneath your feet to pummel your enemies.

name: Tengu Weapon Expertise
desc: Study has made you an expert with tengu weapons.

name: Thunder God's Fan
desc: A wave of your fan unleashes the fury of the storm.

name: Toppling Dance
desc: While sharing a creature's space using Dance Underfoot, your weapons and unarmed attacks gain the trip trait, but only against the creature whose space you share.

name: Translucent Skin
desc: Your body is translucent while underwater.

name: Truespeech
desc: It is paramount that you are understood and you understand others; language need not impede your message.

name: Unbreakable-er Goblin
desc: As hard as most unbreakable goblins are to break, you are that much harder to break.

name: Unconventional Expertise
prerequisites: Unconventional Weaponry; trained in the weapon you chose for Unconventional Weaponry
desc: You’ve continued to advance your powers using your unconventional weapon.

name: Universal Longevity
desc: You’ve perfected your ability to keep up with all the skills you’ve learned over your long life.

name: Unrivaled Builder
desc: Building things is like solving a puzzle, and you know how to use anything at your disposal to get the job done.

name: Vanth's Weapon Expertise
desc: Vanths themselves recognize you as an honorary reaper.

name: Very, Very Sneaky
desc: Your ability to hide is so great, you can disappear straight from vision.

name: Vicious Snares
desc: You've learned how to create traps that cause greater injuries.

name: Wandering Heart
prerequisites: Arctic Elf, Cavern Elf, Desert Elf, Woodland Elf, or any other elf heritage based on adapting to an environment
desc: While all elves adapt to their environments over time, you have traveled so widely and become attuned to so many environs that your body now changes more rapidly than other elves.

name: War Conditioning
desc: You have extensive training in remote environments, allowing you to move through these areas easily.

name: Warren Digger
desc: You've learned to put your sturdy claws to work digging through the earth.

name: We March On
desc: You make sure that your allies push themselves while traveling.

name: Webslinger
desc: Your natural ability to create silken webs blends with your magical powers, allowing you to create impossibly large webs with great frequency.

name: Absorb Spell
prerequisites: Spellmaster Dedication; spell repertoire or ability to prepare spells
desc: You absorb a spell and store it in your body.

name: Allegro
desc: You can quicken your allies with a fast-paced performance.

name: Anchoring Aura
desc: Your aura hampers fiends’ teleportation.

name: Armored Exercise
prerequisites: Swordmaster Dedication; trained in light, medium, or heavy armor
desc: You've spent time training in your armor alongside other agents from the Swords.

name: Aura of Life
desc: Your aura protects against necromantic effects.

name: Aura of Preservation
desc: Your aura protects against the twisting powers of aberrations.

name: Aura of Righteousness
desc: Your righteous aura dampens evil’s might.

name: Aura of Vengeance
desc: When you call upon others to take retribution, you also guide their aim.

name: Awesome Blow
desc: Your attacks are so powerful, they can flatten your opponents.

name: Bonded Focus
desc: Your connection to your bonded item increases your focus pool.

name: Consume Spell
desc: When you successfully Counterspell a spell of the tradition that matches your bloodline, you consume it, replenishing yourself with its energy.

name: Death's Door
desc: You continue to fight when others would fall.

name: Defensive Roll
desc: Dropping into a roll to disperse the force of the blow, you can partially evade a lethal attack and stay conscious.

name: Deity's Protection
desc: When you call upon your deity’s power to fulfill the promise of their domain, you gain divine protection.

name: Desperate Finisher
desc: You throw everything into one last press.

name: Determination
desc: Your training allows you to shrug off your foes’ spells and conditions when the need is dire.

name: Diverse Armor Expert
prerequisites: Champion Dedication; expert in unarmored defense or one or more types of armor
desc: Your proficiency ranks for armor increase to expert.

name: Divine Reflexes
desc: You can use your champion's reaction more.

name: Dual Onslaught
desc: When you lash out with both weapons, you leave no room for the target to escape your attack.

name: Earworm
desc: By endlessly repeating a motif, you implant an earworm, a memorable song that repeats over and over again in your allies' heads, preparing them to respond to it later.

name: Ebb and Flow
desc: You can pull forth both positive and negative energy simultaneously to harm your enemies and heal your allies.

name: Entities from Afar
desc: You can call in aberrations to fight for you or to answer questions.

name: Explosive Death Drop
desc: You lift your enemy into the air before bringing them crashing down with a fiery detonation.

name: Extend Armament Alignment
desc: The alignment you impose on a weapon lasts much longer.

name: Fast Channel
desc: Divine power is always at your fingertips, swiftly responding to your call.

name: Flamboyant Leap
desc: You stylishly leap and deliver a powerful finisher.

name: Forceful Shot
desc: Your ranged attacks push your foes away from your allies.

name: Forestall Curse
desc: You've learned to forestall the effects of your curse somewhat.

name: Form Lock
desc: Your ability to control your own ki empowers you to pressure other creatures into resuming their true forms.

name: Giant's Lunge
desc: You extend your body and prepare to attack foes outside your normal reach.

name: Glib Mutagen
desc: Your silvertongue mutagen transcends languages and plausibility.

name: Greater Interpose
desc: Your divine grace empowers you to avoid hits when you otherwise could not.

name: Greater Merciful Elixir
desc: Your additives contain panaceas that can remedy a plethora of maladies.

name: Guiding Finish
desc: Using your weapon as a lever, you force your opponent to end up right where you want them.

name: Guiding Riposte
desc: By shifting your weight and angling your weapon, you guide your opponent to a more favorable position.

name: Halcyon Spellcasting Adept
prerequisites: Halcyon Spellcasting Initiate; master in either Arcana or Nature, expert in the other
desc: You refine your halcyon magic.

name: Hammer Quake
desc: You smash the ground with your weapon, knocking nearby creatures to the ground.

name: Impaling Thrust
desc: You impale your enemy and hold them in place with your weapon.

name: Impossible Riposte
desc: Your ripostes can deflect attacks back at their source.

name: Improved Twin Riposte (Fighter)
desc: Your weapons are a blur, blocking and biting at your foes.

name: Incredible Recollection
desc: You can sift through knowledge locked within your mind at an incredible pace.

name: Innocent Butterfly
desc: You know how to alter the perceptions of others.

name: Instant Opening
desc: You distract your opponent with a few choice words or a rude gesture.

name: Interweave Dispel
prerequisites: dispel magic in your spell repertoire
desc: You weave dispelling energy into a spell, sending both effects at a foe.

name: Iron Lung
desc: Your lungs are infused with the resilience of iron.

name: Ironblood Surge
desc: You steel yourself, preparing to resist oncoming attacks and using your muscles to absorb the impact.

name: Leave an Opening
desc: When you hit hard enough, you leave an opening so your ally can jump in on the action.

name: Litany of Depravity
desc: You undercut your enemy's vain moralism, opening their heart to evil.

name: Litany of Righteousness
desc: You call upon righteousness to expose an evil foe’s weakness.

name: Mountain Quake
desc: You stomp, shaking the earth beneath you and causing quakes.

name: Murderer's Circle
desc: Circle your foe while you beat on them.

name: Mysterious Repertoire
desc: Your mystery holds unknowable depths of magic not always associated with the divine.

name: Path of Iron
desc: With a burst of effort, you weave a path through your enemies, striking each in turn as you move past them.

name: Peculiar Anatomy
desc: Your circulatory system contains viscous protoplasmic fluid instead of ordinary blood.

name: Perfect Finisher
desc: You focus your panache into an impeccable assault.

name: Pin to the Spot
desc: Strike a foe and restrain them.

name: Pivot Strike
source: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
desc: You Leap and then Strike using your staff.

name: Plot the Future
desc: You spend 10 minutes in contemplation to uncannily predict how events will play out.

name: Prayer Attack
desc: You've mastered the signature assassination style of the Red Mantis.

name: Premonition of Clarity
desc: Your deity sends you a vision of faith to steel you against mental attacks.

name: Reactive Transformation
prerequisites: Wild Shape; Dragon Shape, Elemental Shape, Plant Shape, or Soaring Shape
desc: You transform reflexively when in danger.

name: Reflect Spell
desc: You cause a spell to fire back at its caster.

name: Rites of Transfiguration
desc: You can adapt your patron's power to transform other creatures into forms more befitting their behavior or your whims.

name: Seeker Arrow
desc: Your shots zip around corners and fly at impossible angles to reach your target.

name: Sense the Unseen
desc: When you look for foes, you can catch even the slightest cues.

name: Shadow Power
desc: You can focus the shadows into a powerful blast.

name: Shadow's Web
desc: You launch a wave of shadowy ki outward from your body, damaging your opponents and potentially binding them in place.

name: Shape of the Dragon
desc: You've discovered how to transform yourself into a dragon.

name: Shared Prey
desc: Hunting as a duo, you and your ally both single out your prey.

name: Shift Spell
desc: You move an active spell's area to a new location.

name: Soothing Ballad
desc: You soothe your allies’ wounds with the power of your performance.

name: Sow Spell
desc: You fold your spell into a seed.

name: Specialized Beastmaster Companion
desc: Your nimble and savage animal companions become cunning enough to become specialized.

name: Specialized Companion (Druid)
desc: Your animal companion continues to grow in power and ability, and it is now cunning enough to become specialized.

name: Specialized Mount
desc: You've trained your mount to perform in unusual or even extreme circumstances, granting it abilities far beyond others of its kind.

name: Speedy Rituals
desc: You can perform rituals in only a fraction of the usual time.

name: Spell Shroud
desc: Your spell shrouds you in a billowing cloud.

name: Spellmaster's Tenacity
desc: You call upon the power of your spells to protect you from the worst of the magic headed your way.

name: Stance Savant (Fighter)
desc: When there’s imminent danger, you drop into a stance with a mere thought.

name: Stay Down!
desc: You have ways of keeping your foes down.

name: Stealthy Companion
desc: You’ve trained your animal companion to blend in to its surroundings.

name: Stone Communion
desc: You can speak Terran and speak with stones.

name: Strategic Bypass
desc: Your plans account for your foes' resistances, enabling you to strike a telling blow.

name: Sunder Enchantment
desc: You can focus your superstition to break the magic of an item, in addition to destroying freestanding spells and those active on creatures.

name: Superior Bond
desc: When you draw upon your bonded item, you can leave a bit of energy within it for later use.

name: Swift Banishment
desc: The force of your blow sends your victim back to its home plane.

name: Tactical Cadence
desc: Your remarkable breath control and concise instructions allow you to coordinate your allies more effectively.

name: Talismanic Sage
desc: You have forgotten more about talismans than lesser warriors have ever known.

name: Tangled Forest Rake
desc: You reposition foes with raking attacks.

name: Target of Opportunity
desc: You capitalize on your ally's attack to create a coordinated barrage.

name: Targeting Shot
desc: You carefully track your prey’s position and defenses.

name: Timeless Body
desc: You cease aging.

name: Timeless Nature
desc: With primal magic sustaining you, you cease aging.

name: Tongue of the Sun and Moon
desc: You have transcended the barriers between words and meaning.

name: Touch Focus
desc: You can redirect a spell's power through you to deliver it within striking distance.

name: Triumphant Inspiration
desc: With a triumphant shout, you inspire your allies.

name: True Debilitating Bomb
desc: Ever inventive, you have discovered increasingly devastating ways for your bombs to impede and hamper your foes.

name: True Hypercognition
desc: Your mind works at an incredible pace.

name: Twinned Defense (Swashbuckler)
desc: You're always ready to use your off-hand weapon to interfere with attacks against you.

name: Two-Weapon Flurry
desc: You lash out with both your weapons in a sudden frenzy.

name: Vengeful Strike
desc: When struck by an enemy, you respond in turn.

name: Verdant Metamorphosis
desc: You transform into a plant version of yourself.

name: Vigorous Inspiration
desc: You instill magical vigor in your allies when you inspire them to attack.

name: Warden's Guidance
desc: You can convey your prey’s location to your allies, no matter how well hidden it is.

name: Whirling Blade Stance
desc: You enter a mindful stance that creates a deep connection between you and your monk weapons, allowing you to manipulate them with your ki even at a distance.

name: Whirlwind Strike
desc: You attack all nearby adversaries.

name: Wild Winds Gust
desc: You store up energy and release it in an enormous gust of rushing wind.

name: Wyrmbane Aura
desc: Your aura protects against destructive energies and dragons’ breath.

name: Cloud Jump
desc: Jump impossible distances.

name: Craft Anything
desc: Ignore most requirements for crafting items.

name: Divine Guidance
desc: Find guidance in the writings of your faith.

name: Legendary Codebreaker
desc: Quickly Decipher Writing using Society.

name: Legendary Guide
desc: Increase your party’s travel speed through wilderness terrain

name: Legendary Linguist
desc: Create pidgin languages to communicate with anyone.

name: Legendary Medic
desc: Remove disease or the blinded, deafened, doomed, or drained condition.

name: Legendary Negotiation
desc: Quickly parley with foes.

name: Legendary Performer
desc: Gain renown for your Performance Virtuosic Performer.

name: Legendary Professional
desc: Gain renown for your Lore.

name: Legendary Sneak
desc: Hide and Sneak without cover or being concealed.

name: Legendary Survivalist
desc: Survive extreme conditions.

name: Legendary Thief
desc: Steal what would normally be impossible to steal.

name: Reveal Machinations
desc: You convince a creature that you played a minor but recurring role in its life.

name: Scare to Death
desc: Scare a target so much, they might die.

name: Unified Theory
desc: Use Arcana for checks for all magical traditions.

name: Auspicious Mount
desc: Guided by your ongoing care, your steed has developed incredible intelligence and skill.

name: Avalanche Strike
desc: You attack all nearby adversaries.

name: Blank Slate
desc: Your deceptions confound even the most powerful mortal divinations.

name: Chemical Contagion
desc: With carefully engineered enzymes, you coax some of your poison to infect another target, using the original victim as a carrier.

name: Cloud Step
desc: Using fantastic acrobatic skill, you can walk for brief stretches across insubstantial surfaces.

name: Cognitive Loophole
desc: You can find a loophole in a mental effect to temporarily overcome it.

name: Collateral Thrash
desc: When you Thrash a grabbed foe, you smack that foe into another nearby.

name: Courageous Onslaught
desc: You use your performance to orchestrate an onslaught against your enemies.

name: Cross the Threshold
desc: You can cast ethereal jaunt as an occult innate spell once per day.

name: Deadly Grace
desc: Your graceful attacks are especially powerful.

name: Didactic Strike
desc: When you find a glaring weakness, you can set your allies up to annihilate your foe.

name: Disciple's Breath
prerequisites: Dragon Disciple Dedication; dragon breath sorcerer bloodline spell
desc: You unleash your breath weapon without spending focus.

name: Dispelling Slice
desc: Your sneak attack slices through the threads binding magic to a target.

name: Diverse Mystery
desc: You have broadened your understanding of the divine and can tap into the wonders of a different mystery.

name: Dragon Transformation
desc: You transform into a ferocious large dragon.

name: Effortless Concentration
desc: You can maintain a spell with hardly a thought.

name: Electric Counter
desc: You can charge yourself with lighting, gain resistance to electricity or shocking an attacker.

name: Enlightened Presence
desc: You exude an aura of resolve.

name: Eternal Bane
desc: A life of evil has made you a nexus for your deity’s vile power.

name: Eternal Blessing
desc: Your good deeds have brought your deity’s grace to you for all of eternity.

name: Eternal Elixir
desc: Your body readily accepts and retains minor changes.

name: Expand Aura
prerequisites: You have at least one aura from a champion feat or feature.
desc: You focus your divine power to extend your influence.

name: Exploitive Bomb
desc: You mix a substance into the bomb to foil resistances.

name: Felicitous Riposte
desc: You take advantage of your foe's openings with uncanny odds.

name: Flinging Blow
desc: You take a moment to center yourself, then unleash a powerful blow that sends your target tumbling away.

name: Focus Ally
desc: You're so focused on your allies that you can help them to recenter when something would take them out of the fight.

name: Fulminating Synergy
desc: When you draw upon your spells’ synergy, you create a physical manifestation of their magical resonance and invoke it to harm a foe.

name: Furious Vengeance
desc: Your enemy's blow fuels your rage and provokes your immediate retaliation.

name: Genius Mutagen
desc: Specialized tweaks to your formula that supplements your genius considerably broaden the benefits you gain from cognitive mutagens.

name: Graceful Poise
desc: With the right positioning, your off-hand weapon can strike like a scorpion’s stinger.

name: Greater Distracting Shot
desc: Even a single missile can throw of your enemy’s balance, and more powerful attacks leave it flustered for longer.

name: Greater Mental Evolution
desc: Your bloodline’s deep connection to mental essence greatly enhances your spell repertoire.

name: Greater Vital Evolution
desc: Vital power surges through you like a font of energy.

name: Impaling Briars
desc: You can fill an area with devastating briars that impale and impede your foes.

name: Implausible Purchase (Investigator)
desc: It seems impossible, but you've analyzed every angle and are able to just keep pulling out exactly the item you need, even in far-flung locations.

name: Improved Reflexive Shield
desc: Your shield can help save nearby allies.

name: Improved Twin Riposte (Ranger)
desc: You are able to riposte an additional time per turn.

name: Instrument of Slaughter
desc: Your blade ally thirsts for the blood of your foes.

name: Instrument of Zeal
desc: Divine energy fills your weapon.

name: Lead the Pack
prerequisites: Mature Beastmaster Companion; you have multiple animal companions
desc: You can have up to two animal companions active at once.

name: Legendary Monster Hunter
prerequisites: Master Monster Hunter; legendary in Nature
desc: Your knowledge of monsters is so incredible that it reveals glaring flaws in your prey.

name: Master of Many Styles
desc: You move between stances in an unceasing dance.

name: Master's Counterspell
prerequisites: Spellmaster Dedication; master in spell attack rolls and spell DCs
desc: When a foe Casts a Spell and you can see its manifestations, you can use your magic to disrupt it.

name: Medusa's Wrath
desc: You learn a monstrous ki technique that infuses your blows with the petrifying power of a medusa's gaze.

name: Mobile Magical Combat
desc: You dart around the battlefield, casting spells while you carefully make melee attacks with your weapon.

name: Monstrosity Shape
desc: You can transform into a powerful magical creature.

name: Multishot Stance
desc: You lock yourself in a stable position so you can fire swiftly and accurately.

name: One-Millimeter Punch
desc: Your punches have incredible force and control.

name: Opportune Throw
source: Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On
desc: Make a ranged attack with a Juggled item against a vulnerable creature.

name: Overwhelming Blow
desc: You throw your weight into a powerful attack that leaves you vulnerable.

name: Penetrating Projectile
desc: Your projectiles are unhindered by flesh and bone.

name: Perfect Distraction
desc: You use clever tactics to mislead your foes as you sneak away. You Sneak while leaving a decoy behind.

name: Performance Weapon Expert
prerequisites: Provocator Dedication; expert in any kind of weapon or unarmed attack
desc: Your experience has made you better with a wide variety of weapons.

name: Persistent Mutagen
desc: You’ve trained your physical form to remain stable within the a given altered state.

name: Phase Arrow
desc: You can concentrate an immense amount of magic to create a piece of ammunition that phases through everything but your target.

name: Portentous Spell
desc: Your spellcasting is rife with strange lights, esoteric gestures, and other captivating effects that befuddle your foes.

name: Quivering Palm
desc: Your strikes can kill foes.

name: Reckless Abandon
desc: Your blood boils when you take a beating, and you throw caution to the wind to finish the fight.

name: Reconstruct the Scene
desc: You spend 1 minute surveying a small location (such as a single room) to get an impression of events that occurred there in the last day.

name: Remediate
desc: If your next action is to use your divine font to cast a 3-action heal or harm spell to damage creatures, you can harness the residual energy to counterbalance opposing forces.

name: Resounding Finale
desc: You bring your performance to a sudden, dramatic finish, drowning out other sounds.

name: Resurrectionist
desc: You can cause a creature you bring back from the brink of death to thrive and continue healing.

name: Resuscitate
desc: You can use Medicine to resuscitate the dead.

name: Scintillating Spell
desc: Your spells become a radiant display of light and color.

name: Shattering Blows
desc: Your forceful blows shatter objects with ease.

name: Shattering Strike (Monk)
desc: The force of your considered blow shatters objects and defenses alike.

name: Shield of Grace
desc: You protect an ally with both your shield and your body.

name: Siphon Power
desc: You draw upon the reservoir of your patron's magic that resides within your familiar.

name: Sixth Pillar Mastery
desc: Your greater discipline aligns your magical and physical potential.

name: Specialized Companion (Ranger)
desc: Your animal companion has become cunning enough to become specialized.

name: Spell Tinker
desc: You’ve learned to alter choices you make when casting spells on yourself.

name: Steal Spell
desc: When you use Legendary Thief to steal the impossible, you can steal a prepared spell or spontaneous spell from a foe.

name: Studious Capacity
desc: Your continued study of occult magic has increased your magical capacity.

name: Stunning Appearance
desc: Your sudden appearance leaves your foe unable to respond.

name: Swift Elusion
desc: Attempt an Acrobatics check against the foe's Reflex DC.

name: Terraforming Spell
desc: You capture transformative fragments of magic and slam them into the ground, creating a shock wave that alters your surroundings.

name: Twinned Defense (Fighter)
desc: You’re always ready to use your off-hand weapon to interfere with attacks against you.

name: Ubiquitous Snares
desc: You can prepare a seemingly impossible number of snares in advance, and you’re ready to spring them on unsuspecting foes.

name: Ward Mind
desc: To protect the knowledge within your mind from intrusion or erasure, you ward yourself against a mental attack.

name: Animal Shape
desc: You have full control over your shape and can transform into your inherent animal.

name: Animal Swiftness
desc: You move like an animal.

name: Azaersi's Roads
desc: Azaersi has granted you limited access to the Stone Roads, attuning you to the tiniest sliver of the Onyx Key.

name: Blazing Aura
desc: You explode in flame.

name: Bone Rider
desc: Using your ancestors' bones, you manifest their spirits around you in a fossilized form, terrifying your foes.

name: Boneyard's Call
desc: You have a powerful connection to the Boneyard and its courts, granting you the ability to travel to and from the Boneyard.

name: Cantorian Restoration
desc: The energy that flows in your blood can save a life in the direst of times.

name: Celestial Word
desc: You can call forth a holy word from the celestial realms to punish your foes.

name: Ceremony of Sun's Gift
desc: Your connection to the sun has become an unbreakable bond.

name: Channel the Godmind
desc: You tap into the Godmind's collective cognitive well, rapidly parsing near-infinite variables to read your surroundings.

name: Crone's Cruelty
desc: Filled with rancor and hate, you rend the minds of those who displease you.

name: Elude Trouble
desc: You slip through your foe's opening.

name: Eternal Wings (Aasimar)
desc: Your wings are now a permanent part of your body.

name: Eternal Wings (Sylph)
desc: Your wings are now a permanent part of your body.

name: Favor of Heaven
desc: You're one of Hei Feng's chosen people and have the authority of the Celestial Court on your side.

name: Fiendish Word
desc: You can call forth a blasphemous word from the fiendish realms to punish your foes.

name: Final Form
desc: You embrace your monstrous blood and make it your own, screaming out to the heavens and hells alike in rage, pain, and defiance.

name: Flourish and Ruin
desc: You can call upon the vital essence of your spirit to restore life to your allies and call forth vines to ensnare and bludgeon your foes.

name: Fountain of Secrets
desc: You constantly remember details about the world.

name: Great Tengu Form
desc: You take on the imposing form of a large, winged oni.

name: Heroic Presence
desc: The blood of heroes courses through your veins, and you inspire your allies to dig deep and find a new level of resolve.

name: Hero's Wings
desc: You have begun the final steps to reaching your full potential.

name: Homeward Bound
desc: The connection between you and the First World resonates within your body stronger than it does for most gnomes, allowing you to cross the threshold between the Material Plane and the First World.

name: Hurricane Swing
desc: Choose either lightning bolt or gust of wind.

name: Magic Rider
desc: Your people used powerful magic to travel between distant worlds, and the remnants of that magic make such transportation easier for you.

name: Olethros's Decree
desc: You have a connection to olethroses, the enigmatic psychopomps who successfully swayed the yamaraj to permit the creation of the first duskwalkers.

name: Pierce the Light
desc: You tear the veil between the Material Plane and its shadow.

name: Radiate Glory
desc: Your inherent glory radiates into the world with all the divine power of the celestial planes for 1 minute.

name: Rallying Cry
desc: You call out to your allies and push them to give their all in combat.

name: Rampaging Ferocity
desc: You lash out viciously even as you fend off death.

name: Rampaging Form
prerequisites: Change Shape with a fox alternate form
desc: Once per day, when you Change Shape into a fox, you can instead gain the effects of both the canine form of 5th-level animal form and 7th-level fiery body for 1 minute or until you shift back, whichever comes first.

name: Ratfolk Growth
desc: You call upon the familial bonds you share with other ysoki to defend them in battle.

name: Reckless Abandon (Goblin)
desc: Despite a lifetime filled with questionable decisions, you've managed to survive, as though you have uncanny luck that lets you avoid the consequences of your own actions.

name: Regrowth
desc: Your command over your vital essence allows you or an ally to recover from grievous wounds.

name: Relentless Wings
desc: Your wings are now a permanent part of your physiology.

name: Reliable Luck
desc: You have gone well past nine lives to survive danger with surprising regularity.

name: Scion Transformation
desc: You go into hibernation for 24 hours and perform a ritual dedicated to your ancestors, undergoing a one-time metamorphosis.

name: Shadow Self
desc: With a powerful talent for misdirection, you slip from your adversaries' notice so thoroughly you appear to be somewhere else.

name: Soaring Form
desc: Your wings grow stronger.

name: Stone Form
desc: You can transform your body into a pure primal manifestation of earth, an elemental.

name: Stonegate
desc: Earthen barriers no longer impede your progress.

name: Storm Form
desc: You can transform into an elemental.

name: Stormy Heart
desc: The elemental power in your blood is a raging storm.

name: Symphony of Blood
desc: You call forth the blood of your foes to grant you vigor.

name: Ten Lives
desc: When your character would die, you can attempt a DC 17 flat check.

name: Tidal Shield
desc: You conjure the force of the tides to gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.

name: Trickster Tengu
desc: You can transform yourself or the bodies of others to express your displeasure.

name: True Gaze
desc: When you focus your eyes carefully, your gaze can pierce through all obfuscations, even magical ones.

name: Twist Healing
prerequisites: ability to cast heal and harm
desc: Your connection to both life and undeath lets you twist the healing power of magic items to suit your own needs and aims.

name: Underwater Volcano
desc: You can cast volcanic eruption as a 7th-level primal innate spell once per day.

name: Wyrmling Flight
desc: Your draconic wings have grown large and strong enough for flight.

name: Yamaraj's Grandeur
desc: You have been granted a sliver of the power of the yamaraj, the magistrates of the dead who agreed to allow duskwalkers to exist at all.

name: All in my Head
desc: Using your occult connections and incredible powers of persuasion, you convince yourself that the triggering damage is a figment of your imagination.

name: Arrow of Death
desc: You modify an arrow or bolt to bring death to your target in a single potent hit.

name: Blaze of Revelation
desc: Your mind and body can, for a short time, withstand the devastation of overdrawing your curse.

name: Bloodline Wellspring
desc: Your blood’s power replenishes your focus.

name: Brutal Critical
desc: Your critical hits are particularly devastating.

name: Celestial Form
desc: You take on a celestial countenance, appearing like a type of celestial who serves your deity.

name: Deep Lore
desc: Your repertoire is vast, containing far more spells than usual.

name: Diamond Fists
desc: Your body hardens as you combine your attacks, making your finishing blows more damaging.

name: Discordant Voice
desc: Your inspire courage lets loose a discordant shriek that imbues your allies' attacks with powerful sonic reverberations.

name: Divine Effusion
desc: The power of your mystery surges through you like a font of divine energy, even when your own magic dwindles.

name: Domain Wellspring
desc: The intensity of your focus grows from the investment you’ve placed in your domains.

name: Echoing Channel
desc: When you pull forth positive or negative energy, you also create a smaller pocket of that energy.

name: Echoing Spell
desc: You time the components of your spell with exacting precision, setting up a resonance that duplicates the spell's effects.

name: Effortless Reach
desc: Focusing the powers of your ki to augment your blows, you stretch and lengthen your body in ways that defy logic.

name: Empty Body
desc: You transmute your body into an ethereal form.

name: Eternal Composition
desc: The world is a stage upon which you are always playing.

name: Fiendish Form
desc: Your features reshape into those of a type of fiend who serves your deity; for example, as a demon you might have putrid scales, twisted horns, and red eyes.

name: Greater Crossblooded Evolution
desc: Your bloodline is extraordinarily complex.

name: Halcyon Spellcasting Sage
prerequisites: Halcyon Spellcasting Adept; legendary in either Arcana or Nature, master in the other
desc: Your command over halcyon magic is nearly unmatched.

name: Hex Wellspring
desc: Focus flows from your patron each time you commune with your familiar.

name: Implausible Infiltration
desc: You find tiny holes or imperfections that no one else could see and try to somehow fit yourself through them.

name: Implausible Purchase (Rogue)
desc: Even when impossible, you always have exactly what you need.

name: Impossible Flurry
desc: You forgo precision to attack at an impossible speed.

name: Impossible Polymath
prerequisites: Esoteric Polymath; trained in Arcana, Occultism, or Religion
desc: Your esoteric formulas are so unusual that they allow you to dabble in magic from diverse traditions.

name: Impossible Volley
desc: You fire a volley at all foes in an area.

name: Improbable Elixirs
desc: Your mastery of alchemical secrets enables you to replicate effects most believe can be achieved only via magic.

name: Improved Swift Banishment
desc: You easily banish creatures with your weapon.

name: Incredible Luck
desc: You always seem to bounce back from the worst.

name: Infinite Possibilities
desc: You’ve found a way to prepare a spell slot that exists in your mind as many different possibilities at once.

name: Invoke Disaster
desc: You can invoke nature’s fury upon your foes.

name: Ki Center
prerequisites: ki spells; Master of Many Styles
desc: You center yourself with the universe and draw upon its vast power.

name: Ki Form
desc: You have mastered a potent technique for using your ki to reinforce your physical form and propel yourself through the air.

name: Lead Investigator
desc: You spend 1 minute briefing up to four allies about one lead you're pursuing.

name: Lethal Finisher
desc: You stab your foe in a vital organ, possibly killing them outright.

name: Manifold Edge
desc: You’ve learned every possible edge to use against your foes.

name: Master Bard Spellcasting
prerequisites: Expert Bard Spellcasting; legendary in Occultism
desc: You gain the master spellcasting benefits for bard spellcasting.

name: Master Cleric Spellcasting
prerequisites: Expert Cleric Spellcasting; legendary in Religion
desc: You gain the master spellcasting benefits for cleric spellcasting.

name: Master Druid Spellcasting
prerequisites: Expert Druid Spellcasting; legendary in Nature
desc: You gain the master spellcasting benefits for druid spellcasting.

name: Master Eldritch Archer Spellcasting
desc: You gain the master spellcasting benefits.

name: Master Oracle Spellcasting
prerequisites: Expert Oracle Spellcasting; legendary in Religion
desc: You gain the master spellcasting benefits.

name: Master Scroll Cache
desc: Your scroll collection is incredible, brimming with eldritch power, and you can prepare far more of them than an ordinary scroll trickster.

name: Master Sorcerer Spellcasting
prerequisites: Expert Sorcerer Spellcasting; legendary in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion, depending on bloodline
desc: You gain the master spellcasting benefits for sorcerer spellcasting.

name: Master Witch Spellcasting
prerequisites: Expert Witch Spellcasting; legendary in the skill associated with your patron's tradition
desc: You gain the master spellcasting benefits.

name: Master Wizard Spellcasting
prerequisites: Expert Wizard Spellcasting; legendary in Arcana
desc: You gain the master spellcasting benefits for wizard spellcasting.

name: Masterful Companion
desc: Your animal companion shares your incredible hunting skills, allowing it to take down your shared prey with ease.

name: Meditative Wellspring
desc: When you clear your mind, your focus comes flowing back in a powerful rush.

name: Mighty Dragon Shape
desc: You've practiced and increased your draconic might, allowing you to take your draconic form more often.

name: Mindblank Mutagen
desc: With a minor adjustment of ratios in the formula for your serene mutagen, you gain mental protections.

name: Miracle Worker
desc: Your alchemical mastery can resuscitate the recently slain.

name: Miraculous Possibility
desc: Your deity empowers you to perform minor miracles, allowing you to readily adapt to the fluctuating needs of your duties.

name: Parry and Riposte
desc: Your parries and finishers allow you to riposte with the slightest provocation.

name: Perfect Clarity
desc: You burn out all of your rage to ensure that your attack lands and your mind remains free.

name: Perfect Debilitation
desc: You have perfected the formulas for bombs that impede your enemies.

name: Perfect Form Control
desc: Thanks to magic and muscle memory, you can stay in your alternate forms indefinitely.

name: Perfect Shot
desc: After watching the motions of combat with incredible intensity and precision, you fire at your prey at the perfect moment to deliver maximum pain.

name: Powerful Sneak
desc: You have learned to exploit your enemies’ lowered defenses.

name: Primal Aegis
desc: You surround yourself with a thick field of protective primal energy.

name: Primal Wellspring
desc: Your reservoir of Focus Points is a deep wellspring.

name: Rejuvenating Touch
desc: Your healing energies linger after you cast, providing continual benefits.

name: Reprepare Spell
desc: You’ve discovered how to reuse some of your spell slots over and over.

name: Retain Absorbed Spell
desc: When you absorb a spell using the Absorb Spell reaction, you utilize secret, techniques that allow you to retain the power and knowledge necessary to cast the spell repeatedly—potentially for a greater period of time.

name: Savage Critical
desc: The wounds you inflict are grievous.

name: Second Chance Spell
desc: When your target proves resilient to your magical deceptions, you can try them again on someone else.

name: Shadow Hunter
desc: You blend in to your surroundings so well that others have trouble telling you apart from the terrain.

name: Shadow Master
desc: The shadows protect you better than any armor can, and they give you power to plunge others into darkness.

name: Shared Clarity
desc: You can project your premonitions of clarity to your allies.

name: Smash from the Air
desc: Your expertise enables you to knock away spells.

name: Specialized Companion
source: Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God
desc: Your animal companion gains a specialization.

name: Split Hex
desc: You siphon some of the power from an offensive hex you cast to direct it at a second target as well.

name: Stave Off Catastrophe
desc: You fully protect your allies from the worst blows.

name: Swift River
desc: You flow like water, avoiding all restraints.

name: Triangle Shot
desc: You string three arrows to your bow and fire them all at once.

name: Trickster's Ace
desc: You have a contingency in your back pocket for desperate situations.

name: Ultimate Mercy
desc: Your mercy transcends the bounds of life and death.

name: Vicious Evisceration
desc: You make a vicious attack that maims your enemy.

name: Warden's Wellspring
desc: You command unparalleled focus when you commune with the world around you.

name: True Perception
desc: Gain constant effects of true seeing.

name: Accurate Flurry
desc: You refine the precision of your unbelievable storm of blows.

name: All the Time in the World
desc: Your firsthand experience of the subjective nature of time and space has given you new observational insights.

name: Annihilating Swing
desc: You have learned from the brute destructive power of xulgaths and their kind.

name: Apex Companion
desc: Gain the apex companion focus spell.

name: Archwizard's Might
desc: You have mastered the greatest secrets of arcane magic.

name: Astonishing Explosion
desc: Your bomb incorporates an explosive spark of wonder that leaves witnesses dumbfounded.

name: Aura of Unbreakable Virtue
desc: Overwhelm evil creatures with your aura.

name: Avatar's Audience
desc: Your extensive service has made you a lesser herald of your deity, which affords you certain privileges.

name: Banishing Blow
desc: The erratic teleportation magic you experienced in the Kortos Mounts has taught you a few tricks.

name: Bloodline Conduit
desc: Your inborn magical nature lets you redirect ambient energies to fuel your spells.

name: Bloodline Metamorphosis
desc: Swap out spells from your repertoire more easily.

name: Bloodline Mutation
prerequisites: a bloodline based on a specific type of creature
desc: You permanently mutate to become more like the creatures of your bloodline.

name: Bloodline Perfection
desc: You command the ultimate powers of your bloodline and tradition.

name: Boundless Reprisals
desc: With a sixth sense for the flow of combat, you can quickly react to any situation as required.

name: Celestial Mount
desc: Your steed gains incredible celestial powers granted by your deity.

name: Contagious Rage
desc: You can drive your allies into a frenzy, granting them incredible benefits.

name: Craft Philosopher's Stone
desc: Your research has paid off, culminating in the legendary philosopher’s stone.

name: Cross the Final Horizon
desc: You Stride up to your Speed and your ki enshrouds your limbs in a terrifying stormy energy.

name: Dance of Intercession
desc: You either performed in or stood witness to the dance used to invoke the Celestial Dragon and can harness a sliver of their power.

name: Deadly Strikes
desc: You have honed your body to attack with lethal focus.

name: Demon's Hair
desc: Your hair constantly wriggles and writhes.

name: Denier of Destruction
desc: You can manipulate the same energies that the aeon orbs use to sustain life.

name: Efficient Alchemy (Paragon)
desc: Prepare more alchemical items from your infused reagents.

name: Emblazon Divinity
desc: Emblazon more equipment at the same time.

name: Endurance of the Rooted Tree
desc: Just as the Vale of Aroden retains light and life despite inhospitable surroundings, you can sustain yourself regardless of your environment.

name: Enduring Debilitation
desc: Your debilitations last for 1 minute.

name: Enduring Quickness
desc: You move as fast and as high as the wind itself.

name: Everdistant Defense
desc: You have learned that distance can foil enemies better than any armor.

name: Everyone's a Suspect
desc: You are so suspicious of everyone you meet that you keep mental notes on how to defeat them all—even your own allies.

name: Extradimensional Stash
desc: When you perform sleight of hand, you fold space so that objects really do disappear.

name: Fatal Aria
desc: Your songs overwhelm the target with unbearable emotion.

name: Fiendish Mount
desc: Your steed ally manifests a suite of powerful and sinister gifts granted to it by your deity.

name: Fuse Stance
desc: You have combined two stances into a single stance all your own.

name: Golden Body
desc: Strike harder and heal more rapidly.

name: Head of the Night Parade
desc: You remember the revelry of the Night Parade and call them to your aid in a riotous display.

name: Heart of the Kaiju
desc: Witnessing the might of a kaiju up close awoke a new ferocity within you.

name: Hex Master
desc: You embody the link to your patron so completely that you can cast your hexes in rapid succession.

name: Hidden Paragon
desc: When you put your mind to slipping out of sight, you disappear completely.

name: Hierophant's Power
desc: You have entwined yourself with the natural world, and its full power flows through you.

name: Impossible Snares
desc: You can create endless shorter-lived snares, protecting your lair or using them against foes.

name: Impossible Striker
desc: Your attacks are swift and deadly beyond explanation.

name: Impossible Technique
desc: You execute a maneuver that defies possibility.

name: Inexhaustible Countermoves
desc: You can react whenever a foe leaves a gap in their defenses.

name: Just the Facts
desc: You fundamentally understand everything to the point where your research can't possibly be wrong.

name: Legendary Rider
desc: You and your mount move like one being, effortlessly reading each other's signals.

name: Legendary Shot
prerequisites: masterful hunter; legendary in Perception; Far Shot
desc: You focus on your hunted prey, perceiving angles, air resistance, and every variable that would af ect your ranged attack.

name: Leyline Conduit
desc: You can cast your spells effortlessly by tapping into the leylines of the world.

name: Maker of Miracles
desc: You are a conduit for truly deific power.

name: Mega Bomb
desc: You add an incredibly powerful additive to a held bomb to create a mega bomb.

name: Metamagic Channel
desc: Deep understanding of divine revelations into the nature of vital essence allows you to freely manipulate the effects of your positive or negative energy.

name: Metamagic Mastery
desc: Altering your spells doesn’t take any longer than casting them normally.

name: Mimic Protections
desc: By adopting resonant reflections, you have learned to copy the abilities of other creatures as well.

name: Mystery Conduit
desc: The power of your mystery enables you to cast more than just revelation spells.

name: Oracular Providence
desc: Your mystery grants you access to deep reserves of truly miraculous divine power.

name: Panache Paragon
desc: You find opportunities to perform stylish feats in the moments between others' heartbeats and eye blinks.

name: Paradoxical Mystery
desc: The truest depths of your divine mystery are fathomless and contradictory, granting you changing powers that even you can barely begin to fathom.

name: Patron's Truth
desc: You have mastered the greatest secrets of your patron's magic and learned a fundamental truth about your patron, even if their identity still remains a mystery.

name: Perfect Encore
desc: You develop another incredible creation.

name: Perfect Mutagen
desc: You have enhanced the formulas for your mutagens, aligning them perfectly to your physiology.

name: Pied Piping
desc: You learn the pied piping composition spell, which enables you to control the actions of weak-minded individuals.

name: Plum Deluge
desc: You have learned to saturate an area with poison.

name: Quaking Stomp
desc: You stomp the ground with such force that it creates a minor earthquake.

name: Radiant Blade Master
desc: Your divine ally turns your chosen weapon into a paragon of its type.

name: Reactive Distraction
desc: You reactively switch with your decoy to foil your foe.

name: Reclaim Spell
desc: You have learned to manipulate reflections of magic, similar to the resonant reflections.

name: Reflecting Riposte
prerequisites: Dueling Riposte, Mirror Shield, or Twin Riposte
desc: You attempt to counteract the triggering spell using powerful magical techniques observed in the Kortos Mounts.

name: Ringmaster's Introduction
desc: You announce the triggering ally with a litany of their legendary achievements, spurring them to action.

name: Ruby Resurrection
desc: In a burst of flame, you return to health like a phoenix rising from the ashes.

name: Sacred Defender
desc: You are a great warrior that can stand strong against the fiercest opponents to your cause.

name: Scapegoat Parallel Self
desc: You've realized a way to manipulate the effects of your oracular curse.

name: Sever Space
desc: You destroy the space between you and your targets, allowing you to strike with your melee weapons at great range.

name: Shield Paragon
desc: Your shield is a vessel of divine protection.

name: Song of the Fallen
desc: Gain the song of the fallen focus spell.

name: Spell Combination
desc: You can merge spells, producing multiple effects with a single casting.

name: Spell Mastery
desc: You have mastered a handful of spells to such a degree that you can cast them even if you haven't prepared them in advance.

name: Steal Essence
prerequisites: legendary in Thievery, master in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
desc: Being in the presence of the aeon orbs as they deteriorated has taught you how to siphon energy, and you do so with the required magic item.

name: Superior Sight
desc: Increase your visual acuity.

name: Symphony of the Muses
desc: You are able to weave countless performances together into a solo symphony.

name: Synergistic Spell
prerequisites: Halcyon Spellcasting Initiate; Fulminating Synergy; legendary in Arcana and Nature
desc: You combine your synergy and spells into a fantastic web of magic, allowing you to cast two spells at once.

name: Tenacious Blood Magic
desc: You have learned how to invest magic more deeply by witnessing Aroden's works.

name: Time Dilation Cascade
desc: You borrow a bit of time from the future to act now.

name: To the Ends of the Earth
desc: Your ability to track your prey has surpassed explanation, allowing you to trace your prey’s movements and predict its location with ease.

name: Triple Threat
desc: You can divide your attention three ways when hunting.

name: True Shapeshifter
desc: You transcend the limitations of form.

name: Ultimate Flexibility
desc: Your experience keeps you on your toes, making you adaptable to even the most dangerous challenges.

name: Ultimate Polymath
desc: You can flexibly cast all of your spells, granting a dizzying array of possible options.

name: Ultimate Skirmisher
desc: You are so skilled at navigating the wild, your movement is completely unaffected by terrain.

name: Unstoppable Juggernaut
desc: You have become a brutal, unstoppable force of nature, able to shrug off mortal wounds with ease.

name: Verdant Presence
desc: The life-giving properties of the aeon orbs flourish within you.

name: Vitality-Manipulating Stance
desc: You have learned to attack meridians and pressure points.

name: Vivacious Afterimage
desc: You move so quickly that you create a short-lived afterimage, looks exactly like you, in front of you or behind you.

name: Weapon Supremacy
desc: Your skill with weapons lets you attack swiftly at all times.

name: Whirlwind Toss
desc: You whirl a foe to smash into all nearby creatures before throwing them far away.

name: Wish Alchemy
desc: You have learned Artokus Kirran's most hidden secrets, granting you the ability to create alchemy infused with the power of wishes.

name: Witch's Hut
desc: Your home is an animated structure that obeys your commands.

name: Worldsphere Gravity
desc: Though creating demiplanes usually requires lengthy rituals, you know how to establish minor planar effects.
